review_content: The Bay Rum smells great and my dad loves it!

I bought the soaps for a Christmas gift.  They are for my son-in-law.  We won't know how he likes them until after Christmas.  I must say, they all smell great.  I'll be very surprised if he does not like them.

This works great to eliminate the gooey, slimy, slippery bar of soap that you get when you place your soap in a normal soap dish or just put the soap on a shelf.  

I use Sasquatch soap every day for shower, shaving, and shampoo.  With the Sasquatch Soap Saver, I have a completely dry bar of soap every morning, and have been able to get MORE than a month out of every bar.  

The cedar smells good, looks good, cleans up easily, and the grooves allow air to completely circulate around the bar so it dries out rapidly instead of dissolving.

You need this if you are using bar soap.

My husband has sensitive skin and we have been searching for years for an affordable natural soap that does not cause any reactions to his skin.  Sasquatch Soap Company has done it!  SO far so good.  I purchased the soap gift box providing a variety of soaps for my husband to choose from.  He LOVES the Gold Moss Scrub.  I was surprised it left his skin feeling clean to the touch but not dry like other soaps and he smells fantastic!  He cannot wait to try the other soaps available in the set.  I love the soap! 
Sasquatch Soap Co., thank you for providing such a variety of high quality soaps for sensitive skinned people like my husband.  We will be back!
Sheri

I already use this soap everyday, so I was pumped to see this perfect gift option!

Just received 2 cigar boxes today for Christmas gifts.  Fast delivery - and the Cigar Box presentation (came with ribbon around the boxes) looks amazing - and does not need wrapped - nice plus.  About to order lots more to knock out any remaining guys on my gift list.

This was my first purchase with Sasquatch Soap. I bought 6 different scents for my son for Christmas. He loves soaps and loves unique soaps scents even more.  I myself,  loved the scents and the bar size is well worth the cost.   Added bonus...He gets a very cute soap saver, that was added to my order!!
I sent this gift to my son inlaw and he  was impressed with the quality and the great scent of the soap.

This purchase was a birthday gift for my brother.  While visiting his house in Chicago at Thanksgiving I saw a few bars of this brands soap in his bathroom. I ordered the gift pack as I could not remember what he already owned. When he received hisngift not only did he enjoy the variety but was also pleased his favorite was included, black tar. Additionally, he mentioned this company was owned by his coworker's significant other and had a great story about how he first discovered the brand.
This is soap is terrific! great scent, easy on the skin.
The Sasquatch has done it again!!! soap for the sesitive manly man!! great scent, and of course value, and service SECOND TO NONE....

Not only a novel idea, but the fragrance was exceptional. It was a gift for my son for Christmas who has written a musical for the stage, guess what the title is?  Sasquatch, the Musical. It premiers in our home town in April, 2013. Anyway, he loved the gift.

Not only a novel idea, but the fragrance was exceptional. It was a gift for my son for Christmas who has written a musical for the stage, guess what the title is?  Sasquatch, the Musical. It premiers in our home town in April, 2013. Anyway, he loved the gift.
though the wooden holder is smaller than expected and considerably smaller than the soap bars, it does the job of draining and holding.   Too soon to know how it will "hold up"

Especially sudsy and creamy if your water is soft/conditioned.   Less lather in harder water though cleaning is fine.   However, expect bar's life to be shortened in harder water.   Scent is pleasant and not overpowering.  I will buy again.    It helps that my water at home is conditioned though I've used this soap "on the road" less effectively and enjoyably.
It helps the soap last a little longer by letting it dry properly, and the wood smells great, as well. I love it.

review_title: Quite possibly my favorite Sasquatch scent
review_content: I love the scent of this soap, but I feel like it's not quite strong enough. That's just my personal opinion, though. Maybe I just want it to smell stronger because I like it so much. I'll definitely keep ordering this scent in the future.

Order two...one went to wrong address...no fault of Mr. Sasquatch. Yet he resent and more..no problem.  Maxed out customer service scale.
Cool gift box (cigar box). I've only tried the pine tar so far and love it! Great smell and some nice grit to it. Looking forward to the others. College sons report back same on aloe soap.
The Sasquatch Gold Moss Scrub Soap is wonderful!  The sent is clean and sensual; it seems to transform your shower experience with aroma therapy while you shower.  Love it! Love it! Love it!

review_title: The Sasquatch Gold Moss Scrub Soap
review_content: The Sasquatch Gold Moss Scrub Soap is wonderful!  The sent is clean and sensual; it seems to transform your shower experience with aroma therapy while you shower.  Love it! Love it! Love it!

The Soap Saver is a fantastic product, light weight but does the job to eliminate melting soap extending the life of your soap bar.  The fresh wood sent reminds me of a cedar sauna transporting me to a spa setting every time I shower.   Love it!

I really enjoy the scent of the Pine Tar soap. It stays around for a long time and has an awesome, masculine smell that both my girlfriend and I enjoy. The scent sticks longest in hairier areas, so my beard ends up having an awesome aroma all day. The only reasons I cannot give it 5 stars is that the soap doesn't quite foam up enough for me compared to the other soap I've gotten from Sasquatch (Cool Water). Also, the particles in the soap can be a bit scratchy, although that came and went depending on what stage of use I was at. 

Even with those slight issues, the scent is above and beyond for me. It has beat out Cool Water, so it's on to Gold Moss Scrub and Bay Rum to see what gets top spot.
This soap is awesome. Loved the rich smell that really lingers and is rich and powerful. I will be ordering more!

I stumbled upon Sasquatch Soap Co., when my husband requested that I find and buy him some "man soap". Seeing the gift idea, I went ahead and ordered it-we were both blown away when it arrived. The cigar box was completely sturdy, and the soap selection was awesome. He loves it, and has requested that once he uses this soap that I order him some more. Its strong enough that it lasts all day, but not over powering in any way. And, as a perk, we live in Utah's high mountains at 7000 feet elevation, where the air is extremely dry...he has not needed lotion to hydrate his skin since he began using the soap.

Is most definately a manly man soap. I didnt buy too many of the Pine Tar. I like but not a favorite when I did a customer test on which ones they would buy. All around love this product and concept and will enjoy selling it to the target male market.

One of the best soaps I have ever tried! I really like the sent and the rich lather. My skin feels really clean without any oiliness or stickiness afterwards. I just wish the bars would last a little longer.
I absolutely love the scent of this soap!
Great soap!  Very masculine smell and a great lather.  I will order more and highly recommend this product
I order the gift box set for a closing-night gift for my son who was in Sasquatch: The Muscial! He loved it and my husband is hooked on the soap now too! Will order again I'm sure!!
Disapeers way to soon & makes skin even dryer the before

Great soap. Lather and feel. Will be back for more. 
Wish there were a MG HEAVY Duty - as robust as Pine Tar!! Even then I'ld keep going back for more of this MG... I keep these two in the shower at all times.

review_title: I Love the Smell of Pine Tar in the Morning
review_content: Until I tried pine Tar soap i really didn't care much about soap at all.  Now i'm spoiled. This and the moss soap are a great way to start the day!

i ordered this soap with a couple of others to give the squatch a try. so for this particular soap i can't say much other than the scent. the scent is by far my favorite of the soaps i ordered.  if you ask why i haven't used it yet. a simple case of save the best for last.

First time Squatch buyer here but I was happy with Pine Tar. I love the smell, it gets me clean, and what I love most is it's natural. I wish more things in life were as uncomplicated as Sasquatch's soap! Great job guys! You've got a customer for life!

My boyfriend loved this. He has been using Sasquatch soap for awhile but I wanted to get him more but a little more special. The box was really cool. Two of the soaps he has tried before and two of them he hadn't. I don't think he would have ever tried them if i hadn't bought him the gift box. I love this soap because the smell is still on him all day and it has cleared up a lot of his skin problems, to any guy or gal considering this gift box, do it.

I place a bar of this on my bathroom sink for hand washing purposes. It has a very pleasant minty scent, so the ladies don't complain about it leaving their hands smelling too "manly" when they use it ;)

while i enjoy the scent it's just not very noticeable. it'll stay in hair for a few hours but other than that the scent doesn't linger much at all.  also seems to disappear just a little to quick. though it does lather fairly well.(much better than mass produced soaps at a store)
I like this one a lot. It's definitely both cool and fresh. The scent also mingles well with the scent of the cedar soap saver, if you're using one of those. Highly recommended.

I've been buying natural soap for a while and Sasquatch is my new favorite.  The smells are great and the lather is perfect.  I got the Cool Fresh Aloe, Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt, Bay Rum.  Excellent soap.  Will be using this for a long time.

Received your Gold Moss Scrub with the latest Bespoke Post box this month. Man, this is some great stuff. The scent wakes me up before the start of my day. I'm bookmarking your site and looking forward to trying other soaps. I'm eyeing the pine bar.

I bought this for my dad for Father's day as he is a fan of bar soap.  It came with Bay Rum, Pine Tar, Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt, and Spearmint Basil Scrub. I am LOVING the cigar box which hold the soaps.  Great detail and quality. I know my 50-something dad will love it too.  Thanks Sasquatch!!

I bought this for my dad for Father's day as he is a fan of bar soap.  It came with Bay Rum, Pine Tar, Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt, and Spearmint Basil Scrub. I am LOVING the cigar box which hold the soaps.  Great detail and quality. I know my 50-something dad will love it too.  Thanks Sasquatch!!
Rob Renner told me to buy this soap. It's way above average!
This soap smells grrat just wish it was bigger.

After looking through the various options, I decided to pull the trigger on the Pine Tar and Golden Moss Scrub. Needless to say, I am very satisfied with my choice. The scent is mantastic and it feels pretty good too. Definitely recommend it.
I purchased the soap mainly for the scent and it smells exactly like i had hoped, the soap its self is very pleasant and makes my skin fell much better than a commercially bought soap
Fell in love with this soap the first time I used it!
Have only tried the pine tar, but it's awesome and natural. Can't ask for much more than that. Scent is not too overpowering and wakes you up in the mornings.
Pine Tar is like rubbing a pine Forrest on your body!
Quick shipping and great soap so far, still on my first bar, but can't wait to try the others

The ironic thing about your name is that finding a good natural bar of soap for men was like searching for bigfoot!  I'm just glad that I've found you guys!  I've been using Sasquatch for several months now, with my only complaint being that I would continue to have to reorder whenever I ran out, and wait for it to ship (I'm a bit of a procrastinator).  I would then be stuck using non-natural products (or going no showers) until my new sasquatch was being delivered.  Soapscriptions that problem away!  I splurged for the Deluxe, and my first shipment of 8 bars came in today and it was like Christmas morning!  I officially threw out my back-up non-natural bars knowing that the next shipment will come before I run out.  Now I just need to keep my visitors from stealing my Sasquatch stock!
And awesome packaging

I received a bar of Sasquatch in a box from Bespoke Post and was instantly impressed with it. It left me feeling cleaner than my old body wash, smelled better and was all natural. I instantly ordered three more bars for home use. If buying I would recommend ordering a soap saver to help the bars last longer. Otherwise, great product!

review_title: I like it, my son likes it and my wife likes it.
review_content: It smells nice lathers great and everyone in the house likes it.
The gift box was great, I love this soap and will be buying more the the future! Great stuff!
Sasquatch Deep Sea Goat's Milk soap smells great and lathers well.  It is easy to hold on to and doesn't dry out the skin.  Very nice.

Besides a soap I actually feel better using.  Yesterday, a co-worker came up to me yesterday and said "You smell more manly today..".  While taken aback, it was a testament to the length that the scent lasts.  It was still working at the end of a work day.
I absolutely love this soap, the scent is great and my girl really likes it!
Love the soap. Smell and lather is great, especially for a guy. Doesn't dry the skin out either.
I like the scents offered, including this one.  They all lather nicely and none so far have been girly smelling.  I'll be ordering more from this company, for sure.
Lovely scent that invigorates you. The ladies like it too!
Subtle clean smell. Doesn't dry out my skin, so far I have liked every scent I've tried!
Very happy!

So thrilled that we discovered this soap. Sasquatch soap liberates you from the need to hop out of the shower and moisturize right away.  It is truly the best soap we have ever used and it smells delicious!!
Pine Tar has a great scent and is a high quality product.  Would definitely recommend.
This soap is awesome.  It lathers well, feels hefty in the hand, and leaves you feeling clean and refreshed without the tight, dry feeling I always get from other bar soaps.
So I tried the Gold Moss Scrub, and really like it! Just ordered 3 more. Long lasting, smells good without being overly aromatic, and just works!

Excellent smell!  It leaves my skin smelling awesome,but not so powerful it competes with cologne.  This was my first experience with "boutique" soap and I am hooked!  Exfoliant a little too mild for my liking, but it is listed as "gentle".  Bar is currently on track to last me about a month of 1 shower a day use.
I loved it! this didn't fail to impress
I love the smell, I love the bits of grain in the bar that do an amazing job exfoliating, lathers up great, my only complaint is the scent doesn't last as long as I would like.
The scents are fantastic and the soap leaves my skin feeling clear but not dry. Great product, even if a bit pricey. Would definitely think about a subscription
Love the soap, still waiting to receive it. Will review again once I get the shipment.
Best soap ever.
I ordered three bars of the pine tar and love it. Can't recommend it enough. My epidermis is thanking me.

My fiancee likes the smell of this soap, and so do I. I like the exfoliating aspect of it, though it's a bit too rough for every day use. I supplement with other soap. Still, Pine Tar is my favorite go-to soap.
Love it!
Smells so fresh! Love it!!
Exceeded expectations. Great soap that does what it needs to without losing the fact that you still wanted a real bar of soap.

I don"t know if Bigfoot is for real, but Sasquatch Soap is a real natural soap for real men. The smell of pine tar soap in the morning is like the smell of cleanness and healthy skin. It bring out the beast in me. Long live Sasquatch Soap.

If I had to describe this soap in one word: Creamy. This soap is how I imagine buttermilk would feel if it made you clean instead of tasting good. Bonus: It has a very mild scent and is so nice even the lady sasquatch digs it.
This is a very high quality soap ..... Nice clean scent and exfoliates. I would highly recommend trying.
I love the stuff..
I like the soap but my cigar box came broken.  I wrote an email asking for assistance and didn't get a response.
I love the product! Keeps me smelling fresh longer than other soaps, and the scents are amazing!
I love the smell of this soap. Highly suggest you try it, if you haven't already.
Love the soap. It makes me look forward to showering instead of just another thing to cross off my to do list.
but my husband came out of the shower with a cut under his arm. apparently some of the exfoliating stuff was too big and ripped him right open. Sand that stuff down, guys!
Great Smelling soap; it also leaves my skin feeling nice and refreshed.
The soap is amazing.
The sample didn't do the trick!! I had buy more!! Love it
The squatch is the only soap i use.  I'm using the rum now but also had a sample of pine tar from birchbox.  Both are great and I have 3 different bars that I can't wait to use

Smells great. Woodsy and manly. The only downside is that it's slightly abrasive on the skin. Maybe after a few more uses my skin will "man up" and be able to handle the exfoliation. I will purchase again.

review_title: Just buy it, you won't regret it
review_content: You won't need another soap after smelling this wonderful scent.

The cigar box and packaging was gorgeous, but ya know, in a rough and stuff, manly kind of way. The soaps smell rugged and outdoorsy in the best way possible and my boyfriend always says it never leaves his skin feeling dry. I would buy this gift set again in a heart beat.
testing
This is probably my favorite soap of the bunch.  The scent is great and not overpowering.  Great lather.
There isn't too much to say. The soap smells great, the price is reasonable, the shipping was fast. Thank you!
Made my room smell good just sitting in the box
Hair, body, face no drying. No more shampoos and conditions. Bought the golden moss and bay rum. So far the moss scent is my favorite. Well played, great product!
Love this soap...and it makes a great gift.  Sent gift boxes to two of my brothers--both of whom were ecstatic.
Pine is an evergreen, and its tar smell is suitable for all evergreens, even the madrone. Cleans 'em up real well, too.
Definitely will be buying this scent again.

I bought the soap saver to save my soap.  It is saving my soap this very instant.  It is smaller than it appears in the pictures.  There is a faint pine smell that reminds me of pine trees.  My beef with the triple S is that the soap sticks to it when it dries. This might stop after a while. I will continue to use the soap saver despite all of this. I really like the soap.  I think it softens my skin and leaves me with the perfect amount of moisture.
My bathroom actually smells amazing all the time now, because of this fragrant soap.
This soap is great! It smells awesome and leaves my skin feeling refreshed. I received it in Bespoke's Box of Awesome and will buy it again for sure.

I picked up the gift box. I can't think of a product I've been as please with the presentation of. The cigar box was great, Rocky Patel "the edge"(a personal favorite too). The soaps smell great, work great, look great. I mean its just soap, but this is some pretty freaking awesome soap. Will definitely be buying some more of these boxes for friends as gifts, can't think of a single guy who wouldn't like it. Also the Pinetar soap? Yeah, epically good.

Strong smell and rough exfoliants.  Perfect for the manly man.  Smells like a walk through the woods, except it gets you nice and clean.  

Also if you have psoriasis or eczema, this will help your skin out a lot!

Its handy to have, but is basically a routered section of 2x4. For some reason I thought it would be different. Pretty over priced for what it is. I do still love the soaps and packaging, but $6 for a $0.50 piece of pine that got run through a routing table for 20 seconds? Ouch.
It was smaller than the bar of soap and pretty light. I was expecting it to have more weight and to be bigger than the soaps. I think it will do it's job just fine though.

Pine tar is my new faverite soap. Smells great and makes my skin feel awesome. I wanted to try it before I went hunting ( I usually use scent blocking soap) and it worked great. Don't have to worry about covering up my scent anymore.

Pine tar is my faverite soap, it smells great and makes my skin feel awesome. I wanted to try it before I went hunting ( I usually use scent blocking soap) and it worked great. Don't have to worry about covering up my scent anymore.
I love this soap. Smells great without being obnoxious.
The shipping took a little but everything was perfect the soap was great my friends even complmented how nice it smelt
Sasquatch Soap is amazing. The smell and texture are great.
Thevsoap was more than expected
Love the scent, gets me clean without leaving any residue.

An excellent soap with a refreshing scent without overpowering the senses. It suds well and may now be my favorite soap. The overall all quality is way ahead of the competition. Thanks for a great product.

Loved soaps but the only thing that it doesn't last long. I would like to see them last more then a week. But overall nice product. I was woundering if you have any more products like the pine tar which exfoliates great.
This soapscription is great all the soap I need plus extra to share with my friends and even my lady uses the aloa. This soap is amazing!

I like everything about this soap! The smell is pleasant, and the pine tar helps especially with the dry skin under my beard. The oatmeal provides an excellent exfoliant, and it does not dry out my skin at all! Thank you Sasquatch for your awesome customer service and craftsmanship!
Good, it has a great scent and gets me clean as a regular bar of soap.  It is nice
I bought them for gifts.
My skin has never fault softer and women have never stopped to smell me so frequently or seductively as they do now that I use Sasquatch Soap.
The products are great and smell amazing. Even better was the customer service and prompt shipping of the products that I ordered!

It smells like a pine forest and the scent stays on you for at least 12 hours. I can shove my nose onto my arm and still smell the awesomeness. The oatmeal feels like a loofa on your skin and scrubs away all the dirt.
The Sasquatch gift boxes are the greatest items for the Holidays.  Attractively boxed and sjuper presentation. p[acke

The gift box is great. It was shipped promptly and was packaged really well in a bubble wrap envelope inside of a shipping box. The cigar box is a really nice touch. The outside of the box even smells like cigars! But when you open the box, you get the great aromas of the soaps. I got Pine Tar, Gold Moss Scrub, Citrus Cedar, and Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt, all of which smell great! I will definitely be ordering more soap and trying other scents when I run out of these.

Gold Moss Scrub smells great after its first use, meaning its a little strong upon arrival but that is to be expected (its not a complaint). It cleans really well and as an added bonus, it keeps the bathroom smelling a little bit better.

I will be stocking up on this resource!

Thanks Sasquatch!
Absolutely love both the Eucalyptus Yogurt and Pine Tar soaps I received. I will definitely be purchasing them again.

I love the smell of this soap. It makes my whole bathroom constantly smell like a forest. It scrubs well, and I also received compliments on the smell from a certain pretty lady who showered with me recently. How can you go wrong?
Great soap.  Suds up quick and smells great.

What a great soap.  Usually don't care what soap I use and never been hooked on a soap before.  That has changed with the Squatch!  I won't use another type again.  I bought every scent and even my son is hooked and will only use this soap.  Great outdoor, fresh scents to choose from.  Keeps my bathroom, gym bag and closet where I store it smelling great.  Truly love it!
I bought it for a Christmas gift so I'm not sure how it feels yet but it smells great!

review_title: Borderline false advertising on soap saver.
review_content:
The soap was great.  The soap saver was a joke.  The picture online makes it look like the soap saver is nearly as big as one of the bars of soap, when in reality it is much smaller.  The picture online shows a three-ridge, square soap saver when the actual soap saver is just a narrow, two-ridge piece of wood.  Also, the picture online shows that the bottom of the soap saver is flat, when in reality it has ridges on both sides.  This makes it difficult for me to place it on the wire mesh shower caddy I had planned on using it on as the ridges go through the wire.  

I will continue to buy soap from you guys because I really like the gold moss soap, but you should either get soap savers that resemble the online pictures or stop selling them because I cannot imagine anyone has a postive reaction when they receive the JV version of the soap saver you are currently shipping out.
I have started to use the soap savers and they really help make the soap last even longer as well as keep it from sliding from the side of the shower. So glad I bought them!
I really like the Gold Moss Scrub soap. I live in a very cold, dry climate and have found that the soap leaves my skin moist and fresh. I love the way my shower smells!
Excellent packaging. Smells amazing.
It's awesome
Great scent!
It's smells great the guys I bought it for don't get it till Christmas though.
I bought the gift box for my boyfriend - His immediate favorite was Bay Rum, mine was the Aloe.
Very nice. Great Christmas present

I love the gift box!  The cigar box adds a unique touch.  It was packaged neatly with all the soaps inside.  Everything arrived in tact and within the stated delivery time.  The only reason for the four stars instead of five is that I requested a soap that I did not get.  I wanted Gold Moss Scrub and instead I got Cool Fresh Aloe.  Was a little disappointed in that.  But overall, very satisfied!

I got the cigar box because I wasn't sure where to start with trying the soaps.
The first one I got to use was Pine Tar. I loved the Oatmeal in it, something that I wish every bar had. 

I got a soap saver with mine. Something that didn't seem to be mentioned in the description and made my individual purchase of one redundant.

Loved the soap! Nice scent, not too overpowering, and really recommend the scrub. However it seems to melt really fast. Even to the side in the shower and on a soap saver I couldn't get a week out of a bar.
I tried the entire line and loved them all! Great product, effective, amazing scents.

review_title: Great for skin, but do not apply directly to balls
review_content: This stuff is awesome. I can actually feel the oatmeal ripping the skin off of my body, and it makes me feel like a man. A man that exfoliates. With this in mind, don't try scrubbing your balls with it directly unless you're one of those weird dudes that likes the feeling of sandpaper on his thrill drill. It's probably the strongest smelling soap I've ever used, but that's a good thing - I don't wear cologne usually, so this pretty much has me covered. 9/10, would scrub again. But not my balls.

Bought the gift box for my brother which he loved along with the soap holder.  Everything about the gift box is great my brother was really surprised! (tough to do)  The only thing I wish Sasquatch Soap Co would do is include a gift note who its to and from, other than that Sasquatch Soap is a real find for gifts and soap products.

I love this soap. I got it with my Bespoke box earlier this month. It smells great, has very good ingredients, treats my skin well, and makes my bathroom smell really good. I'll be buying another bar for sure.

My boyfriend has become obsessed with Sasquatch's Pine Tar soap but we found he was going through it very fast. I purchased the soap saver to try and extend the life of his soap and he has noticed his Pine Tar bars are lasting a bit longer, maybe an extra week or so. 
It is much smaller then the picture leads you to believe, actually about have the size of the square bars of soap themselves, but it still works great!
Bought several gift boxes because I have used their soap for several months now and I love it.  The cigar boxes are a nice touch!

I bought this for my brother. We always buy things with silly names and since were from Ohio where Squatching became famous I thought this was perfect! The soap is great quality and has such a great scent! I will more than likely buy this again next Christmas!

Just got my first bar of soap (went with Pine Tar) in the mail the other day. I've only used it a couple of times, but I really like it so far. It leaves my skin feeling clean and healthy. I feel good about cleaning my skin with natural products instead of questionable (at best) chemicals. My girlfriend likes the smell a lot. She says she can tell its there, but it isn't overpowering at all. And really, who else do I need to ask? Great job, Sasquatch!
The soap is great.
It's a little small compared to the soap but other than that I have no complaints.
Loveeeeee! Amazing gift for all the amazing men in your life!
Great gift for those special men in your life!! Getting them all fresh and clean clean!

review_title: If you like it rough and dirty, this is your soap
review_content: You have to have tough skin to use this soap. It is rougher than any soap I have ever used, I swear it seems like gravel is imbedded in the soap. Also, the wife complained about the black streaks in the shower, due to the soap being black. Guess I didn't rinse the shower enough!
I never received it
amazing scents!  These were gifts for "men" on my Christmas list.  Perfect gift!
wonderful soap...great product
Awesome Pine Tar soap.
I'm excited to give this to my husband! The customer service was great when I asked a question. I received a response to my question withint the day which was really nice.
amazing scents! absolutely perfect gift for all the males on my shopping list!  Great value for money, great quality.  I will reporder!
Got this for my brother for christmas and although he hasn't used it yet the scent is amazing! I'm already trying to find someone else to give it to because it's so good.
Top notch service and the soap is amazing.
This soap is great!  Nice smell that isn't too strong.  The exfoliant can be a little rough when the soap is new, but it isn't that big of issue.
This soap is great for my beard. It has all the essentials a healthy beard needs and not to mention the wife really loves the after smell.

I've used regular bar soaps in the past, none compare to the quality and manly scent collection squatch has to offer.
thanks squatch 
Keith from Ohio
p.s.
keep squatching

I bought 5 bars (pine tar, cedar citrus, gold moss, deep sea goat's milk, spearmint basil) and I can hardly pick a favorite, they all smell amazing. I bought it for my boyfriend but ended up using it myself as well, I swear it is fighting my dry winter skin better than my lotion. Huge fan, thanks!
I have tried the Moss soap and now the Bay Rum. Love them both. Up next is the Pine Tar. That will probably be my favorite.
It not only smells great but is very moisturizing, love it!

The soaps are awesome. the best. 

Disappointed with the gift cigar box. Not at all like the advertisement. Because of this, it will be a 4 star rating.

I bought the gift box of soaps as a Christmas present for my boyfriend. He loved it, and was charmed by the cigarbox it came in as a treasure trove for his little goodies. I'll keep buying soaps from you as presence in the future.

Soap was great, but box it was presented in was not as depicted in the ad. Cigar box I received was very disappointing. The box liner was ripped and the box exterior had several deep gashes. When this was brought to sasquatche'a attention he offered a full refund. Accidents happen, so I'm hoping the next order will be successful.
Love it!!!

I ordered a Pine Tar bar in one of my boyfriend's Bespoke Post boxes and he absolutely LOVES it! I now I add the bar to every Bespoke Post box AND have ordered extra on the Sasquatch site. I love the way it makes him smell, and so does he. He's a pretty active, outdoorsy type of guy so this scent is perfect for him, yet still smells clean and fresh. I've also noticed a difference from the oatmeal exfoliates in the bar. His skin is smoother and softer, while still smelling like a man. He refuses to use any other soap now! LOVE this stuff!
The soap itself is great. The smell is forest like with a little sweetness to it. The only problem is its doesn't last more than two weeks. For the price that's not good.
I got this for my Dad for Christmas and he LOVED it!

review_title: Extremely pleased with my first order!
review_content:
Words can't describe how pleased I am with my recent order. I selected the cigar box with 4 soaps, as a gift for my husband.
I received the order within days of placing it. The presentation was perfect and the soaps smell fantastic! 
We are very pleased with our purchase and can't wait to try the soaps out.

I received a bar of Gold Moss Scrub in a Bespoke Post Box and loved it. I bought a couple more as Christmas gifts for my dad and brother-in-law and it was a big hit with them too! Who knew a bar of soap could make a great gift? I'm considering the subscription service for myself now. Thanks 'Squatch for being awesome!
Love it. I use it for everything to include washing my hair. Love the smell and may never use another soap!
I have been very impressed by this soap.  It lathers great and is wonderful for my beard.  Great fragrance as well.  I would highly recommend this soap and I look forward to trying more.

review_title: Great, outstanding, but a little expressive.
review_content: Hands down, the best smelling and feeling soap I have ever used. Just a bit expensive.

review_title: Love the soap and the box but no gift card available
review_content: I sent out a gift box and while the recipients loved it, there was no way to include a gift note or hide the receipt from them.
The soap smelled really weird and not at all what I expected.

review_title: Great smelling soap, but doesn't last very long.
review_content: I love this soap. It cleans well and smells phenomenal. Only downside is that it doesn't last long.
This is a great soap, keeps you smelling clean and fresh all day.
True man smelling soap!
Great balance. Not overwhelming but a nice touch. Wish it were a little more exfoliating, but I knew that would be the case bc it was in the description.
Excellent smell and leaves me feeling clean and smooth
The pine tar smell amazing. I don't know if it's me, but the bars ware down pretty quick.
Purchased for our son, who is a Sasquatch fan. Seems to be great soap. Smells clean and manly.
Given as a gift to my father, but he constantly raves about the soap - so does my mom.
I tried most of them this one didnt do the job for me i gave three stars because the company is good overall
I'm currently using the gold moss scrub and its excellent! Smells great and feels great. Helps with the itch....I have pine tar on hand after the gold moss is gone. Great results so far
MAN SOAP

Great product and good smelling soaps. 

Perfect for all of my nasty smelling guy friends.

review_title: Nice soap, but not my favorite
review_content:
I like the feel of the soap and it didn't dry my skin out too bad like some bar soaps, but I was not crazy about the fragrance. To me, the smell was a bit to sweet and not very manly. I expected a more woodsy, Christmas tree smell, but to me it just smelled like spearmint chewing gum. Not really my cup of tea. 

If you like the woodsy, earthy scent and prefer a more manly aroma, I recommend jumping strait to the Pine Tar soap. That is one of my favorite soaps I have ever used. Highly recommend!

I bought the soap as a christmas gift for my older brother and hr seemed to love the scents and his girlfriend really liked the deep sea goats milk scent too as did just about everyone who smelt them.
Love the Pine Tar Bar. Its exfoliating, doesn't leave any residue, gets me clean and SMELLS FANTASTIC! Will keep buying.
Smells great! Leaves the beard feeling soft. No itch...excellent product. I want to eat it but its not consumable! Good stuff
This is great stuff

I first received a bar of this soap through Bespoke, and I had not used bar soap in a long time. But I got hooked by the great smell. I have since bought a soapscription so I can keep the good smelling soap coming!
Love the Pine Tar soap. It's very refreshing and leaves my skin feeling super clean. I've suggested it to all my buddies. All and all I love all your products.

I feel Pine Tar is too abrasive to use everyday unless you have a "dirty job" and need that kind of cleaning power. I put it away and use it after working on my car or after a long day working in my yard.
Just started using the pine tar today, man i love the smell of that bar :)

review_title: Not as good as Pine Tar.
review_content: I liked the smell and everything, but not as much as I love Pine Tar.
Very Good Smell
the more i use this the more i love it....i heard George Brett wanted some too....(sorry, had to)
Incredible aroma without being overpowering. Subtle, masculine, and long lasting product. One bar lasts me a month (used 2x a day) when I use the wooden soap dish and lather with a body sponge.

Must confess, I bought the gift box for myself.  Love the soaps!  The Pine Tar smells amazing, and the Cedar Citrus is right behind it.  I'll be getting more of those two.  And the wooden cigar box looks totally cool sitting out on the workbench.  Totally worth it imho!

I love this company,but I don't quite understand how the subscription service helps save money. If soap is $6 a bar and the subscription sends you a bar a month for 8 dollars, why wouldn't I just buy a six dollar bar every month?
Wicked presentation of the soap in a lovely cigar box! and the soap smells amazing!

when my packaged arrived I could smell the soap through the package and I knew it was going to be amazing, took a hot shower and rubbed my sexy body down with it and man I smelled like a human orange.
I received a bar of Sasquatch Soap (Gold Moss) from Bespoke post and I'm hooked. Just purchased 3 more bars. I purchased 3 different scents and one is better than the other.
Great smell, awesome soap!

review_title: Pretty decent product but not sure it's worth the money.
review_content: I really like the soap, the smell is great, and the concept behind the 'SoapScription' is pretty smart as well. But I've tried 3 different bars so far, and they don't seem to last very long. I get about 7-10 days use out of them before they crumble apart. I just can't justify spending ~$6 (+shipping) a bar for a week/week and a half's worth of use.
This soap has a great outdoorsy scent and leaves my skin feeling fresh.
It is a great soap but the shipping costs just as much as one bar of soap...

For the Christmas season, I bought a few bars of soap from Sasquatch Soap Co.  Spearmint Basil Scrub is the first soap I'm trying.  

I have hard water so I'm used to the dryness and 'clean feeling'.

I thought I'd give the soap a generous try before commenting.  It does have some moisturizers.  It leaves a very light scent if any at all.  It's not a long lasting scent.  "Scrub" is not a characteristic I would have included in the product description.

IMHO this soap is not for me.  I was not wowed by this soap

review_title: I like this soap A LOT
review_content:
I just started using this soap a week ago.  

I have hard water and I'm used to it.

It has a strong scent and it has serious hang time.  Even my bath towels has this scent now.  It doesn't have a whole lot of moisturizers.  It smells like 65% citrus 35% cedar-ish.  The cedar smell is what lasts long.

I would buy this soap again.

My husband is a HUGE fan of the soap but I was disappointed in the gift box because I was expecting a more rustic box that matches/resembled the soap's style or picture. Instead it was sent in a velvet covered modern-looking cigar box. No big deal but I was disappointed as was he (it was a gift for his birthday). I would recommend the soap but definitely not the gift box set. He's ordered the soap before and loved it....I was just hoping for something equally appealing when I got him the box gift.
My husbands favorite scent & mine too!! He's in love with his soap!
dss

I originally tried this item as a sample from Birchbox Man.  I enjoyed the soap so much that I ordered the full size along with two other types.  The smell is very rich and strong, but isn't overwhelming after use.  You won't walk around all day smelling like a pine tree.  I'm a big fan of the exfoliants that are in the soap as well.  I like this product a lot and feel like it spices up my normally boring morning ritual.

I recently ordered four bars. The Gold Moss, Bay Rum, Pine Tar, and Cedar Citrus. They all have a distinct and good scent, but I'd rank them in the same order as listed. Gold Moss is special. I seriously want everything to smell like that. If there was Gold Moss deodorant, or cologne, I'd have to have it! I highly recommend it.

Ordered the 9 bar soapscription, the order got skewed a bit but was made right by squatch jack, anyway, i tried the gold moss scrub, bay rum and cedar citrus...while i like them all, the Pine Tar is THE BEST...you might want to get a dark washcloth as the soap does leave black (and we all know what happens when you put black on light colors)....i completely LOVE the smell of this, and the exfoliate properties are amazing...i used to get problem areas on my elbows, not any more, i LOVE THIS SOAP......oh yeah....the wife loves the smell of it on me too :) :)
Great products

Big fan of Sasquatch Soaps in general and Gold Moss is our go to smell. Not over powering, but smells really good. My husband loves it, feels manly using something called Sasquatch, and as his wife I love the way he smells. Win win for all! 
Highly recommend the Sasquatch Soap company in general. Fast service, great packaging and great products.
Haven't had a chance to use it, but it smells great and I'm looking forward to using it when we hit warmer weather and I need to give my skin some relief from the sun.
Soap smells great and leaves you feeling clean!

My husband loves it! I love it too. I want to order more bars to put around the house instead of air freshener and candles. Problem is, I love all the scents we received. I would have a hard time choosing. Will be a returning customer.
...without feeling like a tree.  A great soap that smells clean and fresh, but doesn't dry you out like most deodorant soaps.
Refreshing and doesn't dry out skin.. Smells really good!
Order arrived in a timely manner well packaged . My Husband loved the gift box and all the soaps!!
This soap smells amazing!  Subtle notes or sweetness and spice leave me smelling like an Ivy League gentleman.  I need to start smoking a pipe and collecting leather bound books.

review_title: Great soap-wouldn't recommend buying the box gift set
review_content: My husband loves the soap & rightfully so...smells awesome! I was disappointed in the box that came with the gift set. I was led to believe it would either be wooden (like in the picture) or at least rustic looking--like the soap. Instead, it arrived in a black velvet modern-looking cigar box. I was bummed but even more so when I gave it to my husband for valentines day & he said "oh I love the soap! But dang, I was hoping I'd get the wooden box like in the picture!" (He'd been talking about it--that's why I purchased it.) Anyway, I'd recommend the soap but buy your own cigar box if you want the gift to be perfect or what you/he expects!
This made a super gift for a guy buddy who has a nose for scents!

Another wonderful scent from Sasquatch Soap. I must admit that this is one of the stronger scents, but in a good way. Its light and refreshing and more spearmint than basil, but you can definitley smell the basil too. Love it!
My fiancé loved the soap and plans on buying more! Shipping was so fast too :)
Although I haven't started using the cedar citrus yet, I have used just about all of the others.  I can't imagine it being anything other than awesome.

Hands down the best soap in the world. Ive tried quiet a few different types and ive never been this happy with soap. I didnt think soap could make me this happy. But it did. Dont forget to use some sort of moisturizer or lotion as sometimes it might dry you out.
This is what a man is supposed to smell like.
I first found out about Sasquatch soap thru my Birchbox and I couldnt be happier with this product.
The cigar box that these came in was a nice touch to already awesome smelling soap!
Doesn't have a lasting scent.
I ordered a gift box for my Dad who lives overseas, after a quick email exchange with the company to verify the APO address they were happy to mail it (which most companies aren't). Thank you!
The Bay Rum Soap is amazing. It is refreshing, manly and sophisticated. It makes me want to grab a pipe and a copy of 'Moby Dick'.
Been a customer since getting a bar in the bespoke post box. VERY happy (pine tar is my new favorite). Now if only they made a soap travel case.......
Every show is a delight and I love the smell it leaves. Very subtle but still very nice.

review_title: Great addition to my Barber Salon
review_content: Got shipment in while I had a client in chair.to him about the soaps. He had me unpack the box so he could buy 5 bars and wanted more but decided he had to restrain himself.

I ordered the Pine Tar and Gold Moss Scrub scents. The first I opened and now actively using; it smells great, lathers and cleans really well and has a great scent that you wouldn't find in other soaps. The other sits on the shelf in place of the "smell goods" because it smells better. Can't wait to use it.
Smells and feels great. Never leaves my skin feeling dry. Sometimes I can smell a light sent on my shirt even after a full day. Great product!
My dad said he liked it.
Best way to wake up and get ready for your day. A wonderful blend of light and classic cedar sent and citrus to add freshness. Perfection in bar.
Doesn't last very long. Not worth the $11 per bar
Great product but expensive at $11 with shipping for 1 bar.
This soap is awesome & smells great too! I highly recommend this product. Cheers!
Buying more as we speak.
Just shipped it to my son (in the Navy), he requested it.  Will let you know when he uses it.  Thanks
Its like Ron Swanson gave me a hug and just aenough of his aura rubed off on me.

Bought this for my boyfriend for Valentines Day after he got a free Sasquatch soap with another present and refused to use it b/c it smelled so good. It came is a really high-quality wooden cigar box with a variety of awesome-smelling soaps. He told me it was "the most thoughtful gift" I ever gave him, which seemed odd to me, but I'll take it.
This is by far the best soap I have used in my whole life. Smells great and makes me feel invigorated
Ordered the gift pack in the cigar case.  Case was destroyed upon arrival.  So repackaged and given in a gift basket.  Soaps smell very nice and have been told they are nice.

Look no further. This is a soap that's all natural, no too expensive, gets you clean, and smells great. Highly recommend. 

Pine is the "strongest" of the bars in my opinion as far as scent and exfoliation is concerned. Could be harsh in the skin if you are not used to a tough bar like this (exfoliation wise not chemical wise). Just a heads up.
I love the long lasting scents and variety offered.
Amazingly refreshing and very earthy.
When the ladies come over, the smell of the Pine Tar makes their clothes fall off.
Smells absolutely amazing. I almost didn't give it to my boyfriend because I wanted to leave it in my kitchen as an air freshener.

IT EXFOLIATES YOUR SKIN SO HARD THAT YOU DISCOVER LUMBERJACK MUSCLES UNDERNEATH AND AN UNSTOPPABLE URGE TO CHOP DOWN TREES. IT SMELLS SO MUCH LIKE PINE THAT OTHER SOAP YOU ORDER ALSO SMELL LIKE PINE (AT FIRST, IT WILL WASH AWAY). IT'S BLACK AS TAR BUT RINSES WELL AND MAKES ENTIRE ROOMS SMELL LIKE A FOREST AND IT'S JUST PLAIN WONDERFUL.

Bought 4 different soaps and the first one I tried was Pine Tar. And the first soap I'm asked to review is Pine Tar. Creepy guys, real creepy. Anyway I was introduced to this product line through Bespoke Post. Fell in love with the soap and have been wanting to try others. Love the scent of this soap. Only draw back is the soap is black. It WILL discolor light washcloths but I replace the one I use once a month so I don't mind. It's a man's soap, but leaves a nice scent for the ladies. Well worth the price.
dont get it near your eyes! itall burn. but i love the soap love the ingredients, ill be buying another one in the future.
Soaps great ! Smells good and doesn't dry your skin out like most soaps . Highly recommend this soap
My new favorite soap! It smells amazing!!!
Best soap that ive found in a l ok ng time.
I would prefer a little more of the coarse bits in the soap, and a little smaller size. love most everything about this soap, except for how long it lasts? mine disappeared very very quickly
awesome.
I enjoy the exfoliant this soap provides quite a bit. It leaves a black gunk on the places it's say but it is easy to clean!
Must buy more!

This soap is great. Not overwhelming with the scent, but you know that it's there. Doesn't dry out the skin and the best part is that it does this while being all-natural and reasonably priced. Will continue to order and try out new scents.

review_title: I don't always use soap, but when I do...
review_content: The pine tar soap is a black rectangular prism of freshness. Not just fresh smelling, but the soap itself is fresh, hand cut by my friends at the Sasquatch Soap Co.

I stumbled upon Sasquatch soap on the internet while trying to research the Skunk-Ape himself. What an awesome discovery! I ordered three bars of Bay Rum soap and love it so much I plan on placing another order soon. The thing that surprised me the most about Sasquatch Soap was that even though it was bar soap, it didn't leave my skin feeling tight and dry. This is reason enough for me to use this product. I'm a Squatchie for life!
This soap didn't last more than a week for me. Maybe its due to hard water in my area but $6 for a week of soap. No Bueno. Smelled good while it lasted though, I will say that.
Non drying VERY moisturizing soap with a hint of cedar

It has been over a decade since I have used bar soap... and I'm a sucker for good branding and anything rum. Even though there isn't any rum in this bar of soap, I was pleasantly surprised at how great my skin felt after using it. So good, I made myself a drink after.
Particularly liked the eucalyptus yogurt bar. Just not personally a big fan of peppermint, but otherwise great stuff.

I bought the four soap gift box and it was definitely worth it. I'm still on the pine tar soap, which smells amazing, and look forward to using the others. My only minor criticism is they sent me a "double" of one of the soaps, which is not much of a big deal, but it would have been cool to experience all the scents offered by this fine company. Check it out and you will not regret it.
This is nice smelling, effective man-soap.
The first soap I used from my Soapscription. It's amazing and my girlfriend loves it and keeps getting close to smell me...ADDED BONUS!

Between boxing, jui-jitsu , running and lifting weights I shower allot. This soap is fantastic and doesn't damage my skin like chemical based soaps do. Buy it. Mrs. Sasquatch loves the smell and that's always a good thing.
This Badass Bar of soap was designed for anyone who wants the smell of the great outdoors in the comfort of their own shower. Only wish that the bar lasted longer. But it is worth every penny.
The pine tar is probably my favorite soap by this company. It smells like the woods

review_title: Best Soap I have ever had
review_content: Best Soap I have ever used, I have used just about every soap on the shelf none really make me feel clean but this really cleans me and smells sooooooo great I love it!

review_title: Almost perfect, but as it is, it's damn close
review_content: The improvement over the original soap saver gives the newer model a cleaner and more finished look. It's tremendously light-weight though, and I'd prefer something a bit heavier, perhaps having stainless steel bars running through the cross-section. Don't let that discourage you though, as far as soap savers go, this is one of the best options.

When I first opened the box I expected to be punched in the face by a pine tree, hoping someone finally got it right, but alas it was the same pine smell I am used to when you buy anything that is scented. Using the soap in the shower; I noticed it lathered well, exfoliated very well, cleaned up my flaky skin, but left a nice black soap scum trail from the soap shelf in the corner despite being out if the shower spray. The soap itself went extremely fast but I assume that is what you get when you don't want something factory made. Overall it was good soap but goes too quickly for my dollar to suds ratio.

Bought this for a friend who loves pine. The black kinda gets everywhere (according to him) and the pine smell doesn't last outside the shower. Bummer. Great quality, though. EXCELLENT customer service!
Loved the smell. Loved the lather. I wish the smell lasted longer. Like, at all. Smells great in the shower. I wanted it to last into the day.

Long story short: had a product issue (nothing that was anyone's fault) and was cared for on a Sunday morning and sent replacement Monday morning. They were friendly and understanding and professional. Did not expect to correspond with customer service on a Sunday. I am a firm believer that amazing customer service should be standard in every company. Sasquatch Soap Co. delivers. Even if I hated the product (which I don't) I would probably return simply because of the customer service. Keep. It. Up.

I'm in the healthcare field and as such come home with some pretty raunchy smells stuck in my nose. These soaps are the perfect amount of clean, manly and not overwhelming scents unequaled in wiping away the funk 'o the day. Thus far I've used pine tar, cedar citrus and gold moss and love them! If you're vacillating about trying Sasquatch take my advice- get it now!
I get in the shower and forget what I'm doing. It smells like a walk through an old pine forest with Scarlett Johansson.
Just what I was looking for in a bar of soap. Doesn't dry out my skin. All natural ingredients. Will definitely be a repeat customer.

I would have liked a bit stronger Pine scent(which is what I bought it for) but I smells almost like a normal bar of soap with a small hint of pine. The packaging was nice and I like the pumice scrub integrated into the bar. I would only buy it again if the recipe changed up to give a more pronounced pine scent.
I feel like I need to don Pirate apparel and head out to the sea after cleaning up with this soap. A very refreshing and long lasting scent. I think Captain Jack Sparrow would truly approve.
If you want to smell like a man and not like a sissy, get this soap! It also works well on my hair!
It's a clean I can't explain I've never been this clean I love it
Never felt so clean
Great soap aside from the fact that it pretty much shattered when I received it.
This soap smells like I imagine Kristen Stewart smells, in a good way. Super rich lather, and it doesn't destroy my skin. Probably the best soap I've used.
Smells ok

I have been looking for a more cost friendly soap to replace the exfoliating soap I had been using - which was over twice the cost of a bar of soap from Sasquatch. I have only used one of the three scents I got to sample, but so far I love it. It makes my skin feel clean, doesn't dry it out, and exfoliates well. So far my only complaint is that I can't get the soap to stop sticking to the soap saver!
Never known the power of goats milk. Now I do. Thumbs up all the wAy

This is the real deal. I did a "soapscription" so I still have three others to try, but this is, as one reviewer said, the best soap I've ever used. My water bill this month is going to be insane simply because I can't stop showering with this.
The soap smells amazing and the packaging is perfect! I'm yet to actually use them but cannot wait! I will definitely be ordering more!
Awesome, my husband smells so good!
This soap has to be the best smelling soap and you seriously feel so clean after, it's awesomeness!

I love the smell of this soap. I only wish the smell kept with my throughout the day. My only criticism is with calling it a scrub. When I hear scrub I tend to think exfoliating features, which I can't say I really notice in this product.
A default go to for me
One of my favorite scents! My husband and I both use it!
it is some great stuff i will be a returning customer
Good smell, great lather, easy to use
The exfoliation o. This bar is awesome and it smells like Christmas

I like sasquatch soaps, the scents are excellent. Soaps clean really well and i always feel clean when out of the shower, so far I've used Pine Tar, and spearmint basil scrub. The pine tar is a really aggressive exfoliation and can not be used every day, spearmint is less exfoliating and could be used daily, my only complaint with the soaps are they have both been a little bit drying with my skin. Don't really know what could be causing this? But overall good stuff, and i bought the gift box, comes packaged in a really cool cigar box. Will buy from again.
My coworkers noticed I switched up my soap. In a good way. It's a refreshing way to wake up in the morning.
Great soap love the scent.

This soap smells amazing. There is simply no other way to put this. When my order came in the mail I happened to run into the mail lady as she was dropping it off and she couldn't stop going on about how good my mail smelled! She was shocked when I told her it was soap. Long story short, I will always buy this soap from now on!
A very manly soap. Love it!
When you subscribe you don't pay for shipping- I believe that's the advantage and that's where you save money.
never received my item, its been 3 weeks- not sure what is going on?

I love your soaps, especially the Cool Fresh Aloe & Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt... this is the 1st time I tried the Spearmint, but did not get the scent I thought I might get... it is a great soap, just not my style.
Smells great

review_title: whole bathroom smells like the woods
review_content: I got this bar in my Fancybox. When I opened the box the smell was amazing. It got even better when I actually showered. The oatmeal scrub is great for exfoliating legs before shaving.
Exactly what we were looking for and Lea (2 years old) says it smells great! Suggestion for a soap : a kitchen soap with coffee beans that would eliminate food odor on our hands when cooking.

I'm not kidding. I'm not a fancy man when it comes to soap but Sasquatch soap is amazing. I actually feel clean and there's no filmy residue after the fact. Plus, they smell amazing. Golden Moss is by far the best one I've tried -- the smell lingers all day and the wife loves it. I mean she LOVES it. The cigar box the soap comes in as the "gift box" was an excellent touch. Great work! Great product.
It got here on at a good time and I would buy more because the service was great

review_title: Dr. Squatch is the true way to natural cleanliness
review_content: Bought the Pine Tar and Gold Moss Scrub and since using them I have felt a noticeably smoother skin feel and less dryness that I have gotten from using other soap brands. The roughness in the Pine Tar works as a great exfoliate and provides that wake-up kick in the shower each morning. I am a convert.
Love it - Will not do without it.
You will look forward to showering with this soap. The scent is ridiculous. When you couple that with the amazing exfoliation, there's no better soap.

review_title: Fine way to keep your soap
review_content: Love the smell of cider it gives off it and seems to help make my soap last longer.
Haven't used it yet. I am currently using cedar citrus
I have been using this product for more than a month and thus far can tell that it definitely does save the soap. My only complaint is that it is a bit expensive.
The pine tar soap is great! The scent is awesome and my whole bathroom now smells like pine. I recommend this product for everyone.
Best soaps I've ever used!
This one feels amazing on the skin with a mild and a scent that's there but not THERE
It smells beachy and summery but still smelling manly. It's awesome!

this soap is great. i no longer need shampoo either as it works for both without drying my skin (no more dandruff or beardruff!) My only wish was that it had more scent but plenty of their other soaps do so its a moot point.

review_title: Best soap that I have ever used!!!!
review_content: The girlfriend couldn't stop talking about how well I smelled...get it
You make good stuff. Trying the pine tar next.
The soap is great. Works without drying my skin out. The wife loves the smell. Will be ordering more again.

I didn't know what to think when I first came to this website, but was pleasantly surprised. I did not know what to think about getting my groomsmen soap as part of their gift, but they loved it. Seriously, one very cool unique gift.
The soap isn't as strong scented as it claims, also the black tar in the soap leaves the tub and towels black. Bar is really over priced.

We love this soap and the fact that it lathers nicely, smells fantastic but also rinses off so well (unlike so many other soaps on market that leave your skin with a soapy residue). Will repeat this purchase for sure, over and over!
This soap has a nice subtle scent. No overpowering scents you get from other 'Dialed' up or from the 'Springs' of the British isles. Well worth the price.

review_title: Very refreshing, wish the spearmint had a little extra zing to it.
review_content: The soap, like all the others, works. So there's three stars right there. The fourth star is due to it's mixture. The smell is what you'd expect, the basil mixes well with the spearmint. But as the review title states: I wish there was more mint. Mint can wake you up in the morning, which is what I need. That, or add some juniper to it. But overall: GREAT soap.
One of the best ones from Dr. Squatch. Really moisturizes and conditions your skin.
This scent is one of our faves! So refreshing!
Love this soap!

The cedar citrus has a nice and subtle scent. I mainly use it for shampooing my beard and it works great! Leaves my beard feeling soft and looking healthy. I will be buying more of these soaps in the future. Also the shipping was fast.
I work in th kitchen, the pine tar soap helps to scrub off the grease and cut through the food smells. And my smells.

Haven't tried all the soaps yet but so far, this one is my (and the girlfriend's) favorite. Definitely leaves you feeling clean and the scent stays with you subtly throughout the day. Either way, it is an excellent soap. I shower 2x a day from work and exercise and it has lasted for a month so far. Highly recommended and a top contender for best scent. Again, want to try the others but this one needs to run out first.

It even stripped a tick off my leg as I was washing. It might be the best to have a significant other wash your back with it. I kick like a dog.

review_title: Great soap, but not very scrubby
review_content:
I love the quality of this soap. It cleans well, lathers well and smells great. However, as a scrubbing bar it leaves much to be desired. Perhaps I received a bar from a batch where the scrubbing bits were not as evenly mixed, or there was a flaw in production. 
 
Also, while the soap does smell wonderful, the sharp scent of spearmint lasted only as long as the first shower. The basil scent lasted only a day or two longer. Both can still be smelled if one holds the soap to one's nose, but the bar and the lather really only have a vague, though pleasant, floral scent. 
 
Still, this is great soap. I very much like the way it cleans. I only wish it was as sharp smelling as it was when I opened the shipping package.
I was turned on to this soap by a friend who had told me about how much he enjoyed the pine tar soap. I ordered a bar and I was hooked. Very satisfied.
I've been slowly trying each soap from Dr. Squatch, the Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt is awesome, really makes you feel awake and refreshed

This spearmint basil bar simply smells amazing. It's got a very unique scent and is much different than the other bars. It smells of refreshing minty goodness with a basil roundhouse kick. Also, I could be crazy, but I believe the slight basil notes have been repelling mosquitos in my area. My favorite bar so far with only 3 more to try!

This spearmint basil bar simply smells amazing. It's got a very unique scent and is much different than the other bars. It smells of refreshing minty goodness with a basil roundhouse kick. Also, I could be crazy, but I believe the slight basil notes have been repelling mosquitos in my area. My favorite bar so far with only 3 more to try!
Manly

This was my first time using Pine Tar soap. After learning about the chemicals used in commercial products and their health effects, I decided to turn to a more natural solution. Squatch does a great job of listing the ingredients used, all of which I am comfortable with putting on my body, and comes in environmentally safe packaging. Double win! 
 
The consistency of the soap may seem unusual for first timers transitioning from commercial soap. Natural soap tends to break down easier, especially if you leave your bar of soap next to the bath tub or where it is constantly splashed by your shower, so make sure to keep it on your caddie if you plan on keeping it for long.

I can't say enough good about this product. It's, simply, the best. 
Wish you would offer an after shave/cologne or deodorant. Something that the scent would last longer. This is just a great product. I never write reviews. But, am writing one here, because, I really like this soap. It's the best. Hands down.

review_title: Great Man Soap for the Squatch in All of Us
review_content: I am always on the search for great products. I stumbled upon Dr.Squatch Soap Co. while searching on the internet and after some initial research, I decided to give it a try. I purchased two bars online: the Gold Moss Scrub and the Spearmint Basil Scrub. I was impressed with how clean these soaps made my feel in all the right man places. There was no residue left behind when I rinsed the soap off and no over the top smells. I felt rejuvenated from a long day at work, and felt like the soap helped scrub away unwanted dirt and sweat from my day. I will not shop in retail stores anymore now that I found this company.
Got the gift box for my boyfriend he loved it! Loved the cigar box, the soaps are great quality and then smell amazing.

review_title: I hate camping, but I love soap
review_content: Never before have I felt so manly. Well, there was this one time that I was wrestling an alligator, fell into an open volcano, was shot out into space where I got to eat space bacon with martians. Until I tried this soap, I never thought I could duplicate the testosterone rush that was an alligator/volcano/spacebacon orgy, but cedar citrus knocked it out of the park. Thanks.
Great site. Great service. Lightning fast delivery. Awesome soaps!!

$6/bar + shipping is quite an ask for a couple of bars of soap for a prospective customer. Perhaps an intro/noobie package is warranted? Otherwise, I haven't seen a huge difference over the cheaper store stuff. Just being honest. Respect for what you're doing though.

Recently bought the Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt. Not only does it keep my skin refreshed, but the smell is amazing. The Oatmeal in the bar is also beneficial for my Eczema issue. I believe in the Squatch, and you should, too!

bought it for my husband after we got it in a sampler box. He loved it. Tried it the other night on my face and it was awesome Doesn't leave your skin feeling dry like other soap brands. It's not ugly, it's grunge! This soap is metal as fuck!

Not only will you feel clean you will smell great a secondary bonus is that your bathroom will also smell like the outdoors. So far only used two out of the four bars that I ordered but I plan on getting more.

I ordered the pine tar bar and the Greek yogurt bar. Both are fantastic. I hve dry skin, and the yogurt bar actually dries my skin out less than other bars I've used....and idk if it's a coincidence, but every time I've showered with the pine bar, the ladies have given me a little more attention than normal :) I'll definitely be sampling every bar. Your products are great!
It was good.... at first it smells exactly like Lysol, but once you actually use it the smell cuts down a bit and is quite refreshing.

Have you ever watched a stupid Irish Springs commercial and some hairless, perfectly groomed wagon handle is all soaped up and takes a big orgasmic sniff of his bar of soap and you think, "who in the name of William Wallace would ever do that"?!?! THATS WHAT I DO WITH MY NEW SQUATCH SOAP! This isn't even a joke. I have literally caught myself standing in the shower and sniffing my soap harder than a 16 year old boy at a panty raid! I am a stereotypical male who doesn't enjoy the smaller things in life like soap... But I have no issues admitting that I am completely in love with this company and it's product! Long live the SQUATCH! Now only if they had t shirts and decals for my car window! ;-)
My absolute favorite!

I don't know if my bars were supposed to go in the "oops" pile but they most definitely do not come close to their advertised scent.
The smell is subtle and not overpowering but what I really love is the exfoliant. Will always use the Dr from now on.

review_content: The best pine soap I have ever used. Exfoliates without drying out my skin, good lather, buttery, not caustic. Love the sweet sting of the pine scent.

review_title: I guess I'm not man enough!
review_content: Just received my new bar of your PINE TAR SOAP. I am a 74-yr old business man and WAS a very outdoor person (hunting-competitive shooting-fishing-golf- drag-racing etc.... when younger), But, I guess I'm not quite man enough for your PINE TAR SOAP. You say STRONG and that is CORRECT. Too strong for me. I don't want to smell like a roof repair man that has been working with hot pine tar all day long. Patchouli-Sandalwood is more my thing. Thank you anyway.

Yummy soap! I'm obsessed!
Never received it : (

I am picky when it comes to bars of soap, when I recieved this in the mail. I fell in love with this brand and scent. I am pleased with the product. I liked how it came through the mail at scheduled timing. And it was reasonably priced. I am going to try more scents and keep buying this product.

The wooden soap dish I purchased for my Dr Squatch brand soaps is quite the feat of soap craftsmanship. it's simple design prevents the soap from be washed away by the moisture in my shower while also allowing enough air in to keep the soap from getting all nasty and oogy on the bottom. The fact that the dish is made of cedar wood keeps my shower smelling pleasant and refreshing when it steams up. it also keeps the flies out. And the termites. They buzz right off. The two complaints I have about the dish aren't a huge problem to me, but do keep it from being a five star knockout product. Whether it's the soap or the dish, all of my Dr. Squatch brand soaps (Pine Tar, Bay Rum, and Cedar Citrus) have a tendency to stick to the dish. It takes a bit to unstick the soaps, and occasionally I mar the bar. This next issue may be an issue of newness, but the dish tends to secrete a dark oil when it starts absorbing moisture. The oil hasn't stained anything, but it does discolor the soap and get all over the shower. 
 
Definitely a very good product, and one I would recommend to others. It does have those two issues however.

I bought a bar of the Pine Tar as a stocking stuffer for my hubby last Christmas and boy did I opened a can of worms. He has since purchased every bar since then at least three times. He loves them! I love how it makes him smell. Even better, I love how it makes my bathroom smell! Thanks Dr. Squatch!
works well at keeping the soaps dry and soap doesn't stick to wood. Very useful product.
This soap is the real deal. My whole bathroom smells amazing every morning and my skin has been thanking me ever since i received this item in the mail. Keep up the good work!
Great Soap! I wish they lasted a little longer...
Enjoy the aromatic soap and the oils that help moisterize my skin

I would sure love to give this product a review, but after more than 2 weeks since I placed my order and several emails back and forth, here I am still with no product.. Very disappointing service, considering they promise delivery in 2-3 days.

review_title: like an unholy evergreen lemon tree
review_content: smells wonderful and fresh and woodsy and tangy. very energizing in the morning. nice work boys, keep it coming.
New favorite soap!!!
manly scents for manly men.
i really enjoyed pine tar. its rough and tough and makes me think i am camping instead of showering in my apartment. very cool

Wow, after what seems like a lifetime of using body wash, I may have lost a part of my manhood, that rough gritty texture of Pine Tar made me love showering again. The scent carries with you nearly all day. So powerful this soap will clear your conscience and pretty much make you feel like a boss. Get ready for some epic exfoliation baby!

My son is so hard to buy for and the set of soaps (along with a couple of other gifts) were perfect for him. The packaging and the scents are wonderful. Looking forward to him enjoying this gift in the coming months. Would definitely by from here again.
Im definitely happy with the soap 5 stars. The shipping however was way longer that it should of been. I received my product about two weeks after I purchased.
Love the product! All the bars in the gift box are amazing! Keep on with the good work!

Gold Moss Scrub is my favorite soap I have ever used, by far. It not only makes me smell good, but the entire hall leading to my bathroom even smells like it. The shipping, however, took almost two full weeks. That was just a little too long for me and left me a little frustrated.
This soap is excellent! I haven't tried all of them yet, but my favorites so far has got to be the Pine Tar + Citrus Cedar! Thank you for keeping me smelling delicious!
Smells good and scrubs well. Skin seems to be better after using this bar!!
As a 350+ lb strongman this soap beats down all of my stank even through the hardest straining sessions.

Overall I really enjoyed this soap; the scent, the exfoliating oatmeal, very good stuff. However, the only thing that kept me from giving this bar five stars is the fact that the scent of the soap is SUPER STRONG when it's not in your body and just chilling in its natural bar state. Not a problem for me, but the wife didn't like it. Apparently it throws off the other scented items she puts around the house. Other than that, top notch soap.

Amazing clean feeling without drying out your skin. Super sudzy. Great smell. My only issue is how little soap you get for the price. Other than that, nice soap. How about a vanilla and oak or clove scent? Even a leather scent?
The product itself is great and I would continue to buy it for $6 a bar. The cost of shipping just makes this an unreasonable purchase. So, I won't be buying again.
my son loves this soap. He used one so much he went thru it in 10 days. The smell is very clean and pleasant. Will be ordering more.

I bought a bar of Pine Tar soap last year as a stocking stuffer for my hubby. He loved it so much, he has ordered the soaps several times over this past year, trying at this point all the fragrances. This year for Christmas, I got him one of each soap, a soap holder AND one of the new fragrances. Who's spoiled?

When I ordered Dr. Squatch soap and got to use it I was thinking outside the box to use something different. Dad's a traditional man and has always used the typical boring Old Spice as had I, until I used Dr. Squatch soap. Next thing I know I was missing a few of my soap bars from my giftbox and asked my dad where they went assuming he toke them. Being the man he is dad immediately admitted that he'd taken them cause they smelled so great.

review_title: amazing! perfect gift for any guy in your life!
review_content: Just got the 3 gift boxes I ordered, I was in awe opening the box. Each cigar box is different, super unique, & sturdy wood. I can't even pick a favorite they are so awesome. I couldn't help but open each & take a look (& sniff!) at the soaps, they smell amazing! :) Can't wait for Christmas morning to see the guys open them up. I will for sure be ordering again for any gifts I need. Thanks!
Real simple! If you like being and feeling clean, and feel smell as if youve been tackled by a team of pine trees, then buy this...
I purchased the Pine Tar soap with an open mind, but did not expect the perfect blend of scent and quality exfoliation! Not to mention the added perk of being 100% natural and nourishing!
Creamy, oaky, woodsy with a touch of sweet spice. Smell lasts long on the skin and the soap itself is a great moisturizer. Love it.

A little small for the price of the soap. Like the 
Scent but not all that amazing for the price. Will not be buying one again.
Just got my soap in the mail a week ago and I'm loving it! Will definitely order again!

It's expensive, yes. But it's most definitely worth the cost. The scent is the right balance of fragrant & manly, the exfoliation leaves my skin feeling twice as clean as any name brand soap, and it's simple/no frills design looks badass in my shower caddy. Will be showering with the Squatch for a while to come. But please lower the price/add discounts!
easu ordering. Good quality soap. If you want a high quality natural soap -- this is it. Just try it. You can't go wrong.
i had purchased a bar on a whim and now my fiancé is addicted!! He loves the scents and so do I ! :)
i was slightly disappointed with the way gold moss smelled. I guess I had too high of expectations for it.
It has not gotten here yet
I’ve been a soap user ever since I discovered my own body odor. Never used a square before. I’ll get used to it.

This was my first time using anything other than bodywash or mass-produced soap bars. 
 
Wow. 
 
I was pretty excited that the Gold Moss scrub left essentially no film. That was what drove me away from bar soap to begin with. 
 
Also, the smell. While not overpowering, I find myself walking around daily with the faint aroma of what I could only describe as 'the woods'. I no longer smell like a boring white guy...I smell like a man of the wilderness.
