I would have liked a bit stronger Pine scent(which is what I bought it for) but I smells almost like a normal bar of soap with a small hint of pine. The packaging was nice and I like the pumice scrub integrated into the bar. I would only buy it again if the recipe changed up to give a more pronounced pine scent.
I feel like I need to don Pirate apparel and head out to the sea after cleaning up with this soap. A very refreshing and long lasting scent. I think Captain Jack Sparrow would truly approve.
If you want to smell like a man and not like a sissy, get this soap! It also works well on my hair!
It's a clean I can't explain I've never been this clean I love it
Never felt so clean
Great soap aside from the fact that it pretty much shattered when I received it.
This soap smells like I imagine Kristen Stewart smells, in a good way. Super rich lather, and it doesn't destroy my skin. Probably the best soap I've used.
Smells ok

I have been looking for a more cost friendly soap to replace the exfoliating soap I had been using - which was over twice the cost of a bar of soap from Sasquatch. I have only used one of the three scents I got to sample, but so far I love it. It makes my skin feel clean, doesn't dry it out, and exfoliates well. So far my only complaint is that I can't get the soap to stop sticking to the soap saver!
Never known the power of goats milk. Now I do. Thumbs up all the wAy

This is the real deal. I did a "soapscription" so I still have three others to try, but this is, as one reviewer said, the best soap I've ever used. My water bill this month is going to be insane simply because I can't stop showering with this.
The soap smells amazing and the packaging is perfect! I'm yet to actually use them but cannot wait! I will definitely be ordering more!
Awesome, my husband smells so good!
This soap has to be the best smelling soap and you seriously feel so clean after, it's awesomeness!

I love the smell of this soap. I only wish the smell kept with my throughout the day. My only criticism is with calling it a scrub. When I hear scrub I tend to think exfoliating features, which I can't say I really notice in this product.
A default go to for me
One of my favorite scents! My husband and I both use it!
it is some great stuff i will be a returning customer
Good smell, great lather, easy to use

I like sasquatch soaps, the scents are excellent. Soaps clean really well and i always feel clean when out of the shower, so far I've used Pine Tar, and spearmint basil scrub. The pine tar is a really aggressive exfoliation and can not be used every day, spearmint is less exfoliating and could be used daily, my only complaint with the soaps are they have both been a little bit drying with my skin. Don't really know what could be causing this? But overall good stuff, and i bought the gift box, comes packaged in a really cool cigar box. Will buy from again.
My coworkers noticed I switched up my soap. In a good way. It's a refreshing way to wake up in the morning.
Great soap love the scent.

This soap smells amazing. There is simply no other way to put this. When my order came in the mail I happened to run into the mail lady as she was dropping it off and she couldn't stop going on about how good my mail smelled! She was shocked when I told her it was soap. Long story short, I will always buy this soap from now on!
A very manly soap. Love it!
When you subscribe you don't pay for shipping- I believe that's the advantage and that's where you save money.
never received my item, its been 3 weeks- not sure what is going on?

I love your soaps, especially the Cool Fresh Aloe & Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt... this is the 1st time I tried the Spearmint, but did not get the scent I thought I might get... it is a great soap, just not my style.
Smells great

review_title: whole bathroom smells like the woods
review_content: I got this bar in my Fancybox. When I opened the box the smell was amazing. It got even better when I actually showered. The oatmeal scrub is great for exfoliating legs before shaving.
Exactly what we were looking for and Lea (2 years old) says it smells great! Suggestion for a soap : a kitchen soap with coffee beans that would eliminate food odor on our hands when cooking.

I'm not kidding. I'm not a fancy man when it comes to soap but Sasquatch soap is amazing. I actually feel clean and there's no filmy residue after the fact. Plus, they smell amazing. Golden Moss is by far the best one I've tried -- the smell lingers all day and the wife loves it. I mean she LOVES it. The cigar box the soap comes in as the "gift box" was an excellent touch. Great work! Great product.
It got here on at a good time and I would buy more because the service was great

review_title: Dr. Squatch is the true way to natural cleanliness
review_content: Bought the Pine Tar and Gold Moss Scrub and since using them I have felt a noticeably smoother skin feel and less dryness that I have gotten from using other soap brands. The roughness in the Pine Tar works as a great exfoliate and provides that wake-up kick in the shower each morning. I am a convert.
Love it - Will not do without it.
You will look forward to showering with this soap. The scent is ridiculous. When you couple that with the amazing exfoliation, there's no better soap.

review_title: Fine way to keep your soap

this soap is great. i no longer need shampoo either as it works for both without drying my skin (no more dandruff or beardruff!) My only wish was that it had more scent but plenty of their other soaps do so its a moot point.

This soap has a nice subtle scent. No overpowering scents you get from other 'Dialed' up or from the 'Springs' of the British isles. Well worth the price.

review_title: Very refreshing, wish the spearmint had a little extra zing to it.
review_content: The soap, like all the others, works. So there's three stars right there. The fourth star is due to it's mixture. The smell is what you'd expect, the basil mixes well with the spearmint. But as the review title states: I wish there was more mint. Mint can wake you up in the morning, which is what I need. That, or add some juniper to it. But overall: GREAT soap.
One of the best ones from Dr. Squatch. Really moisturizes and conditions your skin.
This scent is one of our faves! So refreshing!
Love this soap!

The cedar citrus has a nice and subtle scent. I mainly use it for shampooing my beard and it works great! Leaves my beard feeling soft and looking healthy. I will be buying more of these soaps in the future. Also the shipping was fast.

Haven't tried all the soaps yet but so far, this one is my (and the girlfriend's) favorite. Definitely leaves you feeling clean and the scent stays with you subtly throughout the day. Speaking of scent, this has warm notes of wood, fresh clay, maybe some honey and other spices...(in my opinion). Other coworkers just say I smell like a man of the woods. Either way, it is an excellent soap. I shower 2x a day from work and exercise and it has lasted for a month so far. Highly recommended and a top contender for best scent. Again, want to try the others but this one needs to run out first.

This soap is the best for needing a good scrub down. I like to use it after doing most household activities such as painting, weed-whacking, and gardening. It's great at scrubbing the dirt and grim off. Although it does sort of a dark consistency when washing and rinsing off, I always look and feel clean. It even stripped a tick off my leg as I was washing. It might be the best to have a significant other wash your back with it. I kick like a dog.

review_title: Great soap, but not very scrubby
review_content:
I love the quality of this soap. It cleans well, lathers well and smells great. However, as a scrubbing bar it leaves much to be desired. Perhaps I received a bar from a batch where the scrubbing bits were not as evenly mixed, or there was a flaw in production. 
 
Also, while the soap does smell wonderful, the sharp scent of spearmint lasted only as long as the first shower. The basil scent lasted only a day or two longer. Both can still be smelled if one holds the soap to one's nose, but the bar and the lather really only have a vague, though pleasant, floral scent. 
 
Still, this is great soap. I very much like the way it cleans. I only wish it was as sharp smelling as it was when I opened the shipping package.
I was turned on to this soap by a friend who had told me about how much he enjoyed the pine tar soap. I ordered a bar and I was hooked. Very satisfied.
I've been slowly trying each soap from Dr. Squatch, the Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt is awesome, really makes you feel awake and refreshed

This spearmint basil bar simply smells amazing. It's got a very unique scent and is much different than the other bars. It smells of refreshing minty goodness with a basil roundhouse kick. Also, I could be crazy, but I believe the slight basil notes have been repelling mosquitos in my area. My favorite bar so far with only 3 more to try!

This spearmint basil bar simply smells amazing. It's got a very unique scent and is much different than the other bars. It smells of refreshing minty goodness with a basil roundhouse kick. Also, I could be crazy, but I believe the slight basil notes have been repelling mosquitos in my area. My favorite bar so far with only 3 more to try!
Manly

This was my first time using Pine Tar soap. After learning about the chemicals used in commercial products and their health effects, I decided to turn to a more natural solution. Squatch does a great job of listing the ingredients used, all of which I am comfortable with putting on my body, and comes in environmentally safe packaging. Double win! 
 
The consistency of the soap may seem unusual for first timers transitioning from commercial soap. Natural soap tends to break down easier, especially if you leave your bar of soap next to the bath tub or where it is constantly splashed by your shower, so make sure to keep it on your caddie if you plan on keeping it for long.

I've used the same soap for over 40 years. After receiving a bar of Gold Moss Scrub in a Birch Box a few months ago, I must say, I won't use anything else. 
The soap lathers very nicely, has a great scent and rinses cleanly. Leaving me feeling very refreshed. I shower daily, and even with a soap saver, I do well to get a bar to last 2 weeks. I'm being greedy, I know. Ha. 
I can't say enough good about this product. It's, simply, the best. 
Wish you would offer an after shave/cologne or deodorant. Something that the scent would last longer. This is just a great product. I never write reviews. But, am writing one here, because, I really like this soap. It's the best. Hands down.

Wish you would offer an after shave/cologne or deodorant. Something that the scent would last longer. This is just a great product. I never write reviews. But, am writing one here, because, I really like this soap. It's the best. Hands down.
This soap is like washing with sand paper but leaves your body feeling really good and clean after. Try it if you dare!!
This soap is like washing with sand paper but leaves your body feeling really good and clean after. Try it if you dare!!
Love the gold moss soap. Great manly, yet not overwhelming smell.
Love the gold moss soap. Great manly, yet not overwhelming smell.
Purchased for Christmas, but I'm sure he will love as he keeps letting me know when he needs more!
I love this product! My only complain is I wish the smell would remain longer, the scent vanishes too fast.
I love this product! My only complain is I wish the smell would remain longer, the scent vanishes too fast.

I've purchased the Pine Tar & it's awesome. Strong scent that lingers on for the rest of the day & works wonders with removing grease & dirt. I'll definitely be buying from Dr Squatch more in the future & I'm looking forward to trying the other soaps they have to offer.
Best soap ever. Great masculine smell makes your skin feel great. My wife loves it
I have been purchasing this soap for my husband for about a year now. I love that he's not using my stuff...and he loves this stuff.
Great soap! Solid scent here
Got the pine tar and deep sea goats milk. I'm in love with the pine tar and the goats milk isn't bad either. Looking to try more in the future
My daughter is hook'd on your soap!! She has sensitive skin and loves the fact that she can use a bar soap again!! We will be repeat, repeat buyers. Keep making it!!
I love this stuff, smells like a shower in a forest!!! I would absolutely buy shampoo or shave soap if you made it!
nice product! good customer service.

I've struggled finding scents I can consistently use. These bars and these scents are ones I would recommend to anyone who feels most body washes are too over bearing or harsh. These bars smell great and leave my skin feeling moisturized. Words do not do this product justice. Please do yourself the favor and give these bars a chance.

review_title: Great Man Soap for the Squatch in All of Us
review_content: I am always on the search for great products. I stumbled upon Dr.Squatch Soap Co. while searching on the internet and after some initial research, I decided to give it a try. I purchased two bars online: the Gold Moss Scrub and the Spearmint Basil Scrub. I was impressed with how clean these soaps made my feel in all the right man places. There was no residue left behind when I rinsed the soap off and no over the top smells. I felt rejuvenated from a long day at work, and felt like the soap helped scrub away unwanted dirt and sweat from my day. I will not shop in retail stores anymore now that I found this company.
Got the gift box for my boyfriend he loved it! Loved the cigar box, the soaps are great quality and then smell amazing.

review_title: I hate camping, but I love soap
review_content: Never before have I felt so manly. Well, there was this one time that I was wrestling an alligator, fell into an open volcano, was shot out into space where I got to eat space bacon with martians. Until I tried this soap, I never thought I could duplicate the testosterone rush that was an alligator/volcano/spacebacon orgy, but cedar citrus knocked it out of the park. Thanks.
Great site. Great service. Lightning fast delivery. Awesome soaps!!

$6/bar + shipping is quite an ask for a couple of bars of soap for a prospective customer. Perhaps an intro/noobie package is warranted? Otherwise, I haven't seen a huge difference over the cheaper store stuff. Just being honest. Respect for what you're doing though.

Recently bought the Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt. Not only does it keep my skin refreshed, but the smell is amazing. The Oatmeal in the bar is also beneficial for my Eczema issue. I believe in the Squatch, and you should, too!

bought it for my husband after we got it in a sampler box. He loved it. Tried it the other night on my face and it was awesome Doesn't leave your skin feeling dry like other soap brands. It's not ugly, it's grunge! This soap is metal as fuck!

The review is simple, this soap is great! 
Not only will you feel clean you will smell great a secondary bonus is that your bathroom will also smell like the outdoors. So far only used two out of the four bars that I ordered but I plan on getting more.

I ordered the pine tar bar and the Greek yogurt bar. Both are fantastic. I hve dry skin, and the yogurt bar actually dries my skin out less than other bars I've used....and idk if it's a coincidence, but every time I've showered with the pine bar, the ladies have given me a little more attention than normal :) I'll definitely be sampling every bar. Your products are great!
It was good.... at first it smells exactly like Lysol, but once you actually use it the smell cuts down a bit and is quite refreshing.

Have you ever watched a stupid Irish Springs commercial and some hairless, perfectly groomed wagon handle is all soaped up and takes a big orgasmic sniff of his bar of soap and you think, "who in the name of William Wallace would ever do that"?!?! THATS WHAT I DO WITH MY NEW SQUATCH SOAP! This isn't even a joke. I have literally caught myself standing in the shower and sniffing my soap harder than a 16 year old boy at a panty raid! I am a stereotypical male who doesn't enjoy the smaller things in life like soap... But I have no issues admitting that I am completely in love with this company and it's product! Long live the SQUATCH! Now only if they had t shirts and decals for my car window! ;-)
My absolute favorite!
I loved this soap a lot! It feels great and smells awesome! Definitely a repeat customer.
Never want to be without Squatch soap in our house. It is far and above the best soap we have ever used!
I always like trying something new. I've discovered my new favorite go to shower essential. Very impressed! Looking forward to my next purchase
I really like the aroma after showering with Sasquatch Soap and my wife likes it to! The bar also lasts longer than regular bar soap.
Smells good, abrasive on the body, cleans well. Which the bar would last a little longer. Probably will buy more.

Pine Tar and Greek Yogurt Eucalyptus are fantastic. Great quality and my girlfriend loves the smell. I'm looking forward to trying out more products, but I bought the soap saver as well, which makes these things last a while. Keep up the great work!
The smell is subtle and not overpowering but what I really love is the exfoliant. Will always use the Dr from now on.

review_title: Pine Tar is the Cat's Ass
review_content: The best pine soap I have ever used. Exfoliates without drying out my skin, good lather, buttery, not caustic. Love the sweet sting of the pine scent.

This soap is my least favorite! Wouldn't lather, the smell isn't that great, and the black residue makes your shower look disgusting. Don't know why I would buy a black bar of soap. Anyways, the other bars are great, my favorite is the Gold Moss Scrub. I'd recommend that.

review_title: Can I use the soap first?
review_content: I ordered 4 bars of soap... just barely used the first one. Maybe try sending this again in a few weeks after I have used all four of the bars? Or do you expect me to stay in the shower and use all four at once and individually label my experiences with my old soap on the glass door of the shower?

I'm not a hard guy to please, so it's. Ot shocking that I'm a fan of this bar of soap. My fiancÃ:copyright:e likes it as well, so that's a plus! I'll gladly be buying more products from your site in the future.
Wonderful soap! My only complaint is that it doesn't last very long. But other than that, it's great!

review_title: The pine tar soap cannot possibly be more manly
review_content: It smells like musk and its amazing. Will be buying soon.
What can I say this is how soap should be the Bay rum is really a great soap I can't wait to try the Gold Moss scrub.
my fiancÃ:copyright: loves the soap I got him. Feels more manly enjoying a nice scent in the morning. Great customer service as well!
Love this soap. This scent, along with all the Sasquatch scents, is fabulous. Can't say enough about it. Even Mrs. Sasquatch likes it!

Since the arrival of my soap, I've told as many people as possible how pleased I am. I have suggested to a friend, who owns a local retail, that he should consider stocking the Dr. Squatch products. If I don't recieve a soap subscription for Christmas, I will purchase one myself!!
Quick delivery and they smell fantastic.
Good soap
Love!
hella dank smells and feels man!!
So good I'll be Buying more soon !

review_title: YET ANOTHER AMAZING BAR OF SOAP!
review_content: I love the Deep Sea Goat's Milk. It feels smooth, Smells earthy, but alright. A real mans smell. This is my 3rd bar of soap that I purchased, and I have to say, I definitely dig Dr. Squatch Soaps. Can't wait for them to make other manly products in the future!! How about a shampoo?
What can i say, other than I really enjoy this soap. I've seen some complain about the roughness of it but to me it is just right especially after a long day of work.
I only wish it came in a bigger bar!

review_title: I guess I'm not man enough!
review_content: Just received my new bar of your PINE TAR SOAP. I am a 74-yr old business man and WAS a very outdoor person (hunting-competitive shooting-fishing-golf- drag-racing etc.... when younger), But, I guess I'm not quite man enough for your PINE TAR SOAP. You say STRONG and that is CORRECT. Too strong for me. I don't want to smell like a roof repair man that has been working with hot pine tar all day long. Patchouli-Sandalwood is more my thing. Thank you anyway.
i can't believe that I got excited about soap, but this stuff is great! I tell everyone about it!
This is a great deal to sample a few varieties. So far I'm enjoying the pine tar. The cedar soap holder is a nice touch. The awesome gift crate is going to go to great use.
Yummy soap! I'm obsessed!

I am picky when it comes to bars of soap, when I recieved this in the mail. I fell in love with this brand and scent. I am pleased with the product. I liked how it came through the mail at scheduled timing. And it was reasonably priced. I am going to try more scents and keep buying this product.

The wooden soap dish I purchased for my Dr Squatch brand soaps is quite the feat of soap craftsmanship. it's simple design prevents the soap from be washed away by the moisture in my shower while also allowing enough air in to keep the soap from getting all nasty and oogy on the bottom. The fact that the dish is made of cedar wood keeps my shower smelling pleasant and refreshing when it steams up. it also keeps the flies out. And the termites. They buzz right off. The two complaints I have about the dish aren't a huge problem to me, but do keep it from being a five star knockout product. Whether it's the soap or the dish, all of my Dr. Squatch brand soaps (Pine Tar, Bay Rum, and Cedar Citrus) have a tendency to stick to the dish. It takes a bit to unstick the soaps, and occasionally I mar the bar. This next issue may be an issue of newness, but the dish tends to secrete a dark oil when it starts absorbing moisture. The oil hasn't stained anything, but it does discolor the soap and get all over the shower. 
 
Definitely a very good product, and one I would recommend to others. It does have those two issues however.

I bought a bar of the Pine Tar as a stocking stuffer for my hubby last Christmas and boy did I opened a can of worms. He has since purchased every bar since then at least three times. He loves them! I love how it makes him smell. Even better, I love how it makes my bathroom smell! Thanks Dr. Squatch!
works well at keeping the soaps dry and soap doesn't stick to wood. Very useful product.
This soap is the real deal. My whole bathroom smells amazing every morning and my skin has been thanking me ever since i received this item in the mail. Keep up the good work!
Great Soap! I wish they lasted a little longer...
Enjoy the aromatic soap and the oils that help moisterize my skin

review_title: like an unholy evergreen lemon tree
review_content: smells wonderful and fresh and woodsy and tangy. very energizing in the morning. nice work boys, keep it coming.
New favorite soap!!!
manly scents for manly men.
i really enjoyed pine tar. its rough and tough and makes me think i am camping instead of showering in my apartment. very cool

Wow, after what seems like a lifetime of using body wash, I may have lost a part of my manhood, that rough gritty texture of Pine Tar made me love showering again. The scent carries with you nearly all day. So powerful this soap will clear your conscience and pretty much make you feel like a boss. Get ready for some epic exfoliation baby!

My son is so hard to buy for and the set of soaps (along with a couple of other gifts) were perfect for him. The packaging and the scents are wonderful. Looking forward to him enjoying this gift in the coming months. Would definitely by from here again.
Im definitely happy with the soap 5 stars. The shipping however was way longer that it should of been. I received my product about two weeks after I purchased.
Love the product! All the bars in the gift box are amazing! Keep on with the good work!

Gold Moss Scrub is my favorite soap I have ever used, by far. It not only makes me smell good, but the entire hall leading to my bathroom even smells like it. The shipping, however, took almost two full weeks. That was just a little too long for me and left me a little frustrated.
This soap is excellent! I haven't tried all of them yet, but my favorites so far has got to be the Pine Tar + Citrus Cedar! Thank you for keeping me smelling delicious!
Smells good and scrubs well. Skin seems to be better after using this bar!!
As a 350+ lb strongman this soap beats down all of my stank even through the hardest straining sessions.

Overall I really enjoyed this soap; the scent, the exfoliating oatmeal, very good stuff. However, the only thing that kept me from giving this bar five stars is the fact that the scent of the soap is SUPER STRONG when it's not in your body and just chilling in its natural bar state. Not a problem for me, but the wife didn't like it. Apparently it throws off the other scented items she puts around the house. Other than that, top notch soap.

Amazing clean feeling without drying out your skin. Super sudzy. Great smell. My only issue is how little soap you get for the price. Other than that, nice soap. How about a vanilla and oak or clove scent? Even a leather scent?
The product itself is great and I would continue to buy it for $6 a bar. The cost of shipping just makes this an unreasonable purchase. So, I won't be buying again.
my son loves this soap. He used one so much he went thru it in 10 days. The smell is very clean and pleasant. Will be ordering more.

I bought a bar of Pine Tar soap last year as a stocking stuffer for my hubby. He loved it so much, he has ordered the soaps several times over this past year, trying at this point all the fragrances. This year for Christmas, I got him one of each soap, a soap holder AND one of the new fragrances. Who's spoiled?

When I ordered Dr. Squatch soap and got to use it I was thinking outside the box to use something different. Dad's a traditional man and has always used the typical boring Old Spice as had I, until I used Dr. Squatch soap. Next thing I know I was missing a few of my soap bars from my giftbox and asked my dad where they went assuming he toke them. Being the man he is dad immediately admitted that he'd taken them cause they smelled so great.

review_title: amazing! perfect gift for any guy in your life!
review_content: Just got the 3 gift boxes I ordered, I was in awe opening the box. Each cigar box is different, super unique, & sturdy wood. I can't even pick a favorite they are so awesome. I couldn't help but open each & take a look (& sniff!) at the soaps, they smell amazing! :) Can't wait for Christmas morning to see the guys open them up. I will for sure be ordering again for any gifts I need. Thanks!
Real simple! If you like being and feeling clean, and feel smell as if youve been tackled by a team of pine trees, then buy this...
I purchased the Pine Tar soap with an open mind, but did not expect the perfect blend of scent and quality exfoliation! Not to mention the added perk of being 100% natural and nourishing!
Creamy, oaky, woodsy with a touch of sweet spice. Smell lasts long on the skin and the soap itself is a great moisturizer. Love it.

A little small for the price of the soap. Like the 
Scent but not all that amazing for the price. Will not be buying one again.
Just got my soap in the mail a week ago and I'm loving it! Will definitely order again!

It's expensive, yes. But it's most definitely worth the cost. The scent is the right balance of fragrant & manly, the exfoliation leaves my skin feeling twice as clean as any name brand soap, and it's simple/no frills design looks badass in my shower caddy. Will be showering with the Squatch for a while to come. But please lower the price/add discounts!
easu ordering. Good quality soap. If you want a high quality natural soap -- this is it. Just try it. You can't go wrong.
i had purchased a bar on a whim and now my fiancÃ:copyright: is addicted!! He loves the scents and so do I ! :)
i was slightly disappointed with the way gold moss smelled. I guess I had too high of expectations for it.
It has not gotten here yet
I €:tm:ve been a soap user ever since I discovered my own body odor. Never used a square before. I €:tm:ll get used to it.

This was my first time using anything other than bodywash or mass-produced soap bars. 
 
Wow. 
 
I was pretty excited that the Gold Moss scrub left essentially no film. That was what drove me away from bar soap to begin with. 
 
Also, the smell. While not overpowering, I find myself walking around daily with the faint aroma of what I could only describe as 'the woods'. I no longer smell like a boring white guy...I smell like a man of the wilderness. 
 
The only issue I had with the process was that the soap actually made it into my city 5 days before it was delivered. I assume this is due to the transfer from UPS to USPS. But once I received the soap, there were no complaints to be had.
The Pine Tar soap not only provides a serious scrub, it smells like distilled lumberjacks! A seriously good wash!
Love this stuff. Never was a man to buy soap, until I tried this stuff now I can't live with out it.
So far i have only used one bar...i thought about giving the other 3 as stocking stuffers.....i dont think so! Great product . Glad i made the purchase.
Simply Beautiful
Had to take a few days to get used to the oatmeal, but now I love it. Wish it was a bit more piney, smells sweeter than expected. Look forward to trying more..

review_title: great gift & i hope he likes it
review_content: I bought the mixed soaps gift box, it came in the mail on time, looked great in that cigar box & smells like heaven! I'm giving it to a friend on new year

I have to say, I'm disappointed by the fact that my Pine Tar soap doesn't smell strongly of anything but bar soap. I'd been expecting something with a much stronger odor. Perhaps a I got a bad, weak batch? Is that something that happens? I'm honestly not sure that I even smell a pine scent at all.

Soap smells great and doesn't dry my skin out. I workout everyday though and have to shower 2x so the bars only last a few weeks which is my only real complaint. Not a fault of the soap -- just gotta buy more!

review_title: It makes me feel like I'm being all the man I can be.
review_content: Best smelling soap ever! Not that girly sh!t that makes me want to vomit and sneeze, but MAN smell...good MAN smell! Not working in the tool shed for 6 hours smell, but that just showered after working 6 hours in the tool shed smell. I bought 3 different kinds and my only problem was deciding which one to use first. I am now squatch for life.

review_title: Christmas stocking made perfect by Sasquatch
review_content: This is one great smelling stocking! Thank you Sasquatch for filling it with care!

Shinrin-yoku is what the Japanese call a healing walk in the woods, and it translates to "Forest Bathing". An appropriate description of the Pine Tar soap! Like a bracing trip into the deep woods. As a child, I was taught by my elders that Sasquatch was really an alien android guarding an ancient spacecraft hidden deep in the woods. Now I know he is also a purveyor of fine, manly cleaning products.
great

review_title: exactly what I hoped it would be.
review_content: Great soap. Great scent. But my wife was a little surprised when I turned into a Sasquatch.

review_title: Manly Mountain Smell in a Bottle
review_content: Congratulations, Dr. Squatch! You have successfully captured the scent of the mountains in a bottle. This earthly cologne may cause instant facial hair and plaid attire. Forget those other high dollar fancy colognes, this is the one you need. Your lady will love it too; an added bonus.
not my favorite smell and doesn't last as long as the other soaps either.
Skin feels great and you smell great too. love it and I recommend it to everyone

I'm guessing these guys changed up the ingredients for this soap because it now has sand in it which isn't listed on the webpage. This wouldn't be bad except for the fact that the sand is super course and it feels like 50 grit sand paper. I'd like it better with a finer sand if that's what they want in it.

I picked up some more to give to my friends. The pine tar scent is fantastic, and the bit of grit inside it feels great after a particularly dirty day. Love cleaning up with this stuff after a day working with my hands on cars or around the workbench.
Take a shower with Dr Sas.... You will get clean
I smell like a man and so will my brother when he opens his stocking on Christmas.
love your soaps! I have two sons who enjoy them for stocking stuffers!
I've only been using it for two weeks but it's pretty buttkickin' so far. Leaves my bathroom smelling like a sweet, succulent forest.
Love Sasquatch soaps.

review_title: Best gift to give and receive!
review_content: I absolutely love all the these products. Among all Gold Moss Scrub and Pine Tar. I've gotten compliments in the way I smell every single day. Not only do I feel great because my skin feels and smells amazing, but it is a confidence booster when I receive compliments as often as I do.
Awesome scent!

I have purchased soap twice. The Gold Moss, Bay Rum, and Greek Yogurt. The soaps are great, last a decent amount of time and smell fantastic. I had a problem with an order and it was resolved quickly and to my satisfaction. I even use it on my English Bulldog!!! She smells great too!!

review_title: Great Gift or a Treat for Yourself
review_content: I bought a few of these soaps as a gift for someone that always jokes about Sasquatch. Since I liked the idea of this outdoorsy golden moss scent so much I ordered one for myself too. The soaps arrived loose in a USPS bag with some corners crushed in.. i hope I don't hear about that on Xmas morning :( And, they are a bit smaller than I would like for the price of it (roughly 3" x 3" x 1") :( However, the scent is very nice and 'medium' in comparison to a typical national store soap brand. I will consider buying more, but hope Dr. Squatch works on their shipment style and overall value.

Awesome soap! I ordered a few bars of the Pine Tar and Gold Moss Scrub from y'all. It was my first order from your company and I'm soapleased! Order was processed quickly and arrived on time and as ordered. 

By far, the Gold Moss Scrub is my favorite! Cleans well and I smell awesome!

Thanks Dr. Squatch!

David Richardson
El Paso, TX
Love the smell. love the grittiness of the oatmeal.
The gift box is a gift for an old HS buddy which he wont open til Christmas per his wife's choice. The cologne/beard oil I bought though I completely love....

This soap is exactly what it says. Super exfoliating (as long as you use the bar to skin method) and might be a little too much for the weaker man, but your skin will thank you if you muster up some manhood! The scent is quite strong, but not overbearing and really brings the evergreen forest to your exterior. This soap makes the world less stinky and skin more healthy. BUY IT!
Awesome soap!
Feel great, smell like a man !

review_title: Alas Miss Johanson has not yet arrived.
review_content: Your description for your pine tar soap specifically mentions Scarlett Johanson. Alas she is yet to arrive, which, all things considered is probably a good thing. Right now my wife is enjoying the way your soap makes me smell, and I'm afraid another woman would somehow lessen the pleasure. For her. Great soap, although the 80 grit sandpaper you included in it seems a bit coarse for my old skin. Easily solved with a scrubby thingy. A manly scrubby thingy, made of drill grindings. Definitely will be ordering more soap.

smell 
awesome
my boyfriend loved it!!
I've only used the pine tar and citrus ones. But love them. Cant wait to try the rest.
I received my soap in a timely manner, it smells wonderful and everything is packaged beautifully. I would certainly recommend this brand to anyone else looking for good masculine handmade soap.

review_title: Pine Tar Soap & Gold Moss Scrub
review_content: Excellent soap my beard is super soft and tangle free and the smell is perfect will buy some more customer for life thanks!!!!!
Best smelling mail I have ever received. Print it! Soap is pretty great as well!

New handcrafted soaps came in today. I got a dozen of them. I have one in the shower and the rest of them in my closets and drawers. Nice manly scents too. Gold moss, pine, eucalyptus.... You get the idea. And the best part is one soap does it all... Hair, shaving, everything. Bye bye old spice garbage.@drsquatchsoapco Definitely an upgrade to my shower routine.
not bad but lacking something
I purchased 3 gift sets, they are amazing! All unique & they all smell awesome. Can't wait to see the guys open them...wish I would have gotten a gift set for myself :)

review_title: The best part of waking up is koala kisses in your cup
review_content: This soap meets all of my 'squatch-pectations'. The Eucalyptus is very therapeutic and really opens your airways. Breath in that fresh, minty aroma and let the oatmeal and natural oils treat your skin to a vigorous deep cleaning. Remember bar soap lasts longer when you use a washcloth or sponge and always use your soapsaver.

review_title: Bark sniffin', mitt scrubbin', Pine Tar miracle bar.
review_content: I love the aroma of this soap and the abrasive sand exfoliate. The only downside (which is that of all pine tar soaps) is the grey residue that is left behind in the form of spots on the shower wall and streaks running down the tub. It's probably not a big deal to most people but I'm a clean freak and also have roommates I have to consider. So this soap isn't a choice of mine for showering. As a hand soap however... LOVE IT! It scrubs away grease, dirt, grime, wood glue, black mud, tracker dye, and anything else you can throw at it. The scent is a bonus that lingers for a long time. I've been using one bar of the Pine Tar for 3 weeks now, washing my hands at least twice a day and it has only lost about a third of its mass.

review_title: A bake sale in Wizard City
review_content: This is your dessert bar. Warm, chocolatey, and kind of musky. Gold Moss Scrub has mellow scent that lasts, and leaves your skin feeling clean and smooth.

review_title: Arrrgggghh to the shower with ye olde spicy devil!
review_content: I'm not very familiar with your typical bay rum scent but DR.SQUATCH's Bay Rum bar has a really great aroma. Spicy and sweet with a pleasant hint of patchouli. Soap lasts longer when you use a washcloth or sponge and is gentle enough on your skin to wash your hair and face.

review_title: Aloe, I Love You. Won't you tell me your name?
review_content: This bar has a fresh flowery yet mellow scent. It leaves my skin feeling very smooth and is a fine substitute for shampoo. Preserve the life of your bar by using a washcloth or sponge and storing on your soapsaver.

This is a good quality soap, it leathers well and leaves my skin feeling soft. However, the sand and oatmeal make it very rough, it goes away fairly quickly, and while it does smell like pine, the scent is not especially strong and you are not left smelling noticeably like pine after using it.
Bottom line: good soap, but not as strong as advertised.

First off, the Cedar Citrus smells amazing! It's a very nice mix of cedar, citrus, and an almost buttery type smell. I bought it right before Christmas so it reminds me of a nice crisp Christmas tree, but more on the side of manly than sparkly snow. 
 
The feel, it leaves my skin nice and hydrated unlike the commercial brand soap I was using before Dr. Squatch. A mild exfoliant won't tear you to shreds but at the same time gets the funk of the day off. 
 
Very refreshing, manly smell and a good clean! 10/10 will be buying more of the Cedar Citrus!
Love the new scent and so does the girlfriend.

I am Cuban and to get this box was EPIC! All the scents smell amazing and so far I have not been disappointed by the soap! Wife wanted me to buy another gift box just so she can get her own cigar box!

Ordered this as a gift. Presentation is great, soaps smell amazing, didn't use the though. One suggestion: gift box should contain a slick advertising card to acquaint the recipient with the product and how to get more. I'll definitely order some for myself after the holidays.
Bought this for my husband for christmas. This soap has such an interesting scent! I can't wait for him to try it out!

review_title: Sand took some getting used to, and the smell was not as strong as I hoped
review_content: The sand took some getting used to, and the smell was not as strong as I hoped. But good bar, might get it again
Love this soap. smells awesome. like a pine tree in the rain. a clean pine tree in fresh rain.
Like a pine scented suit of armor I feel ready to battle the beasties that lay outside my door.
It smells great but isn't overwhelming and doesn't leave my skin dry. I'll definitely be purchasing more in the future!

review_title: One of the best soaps I have ever purchased
review_content: Superb natural fragrance and lather. Great for exfoliation or scrubbing dirty beards! Absolutely a favorite. I've purchasing a variety of natural soaps and this is one of the stand outs. What I love is that it wakes you up, a great soap for a morning shower or to get off late-night grim. Also, it moisturizes so it doesn't dry out your skin. Great product, simple as that.
The friend I sent them to is very happy with the soaps.
And it smells soo gooooood

How often do you buy a men's soap or bodywash with a name like "Cedar Citrus"--and get something that smells synthetic (and overly strong), or nothing like the name suggests, or overly "manly"--like someone dunked a navel orange in PineSol and Axe? Not this soap. It's all natural--you can smell only the natural ingredients (literally cedar and citrus oil) and that's it for aroma. Smells great, great lather. And the scent lasts almost all day. This is is the best smelling pine/citrus product I've ever used and (as usual with Doctor Squatch) is a top notch soap.
Packaged very well and arrived super quickly.
Dr Squatch is a great value and great quality product I would recommend to anyone
I love the pine tar
This soap is fantastic. It's a bit rough which helps exfoliate your skin and gets a deeper clean. Smells great like pine. Lasted me about 2-3 weeks.

My only complaint is that you advertise your soaps as designed to last for a month, they definitely do not last that long i used the entire bar in 2 weeks and that was only showering once per day. 
 
I feel like you need to get more soap for the price or it should be cheaper for what you get. 
 
Aside from that you have a great product but I cant justify the price for how long it lasts
This soap is great. It smells good, exfoliates excellently, and dissolves very quickly. I used this soap for ~5 showers and then it was gone.

the bar of pine tar soap lasted just over a week and kept my skin moist in the most dry conditions. 
I feel clean afterward and not greasy. I would like the scent to last a bit longer and have a rectangular shaped bar instead of a square since the square bar breaks in the middle once it gets to 3/8 inch or so.
I bought this soap as a socking stuffer for my bf for Christmas and it smells great! He is a fan of sasquatch so I thought it would make a unique gift.
It's a good soap . Leaves me feeling dry afterwards . Doesn't linger as long as I thought it would
Still loving this product!!

I recently purchased Driftwood cologne and an assortment of soaps for my fiancee. The product descriptions are spot on. We love all of the products we have gotten from Dr. Squatch. The soap bars last a very long time too - I highly recommend these products!
Looks great! Works great!

I got 4 different scents, mainly because my wife had mentioned all the chemicals in store bought soaps. I thought she'd love these, but she says they all smell too manly (even goat's milk). Just one woman's opinion I guess, but I love the soaps. I'd agree they err on the manly side, but excellent for the guys (and she likes the smell on me).

review_title: My man smells like a lumberjack
Great stuff! Brother loved the gift
review_content: So night a couple bars and the wooden soap tray for my brother. Now, my brother is a cowboy boot wearing, gun toting, blue collar kind of guy. He loved the scents, and his wife loved them almost as much. I will definitely recommend this for ALL walks of life, whether you're blue or white collar.
Purchased a variety pack for the hubby, and he is in love with it. The product is amazing, shipping and customer service was fantastic! Go Buy this stuff now!!!!!!!!
Smells great...not too strong...and my wife loves the way it makes me smell.
the soap was good but the bar lasted only one week
The scents are awesomely manly and the soap gets the job done. I'm in for more.

Medium-strong and pleasing scent, especially in an enclosed shower. Not overpowering, just right. It does a fine job of it's primary function, cleaning your body. The skin is not dried out after using the soap. My favorite is still Gold Moss Scrub, but as a secondary choice to break up the monotony Cedar Citrus is a great choice.
I received the soap in a timely manner and LOVE it. I'll definitely be purchasing again.
Very handy just like is says it save the soap A+++++
Gave these as a gift to my son. As he pulled each bar out we smelled them..they smell amazing and I was jealous that I was not the one receiving these soaps.
The soap is black and leaves black marks on the soap dish or wherever you sit it.

I ordered three soaps from Dr. Squatch (the Deep Sea Goats Milk, Pine Tar, and Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt) and i chose this one to use first. Im still using this bar and im in love! i feel fresh and clean after i use it, with now sticky soap residue or weird unwashed feeling left over after i step out of the shower like when iv used body washes etc. My girlfriend loves the scent too!!! I will totally be a returning customer! Thank you Dr. Squatch for making such great and natural products! Just a Thought, i would love an all natural shampoo! especially with this scent! :)

Long ago, I was introduced to a scent that was, very hard to find. Recently I purchased the gold moss scrub and the Doctor nailed the scent. So it's taken me well over 40 years to find this, so don't stop making it. And it's good for everyone. The wife wants to know if there will be a true cologne to go with it.
Timely delivery, great product. Bought as a gift for my brother and he loved it!
Got here on time. Came in nice cigar boxes, and the soap smells good!
Dr. Squatch soap was a huge gift hit, especially the extremely manly Pine Tar soap. You found a new loyal customer in my man.

I bought the multi-soap box as a Christmas gift for BF and was delighted at what showed up. The soaps were neatly packaged in an adorable (or handsome since its men's soaps?) wooden box. The delicious smelling soaps were also emanating a wonderful scent even through the mailing package. BF loved it and declared he's even keeping the box. Who knew soap could be such a good gift? Or I guess as long as it's coming from Sasquatch.

Received a gift subscription and I have really enjoyed it. My skin feels better then with any store bought bars I have ever purchased. Only downside is the pine tar bar scratched up my entire body so I'm a little concerned with that ever is in it. I will never use it again and I don't recommend it at all.
Excellent customer service!
Excellent product and service

This was a Christmas gift for my husband. He had bought the hemlock trail soap previous, and loved the scent. I thought the cologne would be the perfect gift. He loved it!! But the best thing of all was my customer service experience. I was contacted via e-mail telling me that my arrival for the cologne was supposed to be on Christmas Eve... but they wanted to know if I wanted FREE upgraded shipping, bc their office was concerned that it wouldn't get here in time... I excepted the upgraded shipping,very grateful.... Then I was contacted one more time, to let me know... That it was my lucky day! They sent me 2 colognes for the price of one!! That was an awesome bonus gift! I will definitely be ordering from Dr. Squatch in the future. Thank Guys!! Much appreciated!! 
5 Stars!!!

review_title: Smooth citrus with a bit of pine
review_content: I've had three cedar citrus bars from two separate orders. The first bar had a lot more of a piney cedar smell, similar to the pine tar soap, with a bit of orange aroma. The second order I received had a slightly different smell to them. There was more of a citrus smell with just barely a hint of cedar. These bars from the second order also had a more mellow scent to them, even when I lathered them up they were less aromatic than the first batch. Still left my skin feeling very clean without feeling dry.
Bought these soaps for my boyfriend (deep sea goats milk, cool aloe, good moss scrub), and he loves them! Yummy smelling boy, happy girl, happy boy :) yayy!

I ordered several soaps from Dr. Squatch in an effort to test them all and decide which one to re-order or to just scrap the entire idea of "Hand-Made Men's Soap" the first one I tried was Pine Tar, which looks quite similar to a cube of heavy tar with flecks of sawdust peppered throughout. At first it seemed a little rough, rubbing the bar on my bare skin felt like dragging heavenly 100-grit sandpaper all over my body. Naturally I wasn't in the shower alone, and my girlfriend decided to try out Pine Tar as well, she winced "ouch! It hurts!" When I read that this soap was "exfoliating" I felt that it was a little foo-foo, so let me re-phrase that claim. This soap (in one session) removed the accumulated blood, sweat, automotive grease, and grime from my latest differential re-build, bringing my skin down to its natural form. It was invigorating. Also, the smell. After one shower my one bedroom apartment took on the glorious smell of a carpentry shop. I will be ordering Pine Tar again. I still have five more soaps to try out, but I'm not sure anything can compare.

I purchased the Gift Box for my brother as a Christmas Gift. He really loves the soap! I will probably be ordering some more in the future. The only "complaint" would be the clasp on the cigar box was not attached in the right spot for it to actually clasp.
Smells great. A little awkward to hold, so that's why the four stars. I'll keep ordering bars until I have a satisfactory amount of hair on my chest.

review_title: Love Me some Pine Tar Soap.
review_content: Love how the scent stays on you after for a pretty long time. The wife loves the scent and so do I. It truly takes me to a forest when I am showering. Awesome Soap!
My boyfriend loves his Christmas present, especially the Gold Moss soap!! We will definitely be ordering more:)
Bought this for boyfriend. The scent is great and it doesn't dry his beard out. Will buy again.

review_title: Smells great, a little to abrasive
review_content: This soap smells amazing and lasts quite a while, really loving it. I also like that the bar is created to exfoliate the skin, however the "bits" that are in the soap can be too abrasive at times. Overall good product.
Their soap smells great! I was concerned that my order would not arrive in time for Christmas, but they did what was necessary to make that happen. I am a very happy customer. Thank you!

I thought I was manly. Too manly perhaps. From the beard to the bedroom. I'd thought that nice soaps were a thing for the ladies. How wrong I was. If you knew what was good for you, you'd get this soap. And if you don't know what's good for you, I'll tell, this soap is good for you. Quit just looking like a man, and smell like one! Also, ladies, if you have a man, you like a man, or you know a man, do yourself/them/everyone a favor, and get them this soap.
The soap is great! I never thought I would be so excited about a soap company. Purchased on a whim and am not disappointed in the slightest. I would recommend it to anyone

The soaps were wonderful. They smell amazing, and I would definitely buy more. The only complaint is that the cigar box was a little damaged, but, you know, its not a cigar company so some concessions need to be made.
Cute packaging. Great gift.
I ordered the box set for my boyfriend for Christmas, he absolutely loved it! It came in a very cool cigar box which was very unique. I will definitely be ordering again it makes the perfect gift.

review_title: I Love How My Guy Smells
review_content: My boyfriend had been gifted the Pine Tar soap a few months back and we were both hooked after one whiff. Unfortunately, I was forbidden to use his precious soap, with him even going as far as to hide it from me come shower-time. This holiday season, I purchased nearly the entire line AND the gift set for him. The set was bespoke; four hand-selected bars carefully arranged with the scents I had chosen in a pretty dapper cigar box. Each fragrance is distinct, balanced and clean- I am hard-pressed to find even one I dislike in the slightest. Lately, he has been favoring Spearmint Basil, which does... things to my insides ;) He has managed to hide even these nine bars from me, so awkwardly sniffing him will have to suffice for the time being.
The Dr. Squatch pine tar soap is fantastic! Not only does it smell great, it also prevents the dry itchy skin that normally occurs during the winter months. I highly recommend it.
My wife loves the smell of this soap. My skin also seems to be much less dried out after using it. I'll be buying more.

This is one of the best soaps I've ever tried. The smell is strong in a good way, it surrounds you but doesn't suffocate you. And the exfoliation aspect of the soap leaves me feeling clean but not dry. All in all, this is a quality soap that is absolutely fabulous!
My future son-in-law, Mike, loved it!

I bought the box set for both my brothers and my boyfriend for Christmas. They absolutely loved it!! The cigar boxes are beautiful and each soap is unique and high quality. I, a dainty lady, used the moss soap and was pleasantly surprised at how clean and soft I felt.

review_title: Not quite Gold Moss, but still great.
review_content:
Don't let the label of "cologne" fool you, this is something totally different than what you are used to. Where boutique colognes tend to be complex and wildly unique, Driftwood is very blunt and somehow gently in-your-face. This is a scent for a simple sort of man who wants his admirers to feel like they are relaxing in a classic American log cabin instead of in a boardroom full of European suits. 
 
The bottle is small, but the scent in the oil is so strong that you don't need but a drop to rub between wrists and on neck to be surrounded in a cloud of warm, citrusy wilderness with a hint of spice. I would describe the scent as sandalwood and spicey grapefruit, with the strong presence of the sandalwood giving way to the grapefruit as time goes on. The strength of the scent seems to wane after 4 or so hours, but it doesn't completely go away for much longer. Basically par for the course with other colognes, though I'm applying a fraction of what I would have to apply with my old Armani to get this presence of scent. 
 
I like that it's all natural oils. I like that I don't smell like a frat boy or a french businessman. Use at your own risk, you may find older women start to call you "daddy" once this is applied.
I was very surprised with how much I like this soap. It leaves me feeling clean and smells amazing without being overpowering.
my boyfriend smells soooo good after using this soap! He loves it!
bought the pine tar soap for my granddaughter, she loves this soap, she said it helps with her face.
Excellent Product and Service

I purchased a few of these for some of my family members, and they love the product! I showed them the website and they really enjoyed the easy layout. 
Keep up the great work Sasquatch Team. 
 
-James W.
Smelled great, both of my brothers liked their xmas gifts for their beards
I was searching for a last minute and unique gift for our two sons and the Saskatchewan soap was perfect! Smells great, creative and whimsical marketing _ it was a hit!

Definitely must say the smell in amazing! I literally could smell it through the shipment packaging! Though must say the way you ship your products is most unsatifatory! I was sent three bars of soap in a flat rate bubble envelope, not box. The post office charged me to simply get this package, I should not have to pay extra for a package I already paid shipping for! A small flat rate box is basically five dollars and I paid six dollars. I know you want to make a good profit because lets face it, you do have a really good product but your shipping needs upgrades. I will be sending a photo of the packaging to proof I did have to pay an addition feed.

I bought the gold moss scub and the fresh aloe as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. Let me say they smell amazing and did not dry out his beard like many other brands have done. My 2 boys want to try other scents after trying his so yes i definitely will be a repeat customer.
I love them all and will never use anything else.
Thank you for delivering my order so quickly!

Great soaps in wonderful scent combinations. 
 
My husband especially loved the cigar box packaging. What a nice touch.

Ha, that's creepy. But really, I do. Thank you again for the free sasquatchette samples! I ordered soap for all my outdoorsy friends (and my sister). They all loved it! I'll definitely be recommending you and I'll definitely be ordering more! 
Thanks again!
This soap is awesome! It lathers nicely and would definitely recommend it to everyone!
Got it for my dad he loved it.
pine is fine. Gold moss is the boss
A friend of mine suggested that I give your soaps a try. I really like the way they smell, and how they smell on me. You guys have a new fan! THANK YOU!
Can't go wrong with the Squatch! This is an eye opener soap! Great to help wake you up in the mornings!

It came on time for Christmas even though I placed the order pretty late in the game. The soaps looked and smelled awesome. And the cigar box packaging was a killer touch. Going to get a pack for myself at some point soon.
This is just the best all around soap that I have tried from Drz. Squatch! Love the smell, cleans well, can't go wrong!!!
If you are going to buy nice soap, you want it to last as long as it can! This really helps the life of the soap, and even the wood smells good in the shower!
awesomely smelling foressty soap
we are looking forward to carrying the soaps. thanks for all ya'lls help.
I really love this soap. The scent is subtle, a bit spicy but clean smelling.
I've tried the cologne and fell in love with it. The whole package is awesome. This is a partial review, as I've yet to try the soaps (although they smell really good).

review_title: I smell so manly - - it's been validated by strangers, true strangers
review_content:
I am a Gold Moss Scrub man. It's clear that not only does my shower smell nice, fresh and very manly, I am too smell manly. Very manly. Everyone is now clearly confused by my fresh and manly smell. I've been told by the cadre of sniffers around me that I am reminiscent of the two manly actors Denzel Washington and Steve McQueen. And I don't disagree. 
 
This is great soap, leaves you feeling clean, and for those of us that hate that itchy winter, dried out skin-experience, it doesn't make your skin ashy. 
 
I'm going to the break room to fill up my water bottle here at work. It's really just a rouse to receive compliments on just how great I smell and how clean I look on my way there. I think I'll take the long route.

The first soap saver I got was cracked. I contacted the company and they immediately shipped a new one. No muss, no fuss, excellent customer service. The soap saver itself is mediocre at best. The soap sticks something fierce and bits pull off when trying to pry the soap from the saver. When the soap gets down to around a 1/4 inch it falls apart while trying to separate it from the wooden saver. I like the idea, but execution definitely leaves something to be desired. (I am using this with Sasquatch soap.)
everytime I order its 1 pine tar and 1 other. Gotta have the pine tar
Ridiculously great product - must have for all manly men!
I love your soap!
Amazing product. Great scent and feels great. I take one star away only because I travel a lot and the shape of the bar won't fit in my soap box.
awesome product!

I bought four bars of the pine for my brothers, father and boyfriend and they all seemed to enjoy the smell when it hit the hot water. My father was not to sure how to take soap as a gift, nor the exfoliation that the pine tar offers. But his inner Vermont loves it. Personally I love the way the bathroom in my home takes on a new sense... Wilderness

review_title: Love it keeps me and my bathroom smelling great for hours
review_content: Love it keeps me and my bathroom smelling great for hours.
The scent on this is great. Looking forward to trying out the rest of the line.
After I smelled the Rum Bay for the first time I knew I need to bathe. After my shower my wife quickly found me and into the throws of passion we went.
No one writes reviews for soap.. Until Dr.Sqatch, yep its just that good.
great product!!
Initially I wondered, how good can a bar of soap really be? Turns out, pretty goddamn amazing! I've tried tons of body washes, but the search is over. Best soap ever!
Bought a bar for my brother. It was an awkward gift, yes, but now he doesn't mind so much.
Great Product, Great Smell.
great product with equally great service. The best thing I can say is my wife absolutely loves the smell of this soap on me. I have to get more very soon!
I love the soaps! My only grip is, they don't last that long. I used the deep sea goat milk for 5 days and the bar is more then half gone. I'm Hoping the others last longer.
The smell and texture are great. It leaves the bathroom smelling awesome all day.
The soaps are amazing but it took my soap 2 weeks to get here. I had to go get other soap to use while I waited, the shipping said 5-7 business days but instead mine turned into 2 weeks
love this stuff! Works amazing on my beard and the wife loves it.
Amazing !!!!
love this stuff
Why do you smell so good! Love to soap, might be needing a second purchase here soon

1. This soap smells amazing. Not only do I love it, but my lady cant get her nose away from my neck to smell it. Score!

2. This soap will make your skin perfectly healthy. I have loads of tattoos on my arms and legs and ever since I started using this soap my tattoos shine like new. 

And 3. This soap lasts forever. I didnt want to spend $6 on one bar of soap but I have been using my first bar for about a month and a half (yes, i shower every day) and its not even half gone. 

So to recap: smells great, makes your skin hydrated and healthy, and lasts forever. 

I will use this stuff until the day I die.
Great exfoliation and makes me smell like what I imagine Ron Swanson smells lile.

I've only just begun (Gold Sap Moss and Bayrum) but man I could not love this product anymore! I had guests who came out of my bathroom asking what smelled so amazing in there. Answer was a combo of Squatch Soapsaver and Bayrum bar. Customer Service is as high quality as the soap. EMBRACE THE SQUATCH you wont be sorry
wasn't sure at first but after the first wash I really started appreciating it. Good stuff

This soap.. is very much exactly what my title declares. Amazing feeling, scent, I was nervous of the commitment but well worth it and I'm now thinking of becoming and sopscriber. Only negative is that I couldn't find one lol. I used the Pine scent one its just amazing. Hopefully you make the choice to get one. Any reviews under 4 stars is a LIE get one NOW lol!!
This is my favorite soap! It tingles on the skin. Definitely, a good buy!

review_title: Great Soap with the Smell of the Woods
review_content: Very happy with the soap and how it cleans. Would like a little less abrasiveness - this soap is not for the faint of heart. It is bold but that is why you buy it.

This soap is hands down fantastic. Saw it on my first nervous sojourn into the land of Birchbox but they were out of the Pine Tar, so I instead went right to the Sasquatch site itself. I got Pine Tar, Cedar Citrus and Gold Moss Scrub. They're all great. Get you clean but don't dry you out, and smell real good and different but not overpowering, in an Axe-y way. Will definitely be purchasing again.
Love this soap. Normal soaps always leave my skin feeling dry, itchy and tight. This soap however, leaves leaves my skin feeling refreshed. Will definitely be getting more soap.
Terrific soap.

The pine tar soap is fantastic. Smells great, and the oatmeal is great for exfoliation. I love that I can use this on my beard as well as my body, as it softens my facial hair without leaving residue. Bought one bar and quickly signed up for a soapscription!

I use it daily, and love it. I'll definitely be buying more. This stuff is quality, smells great, and eases the mind knowing its a handful of ingredients. Awesome pine scent. Girlfriend said "You smell awesome". Keepin' her. 
 
Only thing that made it 4/5 stars... $5 shipping? Is that the standard rate?

review_title: Bigfoot hates baths, Yeti loves The Sasquatch Soap Co.
review_content: See what I did in the title, pretty clever €¦ Nah who am I kidding, that's not even remotely funny, unless you think it is, in which case that's exactly what I was going for. Seriously, let's get to the soap review. I purchased the Bay Rum because that has always been my favorite scent in any soap. Dr. Squatch has a great soap here. I can't believe how clean I feel, and my skin is so soft, like lose my man card soft. It's such a great way to start my day. Normally I roll around and put off getting out of bed until the last second, but recently I have been up early because my morning shower is refreshing and get's me ready for the day. Mama Squatch says I smell good too, which is great. Little squatches keep sneaking my soap out of the shower, however they are not smart squatches because their smooth skin and great smell tips them off every time. I think I'm either going with the sampler pack next or the monthly delivery, this stuff is perfect.
Great scent and leaves my skin feeling so soft. Love it!
How can you not like any soap that comes in a cigar box and makes you smell like man.

review_title: Great exfoliant, but smell doesn't last
review_content: I never considered myself to have sensitive skin, but at times it felt like I was washing with sandpaper in my shower. The soap smells good, but doesn't linger once you step out of the shower like most high quality soaps. I will likely try something else.
Love it
This soap was awesome, best I've used, going to buy more for sure
My boyfriend uses this soap and he smells amazing! When I'm missing him I'll grab his jacket (which smells like him) & cuddle with it. Don't tell him though...that may sound a little crazy! Lol
it is great soap, i wish the lasting scent was stronger. I'll be putting in my next order very soon to try them all.
this soap is amazing!! Smells excellent and works great!
The soap is great, love the smell and the all natural ingredients.

Smells good, doesn't dry out my skin, I feel clean and refreshed for hours after a shower. I'm a personal trainer so sweating is my gig. The only problem I have with it is it seems to go pretty fast! Other than that, it's a very wonderful product!

Not for the faint of heart, Pine Tar is eye-opening and refreshing. Be prepared if you use the bar directly on your skin, as its rite of passage like walking on broken light bulbs or swallowing fire -- the sand in the bar is closer to gravel. Say goodbye to dead skin, and maybe a layer or two of the good stuff. But there's something very rewarding about using Pine Tar that starts my day off right. Like, if I can get through that, I can tackle anything this day can throw at me. Highly recommend.
The soap smells great and works well but 6 dollars for shipping is outrageous.
Common statement when using either of the cologne samples. The smell of each one is woodsy and manly but not overpowering.
Just received my cologne samples (although neither one was labled) and will put in my order soon. When I order, I think I can guess which one is which from the descriptions online!
Pine Tar is the Truth and the many other selections all are great quality. I love the wooden soap holder too
But it hydrates my skin better than music hydrates my soul!

review_title: Love the Smells, but leaves my skin dry
review_content: I am currently using the Bay Rum and my skin has never felt so dry. I love the scents, so I will continue to use them, if only every couple of days or only on special occasions. This has made me demote my soapscription to one every month. Might have to end up using the soaps only for my hands. Hope this is helpful to someone.
These colognes accent the manliness of my beard. Thanks Dr Squatch!
Very happy with the products I received! I will definitely be referring people to your company and will be ordering from you again very soon! Thanks and keep it up!
My husband loves these soaps!

review_title: Love everything but the cost of getting it
review_content: Love the product, but the cost + shipping makes it a bit crazy for something that lasts 15 days.

i absolutely love this soap. I got Bay Rum, Pine Tar and Gold Moss. I've been using the Pine Tar but haven't had a chance to try the others. They smell absolutely fantastic. It lathers up nice and gets you clean. My only gripe is I wish the bars were bigger. Old Dr. Squatch will be my soap from here on out.

review_title: I need an excuse to shower more often
review_content: This soap is something else. It smell incredible and it makes you and your bathroom smell incredible. The oatmeal and sand are coarse (a little surprising at first) but not painful. When you use this soap, you can feel it cutting into the dirt, sweat and dead skin, allowing you to shed your molt and step out of the shower feeling clean, fresh and new.

The soap saver is a cool product. It does a great job keeping that scummy leftover layer off of the surfaces in the shower. 
 
ONE THING: put an extra later of bubble wrap around it or start packaging it in a padded box if it own!! It was snapped in two when it got to me. It was easy enough to glue together, but immediately after pulling it out of the package I knew why it wasn't still in one piece. It's extremely delicate. Take precautions. 
 
Overall a good product. Nice fresh smell and helps keep things clean, but it is fragile and should be packed as such.
excellent. imagine it can even clean a yeti successfully.
nuff said

review_title: Great unique smell, not sure if I could afford a whole bottle
review_content:
Both scents have a great earthy/woods smell. My wife said she liked them both. I'm just not sure I can afford $42 for a 1 oz bottle 
 
I also expected them to come labeled like in the photo, however the instructions said to differentiate by noticing which liquid was darker
Fantastic soap! Been using it for a couple of weeks, as shampoo, face, beard, and body. Smells great, works even better.
The feel and scent are AMAZING!! Never going back to regular soap. Much thanks!!!
Nice masculine scent used as a face soap... Half way through the day I could still smell the scent on the beard. I enjoyed the Greek yogurt the most for a body soap. Good scent and moisturizer.

I really enjoyed using this soap, I had the Gold Moss, and Pine. 
I found the scents pleasant but not over powering. My only two complaints is the short life of the tiny bars and the cost of shipping. If they offered free shipping, I would be inclined to become a regular customer, I already mail order my razors.

I ordered a few different products to try. Right now I am working on the Pine Tar. It smells incredible and lathers well. It does exfoliate and is a little rougher (in a good way)so if you have sensitive skin, take note.
Just smells so darn good. Can't resist the squatch
I bought Pine Tar and Gold Moss since it's winter, I haven't used the Gold Moss but Pine Tar is great! I just wish the bars lasted a little longer!
Awesome stuff
thanks
after my friends nicknamed me Sasquatch for my size I knew I had to try this soap. And now that I smell like a man, I can't wait to get my hands on more
have to hide from my wife
so fat I'm happy with the soap and the cologne samples. Looking forward to trying the other scents.

review_title: Great soap, unfortunately doesn't last long.
review_content: smells great, fantastic soap, unfortunately after 5 showers it dissolved
Everything was in optimal condition. Cologne smells great
Soap and cologne are great! Very good price as well. Thank you.
Finally can smell like a man should and not like the A&F store at the mall.
Awesome!

I think gold moss is just great, it smells great and I like how after wards the scent still stays in a very light manner that isn't overwhelming at all. Definitely worth buying many more times and I look forward to trying other things from Dr. Squatch
Just tried my new/1st order of Gold Moss soap. It's awesome! I look forward to trying additional products by these guys!

review_title: Great feel, but kinda girly smell
review_content: Love the soap, not so much the fragrance. 1st soap I thought smelled somewhat feminine. Still gets ya clean and squeaky!
Pine Tar leaves you smelling amazing and feeling great. I wake up looking forward to showering with this goodness.

review_title: I'm a lumberjack and I'm okay
review_content: The best smelling soap I've ever used. I love it, my girlfriend loves it, there's just nothing bad about it. The golden moss is my favorite, but each soap I've tried smells great and is totally worth it. I just started using the cologne and I'm a huge fan of that too. Really manly stuff there.

The natural oils are awesome! I have moderately dry skin and now get out of the shower feeling good instead of like I was washed with Witch Hazel! 
 
I now use Dr. Squatch Soap for shaving as well because the oils in the soap leave my skin feeling great! 
 
Hey Dr. Squatch, how about making some shaving balm (or whatever you wanna call it) specifically for shaving?
i got the gift box for my hubby, whom is a squatch. He loves it, and I think the scents are perfert for the type of folks we are. Neither of us are into strong perfumes, colognes, etc. Thank you

I love the smell of the soap and the way my skin feels after a shower. The bar doesn't slide very well across my skin, not the way the Eucalyptus bar did. That's the only thing keeping this from being a 5 star product. Regardless, I'll be ordering more.

So far I've tried the pine tar and the bay rum soaps and I have to say they are some of best soaps I have ever used. I like pine tar soap and have tried many and yours is by far the best and I will definitely be ordering again
Both scents were a little too heavy for me. Not bad but not me
Awesome soaps. All smell good and clean like no other soap... Worth the price!

It took a couple weeks to finally arrive, but I am extremely satisfied. I've stopped using shampoo and instead have opted to use my Cedar Citrus bar, and it leaves my hair feeling thicker and healthier than it has in some time. It does what it says it does, it smells fresh, and a single bar has lasted me almost two months. Definitely recommend.
was looking for a soap with quality natural ingredients that smelled great - jackpot!
It scratches €”but in a good way.
I would expect an oil fragrance to last a bit longer
I'll never not use Dr. Squatch again.

I like your products. I am enamored by Cool Fresh Aloe and Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt. These scents are manly enough to ward off a foe and quell odoriferous emanations. Finally a man's naturally made soap.... lavender is for the feeble.

I love this soap. I've been using it for about 3 months now and will continue to do so. The bars tend to last just under a month. Smells great and I feel good knowing that I'm not trashing my body with harsh or unnatural chemicals.

I'm sure he samples are wonderful. My fiancÃ:copyright: loves your products.. However, I have not received them and I wanted to give them to him on Valentine's Day so he could choose one to buy! Where are hey!?!?

My dr. squatch soap is great. 
 Far exceeded my expectations, smells great and all natural. Really like the cigar box aswell. 
Will definitely order again.
Loved the scent, and was a great soap, but breaks apart way too easily and the bar is halfway done after only a week. Maybe a work in progress...
your soap is the shit and my girlfriend loves the smell of it.
Men nod in respect, women turn there heads and animals do my bidding, thanks to that amazing smell protruding from my body.
I've tried three different products and I've been satisfied with each. Always coming back for more!
No friggin clue
Got 6 different soaps. My favorite by far is the golden moss. I smell like god now.
the cleanliness and feel of Driftwood puts all other bars to shame.......excellent work, fabulous scent!

review_title: I Would Love To Review This, But I Still Haven't Received It After 17 Days
review_content: Ordered 17 days ago. Unacceptable.
Bay Rum, what can I say... it will make you smell like a boss! Old school scents with more swagger than grandad!
I've been wanting to try out the soap, and this was a great way to sample a couple of different bars!

I like the soaps a lot. Love the package too. I do think for $6.00 a bar I am struggling to see the value in them but I do like them. I have used 2 bars so far and enjoy the scents and the exfoliating feel I get from them. They last about 10 showers but when it comes down to it not something I would buy on regular basis but would like to have on occasion. As much as I enjoy them I do not see spending $25.00 plus a month on soaps. I think you have a good product but I just don't have the budget to buy regularly. Once or twice a year product order for me.

It doesn't smell like bay rum or ANY variation of bay rum out there in the world/woods. It has more of a pine smell than anything else. Unless I happened to get a bar from a bad batch, I can't recommend this to anyone.

Have really enjoyed your product; but unless it comes down in price (by at least 50% per bar), you won't have a repeat customer in me. Again, dynamite product, but too expensive for my tastes! RL, California

These scents represent the best a man can be. Straight wood resides in both samples, with the Driftwood being a smoother & darker smell, while Hemlock trail is sharper, cosisting of more fern and pine.
Enjoying my cleanliness! ... More accurately, my wife is.
My wife day's I smell like "baseball"... Thanks to my pine tar!!!

Based up just the website and the customer service it self i would Have to give you 4 star review. First i have not received my order yet so i cannot review the product itself. Secondly, The reason for only 4 stars and not 5 is because when one of the products I ordered was on back order, I did not receive any notification that delivery would be behind schedule. It was left up to me to contact you to figure out what was going on with my order.
