In my own opinion, this should not be something a customer should worry about, they should be informed as early as possible that something has not gone as planned and the product will be shipped at a later time. Besides that the website is very easy to use as well as good descriptions of products to allow you to choose what may suit you best. Once I was in contact with customer support, they were very friendly and responded to me in a reasonable time frame and let me know exactly what was going on, while giving me options to help with getting my product here as quickly as possible.
This soap works wonders on my plaque psoriasis. It removes loose skin and stops the constant itching.

The best soap I have never used. I have ordered the soap almost three weeks ago and still have not received the bar. I was thinking about soap of the month but now I am having second thoughts. The soap may actually be great I just don't know. Because I have yet to receive my order. Pleas just communicate if the soap is out of stock send an email.

The exfoliation of the Pine tar soap feel as good as scratching a bug bite. Aaahhhh that's nice. The smell makes me feel like the king of the Northwoods! Like a man should feel. Bonus, the lady friend loves how my skin feels and smells.... thank you Squatch.
Seems to work ok so far. Doesn't smell as strongly as I thought it would.

review_title: Good attempt, but not quite there..
review_content: I feel like they were going for a woodsy, manly scent, which they accomplished. However, when I wear the cologne, I feel like I smell just like a tree, and not in a pleasant way. I think it just needs a little tweaking to be perfect, but it's not quite there yet.

Got Hemlock Trail and Driftwood cologne and they both smell amazing. 10/10 for products. there was a small error with receiving a shipping notification but nothing super important! Overall Great products!
This is some of the best soap I've used after sampling several different local companies.
It never arrived in the mail.

I am very pleased with this cologne and need to order a full-size bottle of the Driftwood. The scents are not overpowering and are manly. 
 
Excellent work, Dr. Squelch. As always, you guys knock it out of the park.
I can't say enough good things about you're products. Simply put, you guys f**king rock! My order arrived in what seemed like minutes and the scents are amazing. Keep up the amazing work.

I gave as Valentine gift to my husband and son. They loved the soaps and the packaging, cigar box! We could not be happier with the lush feel and fragrance of each soap. Customer Service the best when I needed ordering help!

i went into a drug store the other day and decided to check out the colognes. The lady who helped me had me sample all the ones that were her favorites and I noticed a trend. They were all feminine smelling. i asked her if maybe she was mistaken and these were actually the womens perfumes but she insisted that they were for men. I ended up having to purchase a bottle of whiskey and pouring it on myself to cover up that feminine odor. There were none of these problems with Dr. Squatches Hemlock Trail. If you wear this you will be the manliest smelling man in the room. I wore this scent to work one day and my boss was so impressed about how manly I was he couldn't help but give me a raise.

review_title: Absolutely the most badass soap on the planet
review_content: every single product I've received from you guys has been perfect. Everything smells perfect and I can't wait for you guys to only make more and more awesome products. On a side note my most recent order has taken two weeks to get here not because of you guys, you're not to blame. However, could you try not using UPS as a shipping method they haven't been a dependable delivery method.
My husband liked the soaps that I bought him for a gift.
So good I leave it on my nightstand after I use it just so I can smell it while I'm laying in the bed.

review_title: Products? Great. Website and service? Not so much.
review_content: I really like the soaps that Dr. Squatch makes: they smell manly and they're extremely refreshing to use in the morning. I'm going to be a customer for a long time €”but I have some requests. First, please let someone knowledgable about punctuation and grammar proofread the website. The website and product descriptions contain a lot of personality and uniqueness, but there's still some polishing up to be done. Second, my order took almost 20 days to ship. I'm completely fine with waiting if something is backordered, but I would appreciate an email letting me know that shipping might take a bit longer than usual. As I said before, I really like the company and the products, and I want to see you guys get better as you grow.

I ordered the gift box since I couldn't decide on just one scent, and of course the first I tried (Gold Moss) may be my favorite! Soap saver was a great investment as well! Thanks for a great product, you've got one more lifetime customer here.

review_title: Hard to review when I don't have it yet.
review_content: I expect it to be awesome when it arrives.
This thing is great! My soap lasts way longer than it did without the save, and the saver looks awesome!

review_title: What I've Been Missing in My Life...
review_content:
I bought the Dr. Squatch for my beard. Now that I've used it, I'm both happy and sad. Happy because it smells wonderful and makes my beard soft and manageable, and sad because it makes me realize I've become a domesticated beast. I long to run naked beneath old growth trees, to bathe in a cool stream, to escape from my life of suburban boredom and experience the adventure that Dr. Squatch smells like. My wife says it smells good too... and to go shovel the walk. 
 
I'm wild! I smell like Dr. Squatch soap! I won't be tamed, woman!
Great smelling soaps. Unfortunately, each 5 oz soap bar I have used so far only lasted about 2 weeks. That can be pretty expensive at $6.00 a bar.
Wonderful smell, my skin feels better than ever (never thought I would care about that) and an overall great product. Keep it up Squatch Clan!

5 Star Smell, 2 Star Soap. Smells great. No, not great. Awesome. Absolutely love the smell. Yep, it's black. Doesn't bother me, in fact it's kinda cool if color matters for a soap. Unfortunately the smell seems to disappear after I dry off and leave the bathroom. Why only 2 stars? I've used it for a week and it's almost gone. But the exfoliating "oatmeal" isn't like any oatmeal I've ever seen. Pretty sure it's actually gravel, and it's way too rough - it's way rougher than any Lava or other gritty soap that I use in the garage. Guess I'm not man enough. If it wasn't for the awesome smell I would give it 1 star.

review_title: A Perfect Gift for a "Natural Man"
review_content: My husband is really hard to buy for, especially when it comes to toiletries. Does not like chemicals, or obtrusive smells. He loooves these soaps! He says they are super-smooth, lather up easily and smell great. And the all-natural ingredients are a big plus. Will order a soapscription next. Thank you, Dr. Squatch!
This is quality soap, as long as it lasts. The soap deteriorates quickly for the price of one bar.
good soap.
I don't have to justify my statement that this is the best soap ever. Try it, and you will never have to justify another statement in YOUR life. Just like me,

I recently purchased the Pine Tar soap to try. I am a fan. The smell of pine tar is near to me since I played baseball through college. unfortunately now that I'm at a desk job I don't get to play baseball or trek through the wilderness as often as I should like, but I can shower with this soap and then watch the Hobbit on BlueRay and feel like I'm going on an adventure! On a side note I had a touch of chlorine rash the other day. Scrubbed it away with the Pine Tar soap. It hurt like hell but the rash was gone in the morning. If none of that has convinced you perhaps telling you that wave upon wave of girls have been flocking to me since I started using this soap. Ok, that last part isn't true but I wanted to sound like some other reviews for this soap. 
 
In all seriousness though, this is a quality soap with natural exfoliants and a great smell. I recommend it. If you are a person that takes a strangers advice over the internet then you should buy this soap.

review_title: Site was quick, accurate, products a little off
review_content: The bayrum soap beyond awesome makes me feel old school 50's mad man. The moss soap i was disappointed in, it seems to be the sites best seller. It smells more like hippy patchoili and less woodsy moss

review_title: I €:tm:ve never been so excited to use soap before
review_content: Love the scents of the soap and the cologne and the cigar box was very nice too. SO far I have only used the Pine Tar. The scent is great. My husband and I both love it. Washing each €:tm:s other €:tm:s backs definitely walks a fine line between pleasure and pain. I have only had to use the safe word once. It is great soap and look forward to using more.
I would buy more, or join the monthly plan if shipping was cheaper. I do live in Indiana.
Great exfoliator! Definitely will be purchasing again

I ordered a selection of soaps to try out and must say that I can €:tm:t speak highly enough about this product - great lathering characteristics, great aroma, and long lasting too. I will be buying more for sure!!

I liked driftwood better of the two but both products were great if you want to smell like the kind of man who can fell a tree with an axe, or navigate the high country with ease. And why wouldn't you want to be that kind of man? Well maybe you're a cube dweller with baby soft hands who can barely find his way to the copier room, at least this way you can smell like the kind of man you want to be.
Great smelling soap, but the sand is incredibly scratchy and has actually cut me on several occasions. Moreover, the sand clogs the drain in my shower.
Wonderful good smells.
Got this on a whim and have been very pleased with the product overall. Would definitely recommend.
I like this soap very much. The scrub was pretty intense, but the soap smelled rad.
Great soaps and I like the scents.

review_title: Great but man does it scrape
review_content: love the soap, also bought the rum smelling one. I like that the pine soap is abrasive, but not sure if everybody will, that and is intense!
The product description says this soap is for manly men, but it's great for ladies, too. Once my skin got used to the intense exfoliation, I was in love.
One of the manliest soaps around, wonderful smelling, Great... Thanks

Like it says in the title, these are quality soaps. Scents are incredible, only issue is they don't remain on my body for too long after I'm out of the shower. Would be 5 stars if this could be remedied.
honestly got a headache with the first waft of the stuff...kinda disappointed with the smell and kinda want my money back...I'd be willing to send them back for it

Couldn't decide on just one bar so I bought the Gold Moss, Pine Tar, and Bay Rum. I've never been a bar soap guy but I am now! The soap smells great and a little bit goes a long way. Will be buying more
Still using the Gold Moss,but if Cedar Citrus is anything like that then Five Stars is what it gets. The Dr. Squatch got the remedy
Smells amazing and I can't wait to use it!
My husband is a fan now and we will be buying monthly
But apparently the post office didn't forward my mail to my new address, so I never got it.
Masculine scent and nice exfoliation. Would buy again if it lasted me longer.

my boyfriend was completely surprised and loved the gift set. He says the goats milk soap makes the skin so soft in these cool winter months. The hemlock cologne is very natural smelling in the most alluring way.

I picked up Gold Moss Scrub, Pine Tar, and Bay Rum. I extremely like the Bay Rum, the smell is the best one out of the three for me, and I'll be purchasing more. I am using the gold moss now and the smell is great on that one too. I've also noticed that I dry off faster using this soap. Might sound crazy but I do! I have soft water where I'm at but using this soap makes it feel like hard water, I dry off quicker, awesome smells, cleaner non- greasy feeling. You'll be happy with their soap, I am!
The Gold Moss Scrub is like bathing in the pure extract of all that is good in the world. I'm never going back to commercial soaps.

i opened the cool fresh aloe first, what a mistake it smells so good I don't want to use the others. It's a nice fresh scent that stays with you for a while I could smell it hours later on my arms still. I highly recommend this product and I can't wait to try the other 3 I got!

The cologne in these samples is awesome. It's difficult to find cologne with quality ingredients and essential oils, and this is exactly that. I was very surprised at how long the scent lasts. I expected it to fade, but hours after I applied just a little I could still smell it. Great product, and a great company!
I love the pine tar scent. The soap leaves my face smooth and without overdrying/tightness.
I'm sorry to say that the soap stuck to it and left a good size chunk behind when I tried to break it loose. I will try and treat it with bee's wax and or oil before I feed it to the wood stove. Mac
This is my second order placed and I can say you have a customer for life! Great product keep up the great work!
the soaps at dr. Squatch are nice and reasonable priced. Some of the fragrances are really strong but smell nice once you wash with them and aren't over powering once you wash with the soap
Have to admit it, the chicks dig smelling me and I ain't complaining! You rock Dr. Squatch

The hemlock trail smells great, however the bottle was smashed during transport so when I received the package the contents had soaked the envelope and my soapes. This was unfortunate, but nothing to be done with, the envelope smells great so I now keep it in my room in order for my room to smell nice, it really does take me back to the woods and it definetly is an organic smell for the manly gentleman!
It was really creamy and lathered great. Nice scent too.

Got the box for my self so I could pick a favorite soap. The soap rocks I have short hair so I use it on my side hair as well. It leaves your skin so clean you could eat off it...but don't cause then you will have take another shower. Great soap I am signing up for that send some every month thing ASAP.
Love it!!! Little goes a long way and it's perfect for rubbing into your beard
Awesome soap, fresh scent yet manly. Wifey loves the smell on me. I was hoping it was a bit rougher though, more exfoliant.
We would have given it 6 stars if there had been shredded $ instead of shredded cardboard cushioning this exquisite soap in it's awesome cigar box.
smells great

When I first ordered this soap I was worried, as I'm sure you are now, that I wasn't manly enough. Then I decided to roll the dice. And I'm glad I did. I'm not going to sit here and promise you that this soap will change your life, but I will say that if you don't order it, you'll spend the rest of your life wondering what must have been. If you're a man, and you'd like to smell like one, order Dr. Squatch's Pine Tar. I promise you won't be sorry. Unless you hate to smell awesome, in which case you'll be horroribly sorry.

I €:tm:ve never really given much thought to soap €¦if it smells good, I €:tm:ll use it. I had this suggestion pop up in my Facebook news feed one day and decided to give it a shot. I €:tm:ve never been so excited about soap until after I used this. Great stuff, smells amazing (and the scent LASTS) and love that it €:tm:s handmade. Keep up the great work, Doc!
i really like the soap, but it's covers our white shower tile in black residue. Would like to try one of the non black soaps as I had to relegate this one to the bathroom sink.
I have only tried the Pine Tar so far.. but if the other soaps are anything like this one I'll definitely be a customer for a long time! Smells great and cleans everything- hair, beard, and body.
Exactly what I wanted

review_title: Deluxe Gift Box Review(I bought it for myself)
review_content: The Hemlock Trail organic cologne is great, will definitely purchase again. The soaps are cool and manly. Would make a great gift for any man in your life, or yourself, like I did. Great way to get a sampling of the products.

I was first told about Dr. Squatch soap by a fellow poster on bodybuilding.com 
I went ahead and ordered 2 Gold Moss and 1 Pine Tar. My order ended up taking nearky two weeks to arrive due to some delays with the soap saver product. Dr. Squatch took care of me and my soaps arrived soon after. 
 
WELL WORTH THE WAIT. 
 
I'm glad I opted for the soap saver as it smells great. The Gold Moss smells and feels amazing and I'm really enjoying taking my showers now. I can't recommend these soaps enough, I will be a returning customer for a long, long time. These products are great and I appreciate the good customer service. These guys have my loyalty.

I got some of these for my husband and I tell you, they smell soooooo good on him! *bow chicka bow wow*

 New customer chiming in: Just get some.

When I first received it I had an overwhelming impression of a christmas candle and was not feeling it at all. However when I actually used it, the scent really opened up and was as promised a manly cinnamon scent that has really been growing on me as of recently.
Very pleased. Bought all 8 soaps and have started with the Aloe given the winter has been awful.
The soap saver that came with my order, is great. Very nice wood grain. Looks and feels woodsy. With the black pine tar soap sitting on it, my wife said it makes it look squatchy.

Ordered one bar of pine tar and one bay rum. Plenty of other reviews have gone on at length about the intensity of the pine tar. The pine scent is crazy-potent and the exfoliants are like 20 grit sand paper and crushed glass. Great if you need to take off a year of grime and dead skin. Otherwise? It might be more than you need. This might not sound like a glowing review, but the fact is? Coarseness aside? I like the bar. I was just a bit surprised to see how rapidly it diminished. somewhere around 8 - 10 showers in, it was a thin shadow of its former self. Coming from a different brand of hand-cut soap sold in 3.5 oz cubes that survived a month+ in my shower? I guess I expected more from the larger Dr. Squatch bar. Seems like the oatmeal and sand combine to make the bar less dense, so it just goes a lot faster. As for the Bay Rum? I just switched over to it. Love this scent (as does my wife - much more so than the Pine Tar). In fact, I like it enough so sign up for a subscription. Time will tell if it outlasts the pine tar!
Love the pine tar soap! have psoriasis and a irritated scalp,and it have improved alot the last month! maybe its the soap,nevertheless it smells good!

review_title: Natural soap that actually lasts all day
review_content: I bought the Moss soap for the shower and the Bay Rum to use as shaving both have been really great smelling, and last til the end of the day

I wanted to love this product - my fraternity brother started it and I like the idea of it being so natural - but unfortunately I had to throw out both bars after a few days. It made my skin incredibly, painfully dry and I broke out in a rash in several places. It is worth noting I don't have sensitive skin. Within a few days of going back to my regular soap my skin was back to normal. Bummer.
Your soap is amazing! Shipping was fast and I highly enjoy the soap.You will be hearing from again!
good soap. Smells manly not perfumy. I'll be buying more

Been searching high and low for a nice gritty exfoliating soap. I finally for you guys. The Pine tar soap is awesome. It's like showering with sandpaper and that's EXACTLY what I wanted. 
One suggestion though, maybe make some of your other scents available in that level of exfoliation too? I also bought the golden moss scent and I love it too, but it's not as rough.
Very moisturizing soap. Skin is not dried out after using soap. Very light scent not overpowering.
i want my entire house to smell like the soap and clean as well as it does

review_title: A Bar of Forested Mountain Majesty
review_content: Great scent and the exfoliating oatmeal literally does feel like scrubbing with a forested mountain, but in the best way possible.
Best soap I ever used! Smells amazing! Leaves your skin feeling really clean and fresh! I can't wait to get a shower just to smell the soap and feel so clean!

I have been trying to find a bar soap that smells great and doesn't dry out my skin for years. I'm a guy, so I like things to be simple, and these bar soaps are just that. They have all the ingredients that my skin loves, and they clean without my skin feeling tight and flaky afterward. One of my packages was stolen from my front door after it was delivered, and Dr. Squatch replaced it free of charge. Not only are their soaps great, but their service is even better. 5 Stars!

Between my career as an EMT and cross-training, I don €:tm:t have any interest in being the girl in the room who smells like flowers and cotton candy. My soap has to smell like I give a shit, but it also has to work. Your product does both. I €:tm:ll keep buying it if you keep making it. Thanks!
Love the smell! Works great!

In this cyber-paradigm of cheap automatons roaming the Earth in simulated skinsuits, it can be hard to tell the difference between your real friends and the insidious artificial humanoids. Dr. Squatch provides a solution. The invigorating aromas and clean natural functionality of the Doctor's soaps stimulate the deepest primal recesses of a true human's brain. No silicon processor can replicate a real person's relaxed appreciation of the piney, earthy scents and good scrubbing lather from a chunk of Dr. Squatch in the shower. Activate your biology.

I'm already hooked on this soap! So simple, pure, and incredibly effective! It smells great, exfoliates, cleans, and invigorates my skin! I will certainly continue to use this great product. Thanks Dr. Squatch for staying true to your values and offering what the people want. Hooray!!
I like the oatmeal and the smell

I saw the ad for Dr. Squatch's soap on Facebook, and the cartoon image of Dr. Squatch caught my eye. After looking through the site, I decided to try to Gold Moss soap. It arrived smelling just as nice as the reviews had said. It lathers easily and seems to exfoliate well too. The cold, dry winter had been drying out my skin, but since using Gold Moss, I haven't had that itchy, dry skin. I'll definitely be ordering again.

review_title: Very easy UX. I'll be coming back.
review_content: Loved the ease of use throughout the site. Found what I was looking for quick, and had it on my doorstep even quicker. Well, not AS quick, but we'll blame that on the distance. C'mere...gimme a hug.
Soap has a nice smell and doesn't dry out my skin.
My boyfriend smells so good now :)
It's a great product. The scent isn't overbearing and it isn't harsh on the skin. Overall I am extremely satisfied with your product. I definitely will purchase more in the future.
Man up and just buy it already! It's awesome!

My first purchase was the Gold Moss. My bathroom smells great because of the soap. The soap has been great so far. I've know bought the Pine Tar and the cologne testers. 
Great products

review_title: Soap Saver is a Soap Eater!
review_content: I'm not sure if I received a defective product, but my Soap Saver just eats soap. What I mean is, after I'm done using the Squatch soap (loving it, highly recommend the soap) I place it in the saver. When I come back the next day, I have to pry it off the saver because it's stuck to it so much. I have chunks all over the saver from where I ripped the soap off. Not sure if this is a bad item, or the way it works for everyone, but very disappointed because for $15, it should not be eating my soap!

review_title: Smelling like the forest never felt so clean!
review_content: Love this stuff!! Takes a few days to get used to the strength of the smell but it is great! As a side benefit it seems to clean great as well!

My husband and I both use some of these and the are amazing! I used to always have really itchy skin after showers, when I use these products I never have that issue anymore. My husband loves them on his beard as well.
Great soap!!

This is some of the best soap you can find. Smells great, clean and fresh. You don't feel like you are wearing a film. I can't say enough about these soaps. You have to try it to appreciate the quality.

It's a great soap. I like the fresh, vibrant scent. I like a couple of the other Squatch scents better, but I'm still happy with this purchase. And the green swirl action makes it rather attractive looking, too.

This is the 1st Dr Squatch soap I have tried. As others have said the exfoliants mean business!! Very coarse ( I don't use the bar directly on my face) kind of wish was it was a bit more fine and spread out more evenly. Kind of hard to get a good lather with this one but I love the scent, it is quite strong in the shower but not too overwhelming when I get out. Leaves my skin soft. Last just about a month.
 Will definitely be on my next order!!

i like the soap. i love the smell of pine in my bathroom. i dont really smell the pine after i shower. the soap a little rough but that make it manly. i still got other soap i didnt get to used yet. i cant wait to try them all
these soaps (pine tar and greek yogart) smell great, but i only get about a week out of them
Smells great, and leaves you feeling clean and fresh.

review_title: Before Dr.Squatch I only thought I was a man
review_content: After my first use of cool aloe, I immediately grew a luscious beard and a man of chest hair! every woman I encountered just had to grab me and breathe in my wowonderful scent. I later discovered that I had gained the power of chopping down trees with just the edge of my hand as well as wrangle steer with just a glare! I can't thank you enough for bringing out my inner squatch!
It's like bathing in all that is good in the world.

I kind of bought this on a whim, gambling if it would be any good or not. Turns out, it's fantastic. My girlfriend and I both loved the Gold Moss. It replaced my body wash and face wash, left my skin and beard feeling fresh. 
 
Kind of excited to try more flavors.
silky smooth but also gets you clean. Oatmeal does a good job of that. Use it everyday.

I don't know what I was thinking buying this soap. It doesn't last long at all, the smell goes away right when you step out of the shower and the price of each bar is just stupid! $6 plus tax plus $20 shipping plus $21 C.O.D. charge to get it across the border. Ended up paying close to $20 per bar of soap when it was all said and done. That is just INSANE! Never buying any of these products again.
Smells perfect, might be just a little too scratchy though. Hugs and kisses, Jimmy
Decent. I like it and the natural ingredients but it feels more slippery to me than I would expect and the cost is a bit excessive for soap.

I bought it for my fiance and he has never smelt better. It is a lot cheaper then the majority of popular brand name soaps and body washes and the Pine Tar soap works better. My fiance said it was a little extra work to rinse off but the cleanliness from the bar was amazing. I most definitely will be subscribing to the Soapscription!!!
The scent is amazing it lasts for awhile the only complaint is the bar doesn't last long I will buy more in the future but I can't spend $6 a week on soap

After two months of training with the US Army down at Ft. Polk, Louisiana, I came home to upstate NY to find your product waiting on my doorstep. I had heard about your product from an online source and was intrigued by the mountain/woodsy scents and inspired by the quirkiness of your company so I placed an order. After two months of very infrequent bathing, dirt accumulation under the finger nails, and a stench so raunchy my dog wouldn't come near me, your product definitely did the trick. I'm definitely going to be a repeat customer and eagerly await what new products you guys will come up with. Keep Killin it. 
 
-1LT Spicer
Great soap.
WOW. INCREDIBLE PRODUCT. Use it daily, tell every single person I know how amazing it is. Pine Tar for life. Love promoting your stuff on my site
The pine tar soap makes waking up in the morning a pleasurable experience.

hands down best soap I've ever used, also the best smelling soap I've used. I used 3 different bars already, 2nd order is in for the rest of the soaps I haven't used yet. I will never use anything other the Dr Squatch again. I also tried the colognes and they are great.

An absolutely Devine product!!! We now sell 6 Dr. Squatch bar soaps at our fresh seafood stand. Our market is on the national register.....We are located at the oldest continuously running Farmers market in the Nation "The Broad Street Market" in Harrisburg, Pa. 
 
Just because we're fish mongers doesn't mean we're gonna be smelling like fish!!!! 
 
Pine tar is the pick of the litter but my girl friend really enjoys the spearmint basil as well!!!

I gotta say. I really like the Cedar Citrus bar €¦ The scent is a bit subtle, but the soap lathers up well and feels very smooth and creamy. Does the job and my girlfriend loves the scent! Ill be back for more. Love the soap, guys!
I love the smell and the feeling from washing with this soap. I'm not sure about a men's soap with soy in it but other than that I like it and will get more
Great products, makes me smell and feel like an unsolved mystery!
I liked both bars of soap. I liked the scent of Gold Moss a little more. Only negative thing is I thought they would last a little longer. My Pine Tar bar only lasted 2 weeks.

I've been on the lookout for a piney soap for a long time now, and while I could theoretically take the ole' floor approach and bathe in Pine-Sol, I've heard industrial cleaning products are generally unhealthy for the skin. In comes Dr. Squatch. 
 
It's exactly what I was hoping for. It's a crisp pine smell that's not overbearing, and seems to exfoliate the skin. Though I admit that as a man using pine scented soap, I don't really and shouldn't know exactly what that means, but I definitely feel the bar grinding the grime off me with a deep, dark lather. 
 
Even the customer service is great. USPS claimed to not be able to deliver my package, and within a day, Dr. Squatch already had another package in the mail. USPS eventually delivered my original package, but Dr. Squatch refused to accept a return. I'll be smelling good for a while, thanks!
First ordered Cedar Citrus, Bay Rum and Cool Fresh Aloe they all smell really good and moisturize well, will definitely try others
Loves it
This slab of $15 wood is just a more expensive place for the soap to stick to than the shower tile.

review_title: Cool Fresh Aloe/Gold Moss Scrub Reveiw
review_content: I purchased Gold Moss Scrub along with the CFA. I am very very very, highly impressed with the Gold Moss Scrub, though, I have yet to use the Cool Fresh Aloe because I am still working on my GMS bar. Based on the smell of the Cool Fresh Aloe I know I will love it just as much as the Gold Moss. Thanks, Squatch. #TeamSquatch
the holder is great because it truly savedmy soap from being used up. BUT I have a real hard time getting the soap off of the soap holder. It gets stuck to the holder as if it's glued.
That shit smells good as hell! I did involuntary Kegels in my butthole!
It's great! It holds the soap in place and make it last a really long time!
Love the Pine Tar Bar
This is the perfect soap to wash out my swearing son's mouth with, Great scent and he doesn't swear anymore! 5/5
Better for the environment and better for my skin. The scent stays all day. I look forward to my next shipment in the mail!
Great company, great product. Extremely happy with my subscription and could not imagine using any other type of soap. Top three out of all of the scents, although it is very hard to choose.
I liked this scent a lot. Smells like a candle and it lasted a pretty long time. Good soap for sure.

I loved my pine tar soap. It cleans wonderfully, however I found that it simply did not last long enough to be a viable purchase. The bar went quickly, and by the end of one week of moderate use it was a gloppy tarry mess. If I was to come back as a customer it would be because the bars were reformulated to be more "solid" and not deteriorate so quickly.

I liked the idea of the soap saver, so I bought 2 of them -- one for home & one for travel. Whether or not it actually saves the soap is still up in the air, but it seems that its true purpose is to serve as an aromatic soap handle. it smells nice, & bonds with the soap with the strength of a thousand neodymium magnets, creating a nice handle to grab.
I ordered both the Pine and cedar citrus. Although I have yet to try to the Cedar Citrus, I €:tm:ve been very impressed with the Pine. Really great natural product!
Great, light scent. Lathers well. Seems like it will last about 2 1/2- 3 weeks using a mesh body scrubbing pouf.
I gave a gift box to my brother-in-law and he really enjoyed it. This was a really fun and unique gift.

Ordered the Gold Moss and Pine Tar soaps and both smelled great and got the job done. Got a sampler of the cologne too. There is not much difference in smell between the two, so don't spend a lot of time trying to decide which flavor to buy. Both smelled like trees. I would say they are more suitable as beard oil, since the smell does not linger very long on the skin. All in all, solid products that should appeal to both hippies and manly men.
I purchased recently the pine tar soap, it was an enjoyable experience as I enjoy the scent. The clean feeling is enjoyable.

I bought a bar of cedar &citrus and a bar of gold moss scrub. The latter smells wonderful and leaves my skin clean but not dry. The quality of this soap is the best I've used, and is a steal for the price. I can say the same about the cedar & citrus, save for one small thing. I really love citrus and those scents are my favorite, so I was a bit let down by how mildly that bar smelled. However its not enough for me to take a star off. Definitely going to sample all of the wares.
The smell of pine in the morning is a great eye opener, plus the bathroom now has an outdoors smell. The bar is a bit rough at first, but after a few uses its quite refreshing.
By far the best soap I've ever used. Ordered a few bars just to try it out, used it once and instantly ordered 10 more bars.
Smells awesome does a great job.

Best soap on the market today.You can't go wrong w/ whatever flavor you use.This is my fave by far.Gotten comments all week.someone asked me what scent it was and I replied,Squatch's den.lol.cant wait to order the cologne now.im sold on the Hemlock trail one.
lovin it!

Best smelling soap! Love the all natural ingredients. I use it for my body, hair, and face. It has helped clear up my acne better than acne face wash! Lasts a long time when used with a wash cloth! I will be a regular buyer. I may even buy some to wash my motorcycle with!
The pine tar soap is by far my favorite. It smells so fresh and so clean. To top it off my wife loves the smell too. Score!

I ordered this soap for my boyfriend since he always has dry skin from working so hard. He endures hard physical weather through all types of weather. He absolutely LOVES this soap! I can't wait for him to try the other yummy soaps and Dr. Squatch products!!
Smells great, perfect amount of exfoliants. Just ordered another!
I bought this soap for my boyfriend, and he loves it! It has helped his skin so much since he works outside doing physical labor through all seasons!

I have used Dr Squatch soaps since August of 2014. I usually get dry skin in the winter and itch. Dr Squatch soaps have kept me from drying out with no dry skin this year. I thought it would be great to get some of my family using the soap. I sent a Gift Box to one of my Son-in-Laws and it was a hit. The packing is starts off in a cigar box which is cool and then the scents of the soaps are Manly. I great gift for that Manly person.
Smells great-long lasting. Will definitely try other scents and/or re-order Bay Rum. Have tried other soaps purchased on line and was disappointed. Dr. Squatch is a great find for men €:tm:s soap

These here scents will stop babies from crying, make your beard thicker, drop panties in seconds, and stop moving vehicles. It's also possible that you may get a few women pregnant, so make sure to wear a jimmy.

Whether you're a man that works in an office or one that works outdoors, this soap is for you! Wash and scrub the day anew while smelling manly for your significant other. The service provided is top notch and it reflects in their product!

I am an Irish Canadian from Nova Scotia. Living in the surrounding highlands of rural Cape Breton I am surround by beautiful lush forest and the springs of natural lakes. Cool Fresh Aloe reminds me of the environment I'm surrounded by everytime I step in the shower. I recommend Cool Fresh Aloe who wishes to smell fresh out of a fresh water mountain spring deep in the highlands of a forested fantasy.
cant wait to buy more product!

I gave the gold moss as a gift to a friend and he loved it, even his dad wanted to know why he smelled so great. I went back and bought several different scents to try out (pine tar, bay rum and more gold moss). Everyone agreed that gold moss was by far the best. It's warm and musky. Even the boxes smell great! Will definitely purchase again.

The pine tar soap smells good, but it has a very rough texture, and takes a little getting used to. I'm not too fond of the square shaped of this soap, now I realize why most soap is in a bar shape. I bought 3 other different bars, and I will see how I like them when I finish the pine tar.

This Sasquatch knows good value and high quality when sasquatch sees it. Me thought this would be a collection of the "not-as-popular" soaps in cut-rate cardboard cigar box. Sasquatch was happy to discover a real wooden cigar box from Dominican Republic that smell like real cigars, fragrant and lovely. And Sasquatch found good collection of beautiful soap in box. Sasquatch has found new favorites from this box. Sasquatch will order more boxes for his sasquatch-brothers-in-law. Would make good gift for Sasquatch groomsmen or something like dat.

review_title: Bay Rum will make you smell like a clean Jack Sparrow
review_content: After using Bay Rum soap for about a week, my girlfriend told me that I smell so damn good that I am never allowed to use another brand of soap.

review_title: Cedar scrub is good for the garage
review_content: The smell's a little intense for showering, but in the garage after working with oils and gunk, it smells a lot nicer
The cool fresh aloe is great. I use this every morning. So refreshing, best way to get your morning started. So happy I've found Dr. Squatch. Thanks.

i received the pine tar and bay rum soap but ive only used the pine tar so far. People complain about the harshness of the oatmeal as an exfoliant but if you apply it to a wash cloth ir loofa then it is a non issue. To proling use keep it out of the water. I keep mine in a dish behind the shower curtain. The smell is excellent
It's like all the best parts of camping, without the bugs.
Never going back to liquid soap again

I was skeptical. Nevertheless, I jumped off an bought a bar and a soap saver. I have never had soap this good ever in my entire 66 years, and I've had soap made by some of the best soap makers who ever made soap. This soap is the soap to end all soaps! So, take a chance. Jump on off in here and get you some.....
Smells great and works great on body and hair. Will definitely order more.

review_title: Every girl I hug loves the way I smell
review_content: From school gals to grannies they love the way I smell.

Just got this in the mail and just by the scent along I am in love. Its so nice that I knew my soaps came because the little alcove all the apartment mailboxes are hiding it smelled so good when I went to retrieve the mail. If that is how manly I will be smelling I am impressed and my thoughts go towards getting the subscription. Lets see how long the bar actually lasts.
smells like a xmas tree went through a wood chipper
Best soap ever!
I like Squatch soap.

I really want to like this soap more than I do. The smell is great, but almost non-existent after about half an hour. I also love the marketing strategy and the all-natural, manly, wilderness vibe of the brand. The soap itself, however, seems to be withering away rather quickly and I haven't quite had it a week (and no, I don't bathe extremely frequently). I just wish the soap, and the smell, lasted as long as other similar products I've used. Maybe it's just the Gold Moss Scrub, but I figured the "Most Popular Scent" was a good first bet. Overall, I still love the soap. After all, who doesn't like refining their inner Squatch?
OH man loving the pine tar bar! The exfoliation is extreme but it's what I wanted, Awesome scent. Definitely not for the faint of heart but if an extreme clean is desired, this is the answer.
Just wish the scent lasted longer.
Haven't tried it yet, but gold moss is fucking boss. I smell like the inside of Chuck Norris's hat.
Love the scent and makes me feel clean and fresh smelling all day

I have to admit that my first thought after smelling the soap was that it reminded me of my dog's shampoo. However, it didn't take long to mellow into a great masculine scent. It is definitely coarse, which is great.

review_title: Can't get soap off the soap saver
review_content: My bar of cool fresh aloe is currently stuck to the soap saver, so if getting me not to use my soap is considering it a soap saver then it did it's job. However I like to use my soap so I won't be using the soap saver anymore.
I never thought that a soap that was all natural would feel better than any other body wash or soap out there. With this soap you feel so clean and fresh! Great scents!
The fresh sent and smooth texture are refreshing and soothing. My husband loves it!
love the pine tar!!!

review_title: Husband loved it as much as he loves Bigfoot
review_content: I got this gift set for my husband because I like him to be clean and he likes Bigfoot. We're both very satisfied. :)
Sents are different very strong at first and then mellow down to faint. Not quite my husbands sent but still pleasant for someone else.
Great soap, great company, grart product. Thank you.
I bought one or more of each type of the soap, and I love each one. I highly recommend their products to others.
still have 4 bars unopened
Nice soap, but a bar lasted me about a week. I'll go ahead and use it for my beard, but it wood be too expensive to use this soap overall.
best f@&$ing soap I have ever used. Skin feels clean I wish I could have it all. Next to try the smell goods.

review_title: Perfect soaps for the manly Squatch.
review_content: Great scents, big, manly bars. Gold Moss Scrub and Bay Rum are my favorites so far, looking forward to trying them all.

Do you want to smell manly and also good? That is, like a man that has hair on his chest, not like a douche that €:tm:s covered in axe and spray tan? This stuff smells good and gets you clean, but beware: the exfoliating add-in is no joke. If you don €:tm:t have hair on your chest when you start using this soap, you will by the time you finish. Anyways 4/5. Would buy again.

review_title: First Time Dr. Squatch Soap User
review_content: I bought a few bars after seeing them pop up on Huckberry. In general I was satisfied with the product but each bar does not last very long. The bar will shrink down to bits in about two and a half weeks. Also, the pine tar bar is way too rough...felt like I was washing myself with 60 grit sandpaper.
Please make shampoo and conditioner

review_title: Only soap I will ever buy!
review_content: Dr. Squatch soap is great. I have only used one of the bars (Cedar Citrus) and I wasn't a fan at first, but it smells manly and the soap itself feels great on my skin and really makes it feel soft and nourished. What I think about the scents are completely opinionated, but they do all smell amazing. Golden Moss is probably my favorite. Being a guy that never really cared about what soap I use, this really opened my eyes. The cost is comparable when you think about it, since these bars are more ounces than the typical box store brand. I see no problem paying more for a quality product! Thank you Dr. Squatch!
All the soaps smell great, but this is my favorite! Leaves my skin smooth and feeling nourished.

Like others have noted, the bar seems to wear down pretty quickly. That being said, I really don't care. It smells great, my face/beard feels great, and I love the rough texture. I want to sex this soap.

review_title: Unfortunate - did not live up to expectations
review_content: I did not enjoy the pine tar... .it reminded me of cleaning supplies I was greatly disappointed. I will not be re-purchasing soap from Dr. Squelch... I have found my new love in Outlaw Soaps.
I was originally introduced to these products through Bespokepost and just had to have more! I get compliments on my scent all the time.

People ask what I'm wearing and I say "nothing! Just showered this morning!". Pine Tar stays with me all day through regular activities and my daily, sweaty weight training. Before the doctor, apparently I smelled like I didn't shower... Thanks Dr. Squatch!
Great soap, great manly scents, what more could you ask for.
Like all well made/crafted items - form follows function. A quality product that does its job without fuss or fanfare. Cedar scent a plus.
I bought the gift set for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. He said he'll never go back to regular soap or body wash again! The cigar box it came in is really nice too. I highly recommend it!
Lasts long and smells great. Great lather with no lasting residue.
Dr. Squatch is by far the best thing I have ever found made for a man, except for women.
this is a great soap with a milky, natural, manly scent. virtually no lasting scent and zero exfoliation. If you like Pine Tar, you probably won't care for this.
This soap feels amazing on the skin and leaves you feeling and smelling fresh! Awesome soap will buy again!
Enjoying them!
I the gift box with my two sons. We all enjoy the soap!

review_title: Liked it so much, I bought more.
review_content: Bought Pine Tar and Gold Moss Scrub initially. Loved the pine tar/gold moss so much that I bought a monthly subscription. This is the only soap I will use now.

review_title: Great Quality Leaves Me Feeling Great
review_content: I have enjoyed my first week of using Dr. Squatch Pine Tar soap. The smell is subtle at first, but later seems stronger after the smell from the shower emanates into the rest of my apartment. I enjoy the exfoliating elements, which make it feel like I'm getting extra clean and scrubbed down. I think it will last at least another week, but I anticipate it will not last much more than two weeks, as the bar is fairly small. I'm strongly considering signing up for one of the subscription plans. This is a product that I just feel so good about because it is all-natural and has a good scent. I would highly recommend, potentially higher after I try more of the scents. Smell like a natural man!
Every time that I have been to the site, it has been a pleasurable experience. It is a beautiful site.
My soap smells amazing, and there's no gross filmy residue after you rinse! Good stuff, thank you.

I will start by saying that I love the soap. Will be getting more for sure. The soap saver though is no good at all. As others have said, the soap sticks to it very badly and soap is coming off in chunks. I was using the soap up faster by using the soap "saver". It has since found its way to the trash can.
Like the scent and the lather. Great product!
Love the smell, love the scrub, but my Pine Tar only lasted me for 8 showers.

I got the Pine Tar soap. Great lather, amazing manly smell, nice exfoliation. Makes other inferior soaps whimper and cry in the corner. The wife loves the smell...makes her panties drop, so beware! You may be suddenly "busier" than normal.
I love everything about the soap. Not only does it smell great, but it feels clean and doesn't leave my skin feeling grimy or smelling of perfume.
great smell and feel. Little pricey with shipping but quality can be pricey sometimes.
the scent is nice. I wish it were a little stronger and the soap had more latter. Overall a good soap.
My wife's dog took a dump in the bathroom this morning and the smell normally would have me gagging. Thanks to the Squatch for coming to my olfactory rescue. Saved my life, or darn close to it.
i smell delicious.

I love the scent of this soap. If they could make an alcoholic beverage that tasted as this smells it would be more manly than any other drink I know. Until then I'll stick to drinking whiskey and secretly smelling myself. It has little to no exfoliation. Rated the same as the Greek yogurt but lacking any real grit to it. Just smooth all around. It's in my subscription list for sure.

I love love love this soap. I get compliments on the scent and I like that it is subtle, but lasting. My favorite is the Gold Moss Scrub. My only problem is that I wish it wasn €:tm:t in a square shape, but more oblong and easier to hold while washing. Great idea, great product! Looking forward to trying more!
... to being in the woods.

I just want to start off simple and say I love the bay rum scent. It smells great and has a very smooth lather. Now the pine tar doesn't have too much of a pine scent as others I've tried so it's not the best and it is a little coarse on the skin so you can't apply it too harshly if anything I use it more on my beard than my body.

My 1st purchase of pine tar soap had sand in it, but my 2nd purchase did not. I like both and would like the option to buy either one. I did not see sand listed in the ingredients on your website the last time I ordered. Will I be able to order either one in the future?
it last half as long as a regular bar of soap yet cost 3 times as much love the soap but would buy again unless you start making a pack of say 4-6 bars
Dope soap

A square is not a good shape for a bar of soap. It's awkward to hold. I wish they would make their soap in a more traditional rectangular shape which is much easier to hold on to.

Otherwise the soap is high quality, smells great and is gentle on the skin. I love the colognes!
yee yee

I've been using the soaps for a while and I bought the gift box for my brother to try out. When I gave them to him the first thing he said was he loved the (cigar) box that it came in and that he would've been happy with just the box. I told him to open the box. When he did he looked at me and asked me why I bought him soap. I said, "Because now you can smell like a man and not some cheap French wh*re." His wife laughed. Then he started using them. His favorite is the Gold Moss. He's thanked me for them, but his wife thanks me every few days and tells me she loves it when he uses any of the soaps because it turns her on. 
If that's not a good review then I don't know what is.
Love th exfoliating properties, but the scent is gone before I even leave the shower. Also, makes your skin feel really tight like a standard bar of soap. Not really impressed at all!

Bought 4 bars via the website. Only took a week to arrive (I live in New Zealand) am currently using pine tar and it's awesome. Love the smell. Maybe a little mentholy than I imagined but still awesome!

review_title: Only tried two soaps so far.
review_content: The Gold Moss and Greek yogurt pass the test. Gonna try Pine Tar and Citrus next. I have no doubts for them.
Since finding your site and ordering a few soaps, I am now one of the best smelling Squatches in the Great State of Maine. Thanks.
I got the pine tar bar.I love the smell and the exfoliation, but it just doesn't last long enough for me to justify to cost w/ shipping per bar. If I could pick this up in a store I definitely would.

This soap is great. I started out just planning on using it for my beard because I was tired of using something with a lot of harsh chemicals that stripped everything out. After one beard wash, I decided this was going to be my full time full body soap. It leaves you feeling clean without any residue. The smell is great. Not overpowering and not to sweet. It smells like man soap should smell. I'm hooked. I am going to try out one or two others and then just get on the monthly subscription when I know what I like.
Awesome smelling soap!

First look at it made me think "wtf is this s$*". But I was pleasantly surprised at its latheriness and smelliness. 
 
Good stuff.
Fantastic soap! It's as if I'm in a sunlit morning in a Florida orange grove, only to leave my shower to the grey, wet spring of a Minnesota commute.
It wasn't the scent I was expecting. Smells like a Dial soap bar. I like it for the natural ingredients but if I ever buy again it will be something different.

review_title: It's a breath of fresh air
review_content: im a soap whore. And I'm not even referring to the fancy stuff. If you've ever known someone to use a particular brand of soap because of sentimental value please tell them they are not alone. I'm a Zest guy till the end of time but this stuff that Dr. Squatch is putting out just pretty much gave me closure on the soap sentiment. If I want to remember my grand parents I'll hang a picture on the wall. I'll never buy another bar of zest again. Now my soap budget has freakin quadrupled, I've had to take a second job. But I lucked out and score a job at a veterinarian's office spaying cats. I've made tons of extra money on commissions for referrals. All the cats that have been outside my house are now fix and are finally upstanding animals in the community.
Great smell, not as strong as the Pine Tar, also the exfoliants arent as harsh either. Will definately get this one again!!

Your branding is fantastic but your product is nothing stand out. It dry's out my skin like most soap bars do but just smells a little better. Just not worth is for $6 a bar to me. i do like the soap saver, i will use if for my bars of soap from now on.
Tried this with my normal Gold Moss in my first soapscription shipment. Lathers great, but even though this smells great, I prefer the scent of the Gold Moss.
love it smells great!
I really love the smell of this soap. And it makes my beard really soft.

review_title: LOVE THIS SOAP and cologne too!
review_content: Smells great, does not dry my skin. Scent seems to last most of the day. I Keep the spare bars in my sock and underwear drawers, it gives my unmentionables a subtle earthy musk smell with a hint of freshly ground cocoa and added sea salt
Leaves me feeling super clean and fresh, but it honestly does not leave much of an after scent once you get out of the shower
the girls love how I smell!
Great smell and no worries of wierd chemicals in my body!
I will buy more scents and try other soaps! Great product.

review_title: Exactly what I was looking for!
review_content: The search for an organic soap that actually works is finally over, and my skin hasn't looked better in years. This is my number one recommendation when it comes to soap that will heal your skin and leave you smelling great.

review_title: I can't review what I haven't received yet.
review_content:
I am still eagerly awaiting the shipment. 
I was wondering why it isn't here yet. 
Maybe you have some idea why it is taking so long to get here? 
I have ordered other items from other companies since then and already have those items. It seems odd to me that I still haven't received your shipment and yet I am receiving an email from you to evaluate it before it even gets here. Can you let me know what is going on please? Thank you !
All of these soaps smell great (and manly of course), and it makes for a perfect gift for any guy! My boyfriend loves the Gold Moss bar I gave him with his birthday gift.

I had been using liquid store brand body soap for as long as I can remember and when I came across this online I couldn't pass it up. I ordered 4 different bars of soap from Dr.Squatch and this was the first one I tried. I have to say that this is the best smelling soap I have ever used and it keeps me smelling good all day....my girlfriend loves it on me and that's the biggest plus about it. Try it, you wont be disappointed.

review_title: Pine sol in a soap bar!
review_content: It's not bad, it's just clean. Pine sol clean. I wondered where I knew this scent from!

review_title: This company does, in fact, exist...
review_content:
... and they make wonderful soap. Every time I step out of the shower now people hand me glasses of Scotch and high-end cigars. 
 
But seriously, great soap. It smells amazing and doesn't leave my skin dry like my old soap did. And the cedar soap holder is a welcome addition to the shower. The price point might scare you away, but I'd highly recommend trying it out once and then you'll be hooked. The Pine Tar is my favorite so far and I can't wait to try the rest!
just got a bar of the pine tar soap and couldn't be happier. Lathers up great, the scent is amazing, and my beard is nice and clean.

review_title: Great soap! High quality all around!
review_content: I ordered a few bars of their soap a few weeks ago and am extremely pleased. I will be ordering more, shortly. Great product. For those complaining about S&H costs....order more bars and the shipping per bar gets smaller.

review_title: Whether for yourself or another the gift box is just what the Dr, ordered.
review_content: A solid collection of soaps. The soap saver tray is doing its job like a champ. The cigar box was pretty novel and is serving as a junk box of sorts on my dresser now.

I like this soap but I wish it were a bit more fragrant. Could be I'm an old man and there has been some degradation of my olfactory receptors. I'll definitely buy another one and give it another try.
Great gift box ...Love the soaps and the great packaging !!
Guys, you must have this.
never felt so manly and clean at the same time
smelly good but not what i quiet envisioned and the oatmeal is rougher then other exfoliating bars ive used

For years I have been unable to use scented soap because of allergies. Now that I am old enough to research stuff my self, I have been eating more healthy and smelling oh so good with Dr. Squatch Soap. Thanks guys! Keep it up!
Great smell and scrub.
snells incredible and feels amazing! My skin fees like new after using the pine tar soap because of the oils and the extreme exfoliants.
Like golden moss the best.
I love this soap! But $6 for soap that barely lasts a month seems a little on the steep side. I'll prolly still buy though
Incredible scents, and leaves my skin and hair feeling smooth and clean. Seems to have the added effect of helping ward off mosquitoes, which living in Texas is a huge boon.

I'm enjoying the ability to shower and smell like a man afterwards instead of some composition of chemical compounds. The outdoors is where I enjoy being and like being reminded of Mother Earths big beautiful bounty every time I catch a whiff of the subtle fragrance of my driftwood man serum. Thank you. I now believe in Squatch
love this soap
Great aroma and it has just the right amount of exfoliating. The bar seems to last a long time too.
Great smell, moisturizes, smells like I worked in the woods.
i got these gift boxes for my BNL & nephews plus a bar for me. My soap is very nice and the cigar boxes will be appreciated
Took the Bay Rum bar on our trip to Maui! Great way to relax after zip lining, and other outdoor activities! The scent is amazing!

review_title: Awesome soap without the girlie perfumes
review_content: I really like the soaps, smell great but not flowery, and the bar lasts a long time. The package arrived really quick too! Very pleased.

Certainly an attractive storage vessel for my soap AND it absolutely works as described. I dinged the rating because I just can't justify the price for a small strategically cut piece of wood. It is a no-brainer necessity for your soap and the price point probably means they know that too. (Note: they offer it at a discount at $12 add-on when you purchase a soap-sciption). However I do recommend the soap saver.
Leaves me feeling very clean, smells great, and doesn't dry out my skin like the typical soaps. Highly recommended.
First time I ever bought natural soap and I felt the difference. Didn't dry out my skin and I carried the subtle forest-like scent with me the entire day when I use it. I'm getting more for sure.
I'm enjoying my first order of Dr. Squatch soap very much! When this batch is gone, I'll certainly be ordering more.

Heard of your product from a friend, and I thought why not give a natural product a try. I was overly surprised with the great quality for being handmade and and all natural. The exfoliating factor of the pine tar bar will keep me as a customer alone. Can't wait to get back in the shower just to try a new scent. Thanks again, and you will continue to have my business as long as you are open.

This soap is great! A friend from work told me I should check into Dr. Squatch soap and I am impressed. The Pine tar definitely gets the job done. If you're looking for a great manly smell and exfoliation that can't be beat (unless you used sandpaper) then this is the soap for you!
My wife tells me I don't stink anymore after using Dr. Squatch soap.
I love this soap!! It's very refreshing and has a great moisturizing property!! I will certainly pushase this soap again!
Your products are fantastic! Keep up the good soap.

This soap caught my eye instantly, so I bought it. It's my favorite scent from the line up. Growing up in Florida with the smell of citrus all around you, it's reminiscent of that. The cedar is a wonderfully woodsy addition to the soap, and my wife loves it!
This soap smells manly, cleans great, doesn't dry you out like other bar soaps (none of the dr squatch soaps dry you out)
It's a great soap, just not a particular favorite. The smell is nice, and it get you clean
I was not prepared for the smell of the Eucalyptus Greek yogurt soap. It's one of the barrel chested, bearded man smells that i had to order another bar, highly recommended!
This is a scent that keeps giving. Strong cedar and brush Smell. Keeps even the most fickle interested in you for atleast half an hour. Highly recomended. Use in moderation.

After just using a half a bar of soap I noticed that the shower was showing a terrible amount of soap scum that is very hard to clean up. Also, maybe a coincidence, my drain got extremely slow. The scent of the soap is nice but not very strong. Not disappointed that I tried the soap but glad I only ordered one bar and did not subscribe.

Gold moss scrub soap is truly amazing, and has a distinctive smell that truly is a pleasure to be able to surround myself in. I once viewed showering as a mandatory activity that was just routine and had to be done, but now with this, I see showering as a privilage and truly look forward to it. In addition, is acts like sort of an air freshener in my bathroom and makes the whole place smell just beyond great. I am definitely looking forward to trying out new scents, I believe that Bay Rum will be up next for trying. Shout out to Worsnop for introducing me to these soaps! And thank you Dr. Squatch!

This soap makes you more manly then you could ever imagine.....well maybe not but it will make you cleaner then any other soap you have ever used. If you try it and give it a chance I'm sure you will never switch back to anything else!!
its man soap for sure! Love it
i was a bit skeptical but it's true...this soap makes you more of a man! Love it and I'm hooked!

This stuff is great, before I procured this beast, I was a lowly creature. Sad, scrapping for food and friends. I lived under a bridge, and sometimes frightened children. Then one day as I was chasing the local villagers I happened upon your Gold Moss Scrub. I used it....and now my life has changed. Women can't resist me, the villagers have quit trying to burn me at the stake, and I am now the mayor of Awesomeville. I only fear what happens when I run out of this magic elixir....never stop making this. 
 
Sincerely, 
Shrek's 3rd Cousin Steve.

Great soap, excellent customer service! ' 
Thank You 
Duane

I am greatly enjoying this product, all the way from the clean fresh feeling and scent, to the fact that it being all natural helps stop the rashes i get from regular store bought soap. Five out of five stars!

review_title: love the gold moss scrub, it smells so good
review_content: Love this stuff!
I really liked the smell and grit in the soap. I only wish the bar lasted longer. It seemed to disappear too quickly.
love it, it would make a great gift
Love these! My hubby gives 5 stars all the way around!

review_title: Soap saver and cedar citrus soap
review_content: The soap saver I just purchased was a bad decision by me. The soap sticks to it very badly so when I remove the soap a good sized piece sticks to the soap saver. I have stopped using it. The cedar citrus soap is o.k. But I like the gold moss scrub better so I will be ordering it when this bar of citrus is used up.

Ordered this soap for my husband as an addition to the other Dr. Squelch soap that he likes and he ended up liking this one even better. New favorite soap! He says he really likes the smell and how moisturizing but exfoliating it is!
smells good, but not as strong as I thought it would be; soapy and does not make my skin feel dry (good); should last pretty long; would be better if it also exfoliated a little.

review_title: The Best bar of soap I have ever used !
review_content: The Pine Tar soap works perfectly. It cleans and exfoliates and leaves a very clean and natural scent. I have tried so many soaps and now I can finally say that my search is over. My wife is even thrilled because I stay smelling clean all day. Happy wife, Happy Life ! Thank you Dr. Squatch
This is really good cologne and the price is just right compared to some other products I have purchased in the past. Check it out for yourself.

i found Dr. Squatch on Facebook on a whim. I checked out the website and was intrigued by the woodsy scents of soaps after years of only using body wash. I ordered the pine tar bar and I'll never go back. Their soap is amazing. It smells wonderful and makes my skin feel incredible. I've recommended this product to all my friends.
Wished it smelled more like pine rather than a generic soap
really enjoying my new scent
The Driftwood is probably the best shower soap on the market. Instant lather and long lasting. Thank You!

I am more than pleased with the Pine Tar soap - the scent quite strong, but not unpleasant, but it mellows fairly quickly. If I had a quibble, it's that the bars are quite small, and a single bar will be worn away in about ten days. 
 
I absolutely recommend this soap if you're looking to not smell like a chemical factory.
Smells great, washes great, extremely happy.
Outstanding scent! Lathers quickly and rinses away cleanly.

If you want to smell like your floors, this is the soap for you. The scent is more like pine-sol than a woodsy pine smell - I was hoping for something more like your typical pine candle scent. The exfoliants are very sharp and make it impossible to use directly on your skin. The soap itself however is perfectly fine and doesn't leave my skin overly dry or oily. I'll be trying one of the other scents without an exfoliant.

I found it weird to be excited for...well soap. But truthfully I love getting/trying new things. My old soap used to dry my skin pretty bad, and although it was bearable I wanted something different. I loved the advertisement for Dr. Squatch soaps, the idea was great and it was just what I was looking for. They all smell great! If I had only one gripe, its that the bars don't seem to last very long. I'd recommend this to any dude willing to try a natural soap and wanting to smell awesome.

I would have given this one a 5 star but it seems to melt much faster than the Pine Tar soap. I do like the scent. It is mild and much less overwhelming than others but I would like it to last at least another week. I was lucky to get 2 weeks use before it all melted away.
Love the packaging. Is a gift that I have not given yet so can not say how great they think it is but it does look and smell great!
I ordered the Pine Tar and it is the greatest soap I've ever used. I have been getting compliments on my scent ever since. Love it. Buying more!

I have seen a lot of reviews saying that people only get 3 or 4 washes out of a bar...well, people...it makes enough of a severe lather that you don't need to make contact with EVERY inch of your body with the bar every time. I'm a head-shaver, so I only use the bar on my head, chest, and arms...with PLENTY of clean lather to cover the rest of me left over. Anyway, on to the smell...damn its strong, and REALLY helps you wake up in the morning, and relax at night. Sure you don't smell it ALL day, like people complain about...but how long do you smell like that Irish Spring bar you use after a shower?
Neat idea and execution, we'll see how long it holds up.
this soap smells great and it makes you feel even better. It doesn't have that residue feeling that most soap leaves you with, it leaves you feeling clean and refreshed. Definitely recommended

excellent quality. Does what it's supposed to. However, you'd sell many more if you could get the price down say $5. $15 for a soap saver is a little pricey. Or throw one in for free if we buy three bars of soap, etc.

review_title: Good, but not as fragrant as the others
review_content:
I love Squatch soaps. They're frackin' amazing. BUT, this one...I'd pass on when I make my next order. It's just not fragrant as the others. It's that simple. 
 
Other than that, it's a good soap.
Best scent out there. If you are a real man, you should really own this soap!

I bought the Bay Rum as my first bar and look forward to showering every day. Who doesn't feel good about themselves in the morning when you enter an oasis wonderland. When I don't want to wake up in the morning I just remember that when I get out of bed my next move is going to take me to smelling like a man who knows how to fight but chooses not to and instead uses the power of logic and nature to will you into peace and prosperity. That is a man I would like to be and this soap helps me takes steps in that direction everyday. Plus it gets you clean.
mmm mm... yup. I super-like they way my husband smells. And my husband, super-likes the way he smells too.

I've bought more expensive soap, and it wasn't quite worth it. Dr. Squatch bars are a different story. Great scents followed by a squeeky-clean feeling have won me over. I recommend these bars to everyone, and as Ron Swanson once said, "Son, my reccommendation is practically a guarantee."
I ordered this bar for my boyfriend, and he really liked it. I love the way it smells. I'm not sure how much he uses, but it seems to be running out quickly. Otherwise, pretty great stuff!

review_title: Fantastic Smell, Tar in Muh Bath
review_content: What a great product! The smell is incredible. I have really sensitive skin and it does seem to dry me out a little bit. But otherwise, it could not be any better.

review_title: I totally dig it, and my fiancee agrees!
review_content: Like the title says, my fiancee loves it as much as I do, and for me, that's a double WIN!

Bought the fresh gift set for my best friend and had it shipped to another state. He LOVED the manliness of it all. Not only are soaps excellent on his skin, the cigar box was a win for him as well. Next time I'll choose the top rated soaps!

review_title: Soap (not the series, but I like that too.)
review_content: Bay Rum. Bestest soap ever. Nice scent, lather, and performance. I have other squares to navigate, I don't think those will disappoint. I'm glad I made the switch to Dr Squatch.

The descriptions of these soaps are definitely accurate. Pine Tar is a strong woodsy scent. As far as the oatmeal in the bar goes, it's a huge plus. I have some skin problems and the benefits of this soap were almost immediate. When the bar began to run out I bought another and also picked up the Gold Moss to try out. This bar and it's scent is totally different, but equally great. There's really nothing quite like it, whereas the Pine Tar smells like a fresh cut tree. 

What I really enjoy about both of these bars and any soap from Dr. Squatch is the lack of chemicals. My skin is a lot less itchy and irritated. I've also been able to replace my shampoo with this soap. It definitely does the job without making my hair practically fall out. In just a month it grew back about 3x more than before. I've had this stuff in my eyes too and you can't even feel it. 

Overall the smell is good and long-lasting, the things it does for you skin and hair is incredible, and at $6 it's totally worth it. Chances are if your girlfriend is like mine she'll love it too, and with the leftover sliver of Pine Tar I had left the dog got a good bath with it. 

As a guy living in the Pacific Northwest that spends most of his time in the woods and sand dunes and racing ATV's, I'd say this soap lives up to what it claims and exceeds expectations. There's no reason not to take good care of yourself and smell awesome, and this soap will get you there.

These samples were exactly what I was looking for. I didn't know how they smelled and didn't want to commit to a full bottle until I tried them. 
 
They both have a very nice smell and I'll be ordering one soon. Thanks for the product!

This is a cologne for guys who don €:tm:t wear cologne. It €:tm:s subtle in the way a walk through a forest leaves a hint of nature and fresh air on your clothes. More importantly my lady likes it. Thumbs up.

review_title: Wife doesn't like it. Girlfriend does!
review_content: When I received the Driftwood Oil I put a little on and came home. The wife took one long smell and said for me to never wear it again. That night I visited my girlfriend and put just a small amount on again and she LOVED IT! Now what? Will the wife know I'm seeing someone else if I come home with it on. What a dilemma. Any suggestions?
Both smell great but the Pine Tar is more abrasive than it needs to be. I like that its meant to exfoliate but sometimes it is extremely uncomfortable due to the sand.

The Pine Tar soap is by the far the finest bar soaps I've ever scrubbed my body with. The sand serves as a scratchy exfoliant which can be a little rough, but damnit - if it's good enough for a sasquatch, it's good enough for me. I've been using it daily for about a week and about 1/3 gone which means I will easily burn through this soap in 3 weeks on average. 
 
Still - smells great and is super high quality. Can't wait to try more!

i got the gold moss and the eucalyptus and i like them both a lot, but I love the gold moss. I'm looking forward to my next shipment! 
 
Thanks~ 
 
Tripp Allen
Great Stuff! Won't go back to commercial soap. Thanks!

review_title: Good soap, just not enough of it.
review_content:
I ordered the pine tar soap, which smells as great as it sounds. Loved the abrasiveness of the soap which made me feel I was getting a really deep clean. The only down side of the soap is that there isn't enough of it. The bar lasted less than two weeks. 
I would definitely purchase a much hardier "squatch sized" bar if it were offered.

When I opened the box, it was like being among warriors, and drinking from the cup of VICTORY! The soap stripped off grime, oil, dirt, and doubt. I was left clean, great smelling and feeling INVINCIBLE! Upon exiting the shower, sunshine draped me in its golden rays, and the neighborhood ladies began knocking on my door, and looking at me like their next meal. I was no longer a mere mortal, transformed into a demi god!

review_title: Second Best Wake Up You Can Get
review_content: Every morning I used this soap it brought me out of a deep trance of sleep hangover. One of favorites from the Squatch. Highly recommended!

The soap is smaller than I thought it would be, but that doesn't change the fact it's an awesome soap. The smell isn't as strong or as minty as I thought it would be though. It still feels great on my skin!
i read that this was like walking through an old pine forest with Scarlett Johansen. It's not. It 's better.

the smell is ok, but between that and the scratchy things in it, doesn't make for an enjoyable shower experience. Unless you're in true need of some exfoliation, I would suggest getting something else.

Reformed shower gel user trying the bar soap thing for the first time since the late 90's. Dr. Squatch seems to have his s**t together. I've only been using the bar for a week and I'm already noticing that my skin has not dried out like it did with the shower gel. I'm not going to lie, the bar is much manlier than some bottle of dove soap.
This cologne is great! Even the laddies will like too, on you.
And it was AWESOME.
If you love the beach you love this soap.

I bought two bars of the Pine Tar soap and couldn't be any happier with. Don't let the name evoke thoughts of the smell of Pine Sol. This smells clean and woodsy! This soap is a great exfoliateor too. Thins smells awesome and gets you squeaky clean.

review_title: Awesome soap with an amazing smell
review_content:
I really enjoy this soap. It's simple, smells great, and comes in the coolest packaging I've ever seen soap come in. 
 
I only wish the scent lasted longer, but I appreciate that it's made from all natural ingredients, so that's one side effect.
smells great
I was hoping for a stronger scent, but it's still a good soap.
It smells great and lathers really well.
no need for any other soap for this guy. Solid product, solid service, solid experience!

review_title: Gold Moss Scrub: it's a winner!
review_content: Great smelling, long lasting bar; going for the other bars one at a time./...
The scent is great. Subtle, but really nice. Highly recommended.

review_title: Solid soap. Okay Scent. Extremely abrasive.
review_content: Perfect soap if you want to smell like your floors. This has more of a Pine-Sol scent than the woodsy evergreen scent I was hoping for. The exfoliants are VERY coarse, sharp, and as a result, extremely abrasive. I couldn't use this soap directly on my skin without feeling like I was going through a cheese grater. As for the soap material itself, it cleans well and doesn't leave my skin feeling overly dry. Works great. My next bar simply won't contain any exfoliants.

review_title: Nice scent, but wheres the exfoliant ??
review_content:
I was looking forward to try this scent, my 4th one from Dr Squatch, because of the reviews.
While I do enjoy the scent of the Gold Moss the exfoliant is non existent!! 
I have tried the Pine Tar with the "rip your face off" exfoliant as well as the Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt with a light amount of exfoliants, which so far has been my preference. But My bar of Gold Moss which was to have a "Medium" amount had absolutely none!! Kinda Disappointing.
