This is a great soap. Does wonders for my dry skin. This stuff also smells awesome; very woodsy and clean. This has been my favorite Squatch soap so far.
Smells nice, but doesn't behave the same way aerated colognes do. Which makes sense, I suppose.
You need to make the pine tar soap into a cologne. I'd melt it down and fucking drink it if it wouldn't make me sick, it smells so good.
awesome product!

For the past year or so I've had a pretty tough time with dry skin on my shins. Being a diabetic, I believed it was simply something I would have to accept. Moisturizers formulated specifically for diabetisc hadd little or no effect. Being a fan of BIGFOOT since I was a child, I made an "impulse buy" of yor Dr. Squatch soap... Thinking it would be more of a conversation item. Boy, was I wrong. Your heavily exfoliating PINE TAR brsnd worked a sincere miracle on my shins. Soft, smooth skin and no dry flaky spots at all. You have a customer for life.
I don't shower regularly, but when I do I use pine tar, gets me smelling clean and fresh
no perfumes here! All stout masculine oils. It makes good scents!
Pleasant scent lingers long after you shower. I love the gold moss and cool fresh aloe.
The more we order the more we all love all items. I started buying as Christmas gifts for my husband and sons. But, I'm a user as well! The only soap I use now even for my face. This is a winner!
I love this soap and it makes the bathroom smell good too!
recently tried a bunch of oils listed in men's journal, hands down, bang for the buck Dr. squatch!

the scent of the pine tar is very nice and manly, and they don't lie about the exfoliation on the maximum side. It almost hurts to use it, but I'd have to say it's a good hurt. Will probably buy again, but will be trying a different bar

The soap is awesome! Smells great, cleans well, lasts for a decent period of time. The only complaint is that the exfoliants are a little harsh, but not bad enough to remove a star. Great product! Thanks for providing a solution to a problem I had.

Love the soap, love everything about it; the scent, the exfoliation, the overall masculine experience but the life. I wish it lasted a little longer at this price. 
Awesome customer service and very prompt delivery though. Amazing cigar box as well!

My husband is so excited to try these new soaps and so far is 2/4. He has yet to try the other two. Additionally, he smells so amazing with his new scents. He €:tm:s been going back and forth between Driftwood and Hemlock Trail. I love it and so does he!
Great quality!

The Pine Tar soap smells great and gives you the felling of walking through a pine forest. I really like the smell of the soap but, I don't think ill be using this one again just for the simple reason that it is to exfoliating for my taste. The soap also rinses of black which shouldn't be a surprise since the soap itself is black; although it doesn't stain the shower. If you like exfoliating soap and the smell of pine needles then this soap is for you.

This soap has an amazing smell! It is the 3rd soap from Dr. Squatch I have used and like all the other it works perfectly. I always feel clean after using it and I smell good though out the entire day, as a plus my girlfriend loves the smell too. This soap also has a really nice lather just as the Bay Rum so I don't have to use as much as I did with the Pine Tar. Great soap, try it and see for yourself!

review_title: The scent makes me hungry for a mimosa.
review_content: Reminds me of Anaheim before Walt ripped out the orchard!
The bar doesn't last long.
Bought the Pine Tar soap for my boyfriend and he loves it. It has a nice, strong smell and the natural exfoliating properties are wonderful 10/10 would buy again.
was fast and I like the smells
great scent on my man
smells great, not too overpowering!
Service and Product.
Nice cologne but very much overpriced in my opinion. Won't be buying any more of it..

I have only tried Gold Moss Scrub so far, but I love it! It has a slightly sweet smell to it, but not flowery. I also love that it €:tm:s all natural and feel great every time I use it. I can €:tm:t wait to try the rest of the soap soon!

I am just now finishing my first bar of soap, which has been nothing short of incredible. The lather is the perfect amount, the smell is incredible and it has lasted a couple of weeks so far. 
 
I also purchased samples of the colognes. They are both incredibly unique and wonderful. The hard part is figuring out which one to purchase!
We have been buying the soap for a couple of months. No dry skin and the boys love using "pine tar". This is great stuff - good for the beard, hair and those pesky dry spots....

awesome soap! came across the brand via an ad on Facebook and couldn't be happier that I actually clicked it. Most body washes really dry my skin out and have lame scents, the cool fresh aloe bar is a great basic clean smell; which I loved. I'm telling everyone I know to check out Dr. Squatch now (and buy me a soapscription)! 
One product recommendation would be a travel case. I ordered a second bar to put in my gym bag but am having a tough time finding a case that fits the bar.

Loved receiving my Gold Moss Scrub bar from Dr. Squatch! It's refreshing to wake up to and produces a great lather! Plus, it smells GREAT! My only complaint is how quickly I ran through my first bar - just shy of two weeks!
I bought the Gold Moss and it has been great! Much higher quality than the stuff you can buy in a store. Would highly recommend!

My life is now complete. I want to climb to the top of a mountain and yell at the top of my lungs that Dr. Squatch soap is the bees knees. You have a lifetime customer. I have tried all your soaps with the exception of pine tar and my skin cant thank you enough. Your products are the best.

Great presentation in the Cigar box! I only used the Bay Rum so far, but I can say that the lather on it is great. All of the soaps in the gift box had really nice scents. I €:tm:ll definitely be ordering a gift box for my brother for Christmas and be getting a subscription for myself once I go through the four soaps I have.

review_title: So Fresh and So Clean, Clean
review_content: I've tried 3 different soap scents and have enjoyed them all. They all smell great-- not too strong-- but a nice, natural scent. Also, I recently ordered the cologne samples to give them a try. Both smelled great, now I have to decide which one to buy.

review_title: This Soap Is Literally the Best I've Ever Used
review_content: Thank you so much! The Pine Tar soap is absolutely perfection. I love the exfoliating sand in it as well! This smells like Jesus wrapped in Unicorns jumping over a shark pit.
Perfect for scrubbing off the post-surf grime.

I bought the Pine Tar and Golden Moss? a couple of weeks ago and have only used the Pine tar, so far. I bought that one in particular because I workout several times a week and needed something to get the job done without the chemical residue- it works great! My wife likes the smell and I like the exfoliating grit in the bar. I will be moving to the monthly delivery and my wife is looking at their women's products.
I mean, if you want to smell like the woods....here you go. I don't think it worked on me, but it's a good product.
I purchased 5 soaps at one time and have not made it to the cedar citrus yet, i am still on the bay rum and it is off the hook, oh and the cedar citrus smells great too.

review_title: I smell as manly as I feel.
review_content: Pine Tar is the greatest soap to ever scrub a man's skin. When I'm in the shower I feel like in going for a hike up a mile high tree.
This is the best smelling soap around. Love Love Love. It does not irritate my skin. Best soap ever. I wish it would come in larger size.
The soaps are unlike anything I've ever used. Work well with dry skin. Smell great. The Hemlock scent in particular, smells like the outdoors. Nothing like the crap known as cologne.

Enjoyed the smell and the way it lathers up. Followed the advice to make soap last longer ,put on soap dish,use face towel,but It kept on shrinking fast,then found out my son was using it too. I guess its paybacks for using my dad's shaving cream and socks when I was younger.
Love the organic cologne. The fact its not alcohol based means pure, long lasting scent.

Before and after a long day, I like to scrub down with a bar of Bay Rum. I like to think it's how my forefathers smelled while fighting the British, or the Army of the South. I imagine Granddad Buzzard smelling like rum and spices after working in his distillery all day. Either way, I feel refreshed, smell like a man, and my mrs. enjoys the spice notes. I highly recommend Bay Rum!

I went to see my girlfriend a few days ago and after a 4 hour session in bed I went to take a shower. There it was staring at me-- A black cube of Dr. Squash Pine Tar soap so I lathered up and the smell was like being in the forest! I asked her where she bought it and she told me her husband buys it on-line so I headed home and purchased 6 bars! LOVE IT! (and so does my girlfriend)

I purchased Pine Tar 14 days ago. The confirmation email stated I would get an email with shipping info. I never got that email, and I never got my soap. This was a birthday present for my wife, tonight is her birthday and it's not here. Horrible service, I will not recommend this to anybody.

Bay Rum at its finest. I've been using it with the Soap saver for almost 3 weeks and still have 1/3 of the bar left, and that's with a shower everyday. Lather's up really nice. Can't wait to try the other bars!

Bought a bottle 3 weeks ago, and I am totally addicted it smells so good.. I've been using it as beard oil, and love the combination of essential oils that they use. Although I would of liked the bottle to be $20 cheaper, I still give it five stars.
Better than I thought

The smell is ok. Out of the box it is a bit strong; Almost like Pinesol. Once applied it dulls considerably, leaving nice notes to tickle your nose. The main selling point to this product for me was "Think of it as an Irish Spring that doesn't dry out". Unfortunately I have found it not to be the case; Not for me anyway. It actually dries my beard out a lot. Exactly the way Irish Spring dries out my skin as a matter of fact. I have used it twice and have had to condition my beard with regular hair conditioner both times. Shipping time was fairly slow. Did receive order number after my purchase but never recieved a notice of shipment as they said they would. Tried to contact them about it but was left hanging. Waste of nine dollars. Would not do business with them again.

This right here is how a man should smell. The bits of pine or bark or whatever is a great exfoliant and it smells freaking amazing. Only thing I'd change is maybe make the chips a bit smaller, and find a way to stop the black residue.
I got a couple of soaps for my boyfriend's birthday. He loves them and I love his sent!

i loved the pine tar, but it creates a black film on the tub, so I started going with this and it's fantastic! It has a refreshing awakening in the Eucalyptus scent and gives your skin a great moisturized feel. I highly recommend this scent.
best soap i've ever tried
good product
really enjoy the soap, wife loves it too,,
love the soaps, especially the Bay Rum

They don't leave a standard grocery store soap residue on the shower door or my skin! I wouldn't say that I've tried a soap that I dislike just some that I prefer over others. All in all I'm thoroughly enjoying my soapscription and cologne. High quality products! Truly glad I found Dr. Squatch.

It's like reaching into the heart of the oldest pine in the forest, pulling pulp from the middle, and scrubbing yourself anew. As long as this soap is available, I will be a loyal customer.
I smell like the manliest man on earth thanks Dr!

Awesome!,.....Nice outdoorsy manly smell!....The pine tar my favorite!, smells like walking through a pine forest!,....without the sticky sap!......will definitely purchase bigger bottle!

Soap and "sense"
Love it!
I love this soap. The smell is wonderful!!!

I discovered these soaps quite by chance. I'm glad I did. I use them daily from head to toes. I use them to shave even! I recommend them based on the Squatchy freshness and the awesome customer service. I'm a fan for life!
Very nice. A manly clean smell. It's hard to describe, except it is clean, manly, outdoorsie, unique, very pleasant and I am going to order more.
It's pretty good.
Seriously, the best scent! plus the gritty rough texture is amazing! My wife loves the smell. I get points for being clean and for smelling like a man should.
Love It!
Very light, but durable, dries out nicely and does prolong the soap use. Would recommend for anyone who uses solid soaps.

review_title: IT MAKE YOUR BODY FEEL GOOD
review_content: IT'S ROUGH! IT'S BLACK AS NIGHT! IT'S SOAP! BUY IT! BE THE HETERONORMATIVE DEFINITION OF "MAN"
This is great soap. It lathers quickly, washes off easily and leaves you clean and sweet smelling.

review_title: Good Soap, Nice Cologne - Shipping leaves some to be desired.
review_content: I recently purchased the Pine Tar Soap, and Cologne Samples. The soap is great! Has an awesome scent, gritty exfoliating sand, and leaves you feeling clean. I'm not a fan of the Driftwood cologne, smells like an old smoker to me. The Hemlock Trail on the other hand, is divine. It's exactly like walking through a pine forest - it's great. Lastly, shipping is $6 no matter what you buy - which I'm not sure I understand, why not just make the bars $7.25 and offer free shipping? I know there are better ways to ship than UPS. At any rate, it's pretty good, I think I'll be buying more Pine Tar soap, but I'll order a lot at a time to avoid spending crazy amounts on shipping.
This soap is great!

After using a bar of cedar citrus as a beard soap, I recently purchased all the other scents (except Bay Rum) so I could experience all the Dr. Squatch offerings (I will likely review all the scents). I have to say that the soaps are great. I use it primarily on my beard and occasionally on my body. I never feel dried out or covered in a film. I wash my beard at least once a day, and Dr. Squatch soaps help keep it from feeling like hay. The base soap of both scents I have used has been great; I would give the soap five stars. I cannot say the same about the scents.

I would not say Deep Sea Goat's Milk is an earthy men's fragrance. It is very floral. What I pick up most is something along the lines of lavender. This is not to say that men cannot enjoy floral scents; it is 2015, and everyone knows anyone can enjoy whatever they want.

While the description of the scent here says, "Earthy and Creamy", I only get a flowery aroma. It is similar to my grandmother's potpourri or a free perfume sample you might get in a Kohl's catalog. Not great and not what I was expecting.

Summary: Soap = five stars; Scent = -1

This was the first Dr. Squatch soap I got. I use it primarily on my beard and occasionally on my body. I have to say I was very pleased. The soap lasted a reasonable amount of time (using it mostly on my beard). I never felt dried out or covered in a film. I wash my beard at least once a day, and I think this soap doesn't leave my facial hair feeling like dried leaves. I recently ordered most of the other scents to try them out. I just started the first of those (Deep Sea Goat's Milk...not a great scent as my review suggests), and the soap quality is just as good.

Cedar citrus is an interesting scent and one that I enjoy. It has a muted and well-rounded orange smell, but the base aroma is that of sweet, damp wood. My apologies if damp wood makes you think mildew. I have used other citrus soaps on the past. While those make you smell like you got a Gatorade shower after winning the Super Bowl or like you had a soaking in a tub if Minute Made concentrate, Cedar citrus has nice complexity and maturity that I enjoy.
smells great & my skin feels so much better. I love it!
I was sort of disappointed with this soap, it smelled great in the box but when I lather up with it,it doesn't smell like anything. Also left a white residue on my skin.

review_title: Manly scent that's, perhaps, a bit too manly
review_content: of the two samples I received, driftwood was my definite favorite. My wife, however, disliked both scents as being overpowering and too woodsy. This was with a small fab on each side of my neck. Like many scents, you'll love it or leave it in the drawer. My review splits the difference.
feels like sandpaper but leaves you clean makes your bathroom smell really really good but the smell only sticks on me 50/50 also the bar wears away a little fast
I feel this is something everyone needs in their shower. Buy it. You won't be disappointed.
simply the best. Wife is all over me.

review_content: I was looking for some guy gift ideas and I came across this soap. I ordered a couple bars for myself to try and thought if they were decent it €:tm:d be a great gift in the future for my brother, cousins,etc €¦ They €:tm:re more than decent! These soaps are some of the best soaps I €:tm:ve used. I mean, I €:tm:m taking time to write a review about soaps so you know they gotta be good! The scents and lather-ability (I don €:tm:t know if that €:tm:s a word but it should be) are awesome and I feel super clean afterwards without feeling like I just masked body odor with some perfumy soap. I will definitely buy this product as dude-gifts in the future.

This is the first review I have ever written; however, this company has caused me to take to my keyboard. The customer service level with Dr. Squatch is fantastic. I will start out by saying I am not a smart man and so I allow the google auto fill function to fill out address's for me. This is when disaster struck, in short it filled out the wrong address and my dreams of manly smells where crushed as my wayward soap made its way across the country to another man. I contacted the Dr. Squatch customer service and when I explained my tragedy, they quickly sent out a new package at no cost to me. I am doubly impressed as I am no long time customer and this was my first trial run with Dr. Squatch. I have since used the soap that was sent to me and I believe my sex appeal doubled and I have had to begin carrying a stick to beat women off of me. This is doubly impressive as it feels good to use this soap in the shower. On a serious note this company rocks and their soap is fantastic and their customer service is top notch. Keep it up team Squatch you have made a new long time customer.

Well my dear Squatchers in Squatchland.....you have made me into the squatchman I was always supposed to be. I've only been able to use the Pine tar soap, but in combination with either colognes, well ladies and gents, it is a doozy. I'm being smelled at the office, at parties, being passed around getting hugged since people are so curious at what permeates from my body. Like I read when I first was investigating the good Dr, look good feel good, and that starts from the skin up. I've used so many different body soaps (both bar and liquid) over the years and was still plagued with dry irritated skin. Not anymore. And since it's so kickass anyways I use it as shampoo and face wash....and my skin or hair have never felt better. No more dry skin. It feels softer and healthier. So the only real comment I have, oh Squatchers, is when will you come out with a deodorant? 
I enjoy changing scents on a daily basis and since it's oil based it seems to stay on longer than most all the other colognes I've spent too much money on. 
Ya'll have a Squatcher for life. Good work and PLEASE keep it up. Squatch out.

review_title: Where has Squatch been all my life?
review_content: I have always been a clean guy, but Dr. Squatch soaps take clean to a new level. My skin is wicked clean but not filmy or dried out from this soap. Pine Tar is masculine at its best and the exfoliation is just right. Gold Moss is a gem of a bar of soap. I'm sold. I'm a Squatch guy from now on.
Showering just became that much more enjoyable, if that is possible. Great product.

Found this soap by accident... ordered a few bars just to see. My husband loves them all. My favorite is the the Bay Rum. He likes the variety and I do too. I don't usually do reviews but this is a soap that we order all the time. Give it a try ...you & he will love love it.
Soap smells amazing but my shower looks like Ripley went on an Alien killing spree when I'm done
ive only used the pine tar soap thus far but ordered a few more different kinds. Great change from body wash

Regrettably, I never got into baseball as a kid; nevertheless, Pine Tar brought back boyhood memories the minute I opened the box. There was a great old barn-turned-rec-center at a summer camp I attended and later worked at. The wood in that building was sealed with pine tar. I never knew what that classic scent was until I caught a whiff of this soap and was taken right back to some of the best summers of my life. I'm NOT saying you'll smell like an old barn if you use Pine Tar--this soap has a wonderfully refreshing, pungently sweet, but not overpowering scent. I am saying this soap packs an aromatic punch that evokes good ol' times of summers playing in the forest and spent at camp. Since the cigar/gift box arrived from Dr. Squatch, I've looked forward to hitting the shower each morning and really waking up with this ruggedly invigorating soap. It not only serves its primary purpose well--lathering up and cleaning great; it's also provides a (welcomed!) daily dose of thoroughly manly aromatherapy. There's a reason this is their best-seller; it's a classic. If you haven't tried it, don't put it off any longer!

This is the manliest cologne €¦EVER. Of mainstream fragrances, it most closely resembles Drakkar Noir, but it has a much earthier, woodsier soul. It smells less refined €”in a good way: clean but not soft, wild and yet sophisticated. It €:tm:s at once natural, essential, and complex. It hints of adventure and maturity, primal urges and quiet strength. I use this mostly in my beard €”just a little bit after my morning shower and shave. It refreshes and it stirs. It awakens something deep, exudes authentic masculinity, and conveys subtle but unmistakable confidence.

I generally buy scent less soap, because I don't want to smell like a woman. Dr Squatch's Pine Tar is virile, it will bring out your inner man, like the woodsman you are supposed to be, I don't think I'll use anything else, period.

out if the 3 I got it was by far my favorite ! I was not disappointed but thought I'd like the gold moss more didn't really have a scent to me . The bay rum was kindve Christmassy but I enjoyed it ! I'll defiantly get more of the pine tar although a little messy half way through till end by far my fav ill pick 2 new along with that again next time ! Thank you
From the soaps to the cigar boxes, unique awesome stuff!!! Do it!

review_title: Soap so good, it's like Bob Ross made the soap himself!
review_content:
This stuff... its so good. All of these wonderful scents, showering is like being in a Bob Ross painting. I BECOME a happy tree. 
 
All joking aside, I seriously love your guys' products. How great is it that a product is made in the USA, very much affordable, and is a great smelling product for us guys? (not that your products are for men only, my girlfriend loves the smell of them too!) My favorite is the Deep Sea Goats Milk... although the gold moss scrub is a close, close second. 
 
Here's a testament for your product: 
I'm a blacksmith/bladesmith. I create things of steel, some being very sharp. I spend hours on top of hours working beside a hot coal forge, sweating with every hammer blow. When I finish working, I have black soot and grime all over me from the coal and metal. This stuff not only smells good, but it helps me scrub away all of that dirty crud and leave me clean, refreshed, and smelling dang good. Forever a lifelong customer.
Came in a very timely manner, happy customer :)

I've used Pine Tar bar multiple times now and love it every time. Service is fast, and the prodcut is incredible. Smells amazing, feels great, leaves your skin feeling amazing. I don't think I'll use another soap again.

One of the harshest exfoliating soaps I have ever used and it's perfect! I will definitely keep coming back.

I, for the longest time used a brand that rhymes with Bold Slice. I liked the smell and the marketing was very clever. I always felt as though these other brands could not compete. My wife and I started to have kids and changed things in our lives including our diets (Gluten Free, Paleo) to her even starting to sell and use essential oils. Then we switched our toothpaste to natural toothpaste. Then she started using natural soap. I was not down with that. She wasn't going to separate me from Bold Slice. But After sometime, I came across your company. "Manly" natural soap??? Well, I decided to make a deal with my wife. I will use it and give it a try. She looked at the ingredients used and was on board. I still was in my head, not going to be convinced. But then my order arrived and the smell alone was phenomenal! So The next morning, I used the bay rum bar. My skin never felt so clean and never reacted to soap so positively before. I have had dry, itchy skin for some time now and the first day of using Dr. Squatch Bay Rum, no itch. I smelled good, felt good and I am pretty convinced that I look like Hercules due to your soap. (Well, maybe not the last part.) I am truly convinced that your soap is superior to all others and will only use your product. Thank you for being an unsuspecting hero in my house!

review_title: Purchased Spearmint Basil and Pine Tar soaps
review_content: While at first I was slightly disappointed with the fragrance of the pine tar soap--It was simply not "piney" enough for me--I quickly changed my mind oonce i used the soap for the first time. Never before has the skin on my face felt so smooth and natural, the Pine Tar soap is a real godsend when it comes to exfoliation. If you are someone like me, who has a history of facial blackheads, this may be the soap you've been waiting for. The Spearmint Basic Scrub is another wonderful product--if you like the smell of basil then this is definitely a soap you'll be a fan of. It's got a cool, slightly spicy smell to it and leaves me feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. I would highly recommend both of these soaps to anyone.

I had wanted to try Dr. Squatch for some time. I took the €œPrescription Quiz €? and read reviews for the different soaps and colognes. I realized the Deluxe Gift Box was the most economical way to sample it all. Even so, initially I was reluctant to make the investment in this collection of products I €:tm:d only seen advertised online. Let me tell you, I AM SO GLAD I DID! The quality of the soaps, the fragrance, and the cigar box far exceeded my expectations. I €:tm:ve previously reviewed the Pine Tar soap and Hemlock Trail cologne €”both are classic, invigorating, masculine products! €”and I €:tm:m looking forward to lathering up with the Gold Moss, Bay Rum, and Cool Fresh Aloe soaps that also arrived in the Deluxe Gift Box. (I €:tm:ll review them when I get to them €”but these bars last a LONG time, which is awesome!) I want to comment here, though, on the box itself, because it €:tm:s what raises this from merely a set of outstanding personal care products to the kind of classy, timeless, souvenir that you could give to your groomsmen before a wedding, to your son at a milestone in his young adulthood, or to a father-figure in your life on a very special occasion. Mine arrived in an Alec Bradley Black Market (Toro) cigar box. Solid wood, the box was handmade in Honduras, features an antique-looking metal latch, and is decorated on the inside with faded, Old World-style shipping receipts. Opening the box feels like stepping back in time €¦, which kind of makes sense when you consider that everything Dr. Squatch makes is handcrafted using natural ingredients and traditional processes. Like everyone else, I enjoy my modern conveniences, but there €:tm:s something essential about touching, opening, and breathing in that which is authentic, grounded, and connected to ways of doing things and being in the world that are genuine, time-honored, and altogether worth remembering.

the scent a a bit light and pedestrian. I enjoyed the aloe mostly. I asked a friend for their thought on the oil and the response was "Meh". I like your marketing but your product needs to be stepped up to require the pricing. I will buy more of the aloe soap

I just tried the Pine tar soap for the first time. I will say I like the smell. and the scent it leaves on you after a shower. and yes, it does leave a good scent in the bathroom as well. I will say the bar only lasted me a week. That is something I wanted to find out about, and my only negative thing to say about it. But after a week of using it, I did notice a difference in how my skin feels, and also how it seems to get rid of the "old man smell" I think I can now associate with using regular commercial brand bar soap, and the film it leaves on you. I have in the past used a hard mill natural soap before, and liked the way it lasted longer than regular soap. I started using the gold moss scrub tonight, and it has a great smell to it too. I will see how long it will last me, I hope longer than the pine tar, which I think I go through quick because I shower daily, and the exfoliants may make it more porous, but you do get a good scrubbing from it. Ask me in a week or two and I will give you my opinion of the Gold Moss. Now for the rest of my review, I will say this. I deal with people a lot, and I notice a lot of repetition of smells from guys, same type of smell, which seems to me to be overpowering, and I would say metrosexual feminine with no character. So far, I like the unique clean fragrance that doesn't smell like everybody else, and it's far from the overwhelming garbage I smell out there, these guys may as well be wearing tussy lol! I think subtle is much nicer than Hey I'm Here!

Ever feel like shit? Even if you aren't dirty? This man soap not only washes the shit out of you. It gives you super hero strength, Ace Ventura like screams come out from with in after a shower. so yeah buy this shit.

very awesome. Wish it lasted longer. I also am confused on the soap scription I would like to start one but I want to chose the bars I want. I like to mix it up. The way I understand the 3 bar a month I have to get 3,3and3. Is this true?
When I first did the soapscription thing, I got 6 scents and I was pleasantly surprised by this one. By far my favorite. All of them are great, but my fiance and I like this one above the others.
Great Soap!
Love, it. Will buy from again. Thank you
Love the medium lather level, the moisturizing on burnt skin and rough hands and best of all, my wife is crazy about the "earthy and masculine scent" it carries. Love it!
great scent gets the point across that your manly, much like a squatch! Thank you Dr. Squatch

The exfoliating bar coupled with the strong scent of pine, is the best thing for after my workouts. The scent will stay with you, and you will be receive so many compliments . You will actually feel clean and refreshed . Your entire bathroom will smell like a forest, and that's a good thing!!
This soap is awesome. I love it. And I've never used bar soap a day in my life. Now it's all I use.
I look forward to using the soap every morning. Great product at a great price. Look forward to trying all of your offerings.
smells great..long lasting... Very refreshing
Great fragrance and is good for my skin. I can't wait to use it during winter months when my skin usually is dry.

I purchased the pine tar scent and it smells like a mountain cross-bred with a pine tree and had soap babies! This soap will completely blow your senses (in a good way) to a whole new level. The reason I gave this 4 stars is because I don €:tm:t see anywhere that states if this soap is anti-bacterial or not. I just use my regular anti-bacterial soap first and then I soap up with Squatch. I took this soap out of my mail box and it smelled so good that I could not wait to take a shower €¦.literally.

review_title: The best bar soap on the planet
review_content: Strong, clean smell. Love this scent and looking forward to trying more.
awesome!
So far this soap is awesome. I was stoked to find a natural soap without chemicals.

Honestly, these are the best soaps I have ever used. I have really sensitive skin, and they don't irritate it at all. My only complaint is that these soaps don't last more than a couple weeks. The trade off is COMPLETELY worth it, though. Just buy them.

Husband found these and asked me to order some. Bought a bar of Cedar Citrus and I ended up stealing it from him. Love the natural, earthy scent. Great lather. makes the whole bathroom smell great!! Just placed another order for 6 more bars to try other scents also
This one is my favorite so far.
My favorite soap, hands down.
Yep.
and for a good reason.
Good Stuff!
Amazing products! They have great variety that smell fantastic & invigorates!
Me like soap. Soap make happy feet. Wife like soap smell more than me smell. Soap feel good. Soap better than other soap. Me buy more soap, tell friends.

I have used pine tar soaps before, and decided to try this one out. This soap does not have a tarry smell at all. I think the best description would be it smells like a pine candle, but in a good way. It is strong, but not overpowered. I feel truly clean too. The smell dissipates into a gentle scent fairly quickly, which I really appreciated, as I do not like being a walking perfume shop. Dr. Squatch, you have a life long customer.

All of the soaps are excellent quality and I never knew the necessity of the wooden block until i bought one. Some of the scents are better than others... try them all decide what you like then be a soap of the month member.. Excellent product. Beats buying Dial or Old Spice
Thats about it. I've tried a few of the soaps, and I love the scrubby feel from the Pine Tar and the scent fills the bathroom. I love it

I bought the 3 bar sample package (with free soap saver). I've only tried the Gold Moss scented soap, so far. Besides a great scent, it seems to be very agreeable to my otherwise sensitive skin (I have problems with psoriasis ). Can't wait to try the other two scents (pine tar and cedar citrus) that came in the pack. I will definitely try other products by Dr. Squatch.
These soaps are quite good. Much higher quality than their competitors (zum). My only issue is that the Bay Rum though great smelling, does not actually smell like classic barbershop Bay Rum...
Love it!
Went for it with the Pine Tar and couldn't be happier. Best soap I have ever used. Getting my SoapScription tomorrow!

review_title: Pine Tar Soap, the best soap I have ever purchased.
review_content: I have purchased Dr.Squatch soap before,but heard great reviews about pine tar as a great scent and exfoliating soap, specifically for bearded men. When I opened the mailbox, the smell hit me like a truck. It was very strong pine almost like pine sol. Once I opened it up I realized this was definitely some powerful stuff. I had to try it, right away. Me and my wife were arguing lightly about something ridiculous before I hit the shower, when I got out she came in and the smell stopped the argument. She said how much she liked it, even better than the Gold Moss, which was my personal favorite before. I have a full beard,and it softens it and detangles.it doesn't have the long lasting scent I thought it would, at least that I can tell,but it definitely does a great job as far as a beard soap goes. I would recommend this soap to anyone with a longer beard, or who loves the pleasent refreshing smell of pine tar. It does leave a lot of black in the shower, but it rinses right away. The manliest, best working, natural soap I have ever purchased and I will be buying more, my kids love to use it too. Get yours now!!!
Great product. Smell more like cinnamon than the bay Rum I recall.
I was very pleased with the soaps I ordered. I will for sure being ordering again an will recommend Dr. Squatch to everyone.
Love the scents of your soap. Also love the way it rinses clean!! I will definitely order again and again.
I will try every scent
LOVE IT SO MUCH
I bought a bar of Gold Moss Scrub. Smells great, but it's almost gone after a week, and it doesn't "Scrub". Looking forward to Pine Tar.
wish the smell of Eucalyptus had been stronger

I absolutely love your product it smells great it shipped super fast and it last long I love the fact that I can get something 100% made in the good ol USA I will be ordering more in the future I can't wait to get some of the others thanks and keep up the great smelling fast shipping work
You guys are awesome! Keep on rocking out the great soap guys!
I am very pleased with my soap purchase! Lasts pretty long and is great for your skin!!
This soap is great. It gives me the strength to fight up to (but not more than) 6 beasts a day!
always a great buy. At the moment I'm using the eucalyptus soap and it is amazing!!
Love these soaps. Bay Rum and Pine Tar are phenomenal
Although the scent was wonderful, the soap was not long lasting and the small bar turned to a putty like consistency pretty quickly. I like that the soap is all natural with natural scents.
Manly scent. Environmentally friendly. Doesn't dry out my skin. I'm sticking with it!

I fell in love with this soap after one use. I get covered in sweat, sea spray, oil, grease, grim, and other various hazardous materials all day, every day at work. This stuff left me feeling clean and the smell is fantastic. I was a little hesitant to try a bar soap due to previous experience with drying skin with run of the mill products, but after just having it in the shower for the first few minutes I was hooked. Definitely looking at a long time customer here.

After reading multiple reviews and learning a little about the company, I decided to try a couple of the products (the Bay Rum and Gold Moss soaps and the cologne sampler as well). These products were all as good as advertised- the very definition of "getting what you paid for". I used the Gold Moss as shaving cream and it worked like a charm! My skin felt clean without any of the dryness that I often feel after using soap. The Bay Rum keeps me and the bathroom smelling nice as well. The colognes are straightforward and masculine without being heavy-handed. All in all, I am very pleased by purchase. I hope that Dr. Squatch's line expands to include lotion and aftershave in the future.
This soap is invigorating, opens my sinuses, and makes my skin feel and smell great; it's my second favorite soap from Dr Squatch.
Dr. Squatch is legit. Great soap, great scents. Only downside is even with the soap saver the soap does not last that long. I will be a returning customer.
What does Dr. Squat he and Mentos have in common? You guessed it! They both make you the Freshmaker!!

I love my Dr. Squatch soap, and I want it to last as long as possible. Just throwing them wherever isn't an option for me. I looked at some other fancy soap dishes, but the Sasquatchian size of the bar requires an equally mighty place to store my soap after each use. The Dr. Squatch soap saver fits the bill perfectly. My soaps sit nicely on top of it, and the pleasant smell of cedar from the Soap Saver compliments any bar that I happen to be using at the time. If you've made the investment in the soap, ensure it lasts as long as possible and get yourself a Soap Saver. It's worth it!
this soap is really good. I like to purchase the other different types you have.
Smells like manhood and freedom
incredible soap that smells amazing and makes my skin feel great.
This is the soap you've been looking for! Do yourself a favor and fill your cart! You WONT be disappointed!
Great soap, looking forward to getting some more
Bought for DH ... Smells wonderful and he likes it too!
As long as I can afford it, I'll be a Dr. Squatch.

Scent was not nearly what was expected, tended to be a little weak, but masculine. Exfoliation ability second to none! Durability of the bar was poor. Only lasted about 5 days until the bar became a soggy black mass with no firmness and starting to fall apart in clumps. Too expensive to need throw a third of the bar of soap away.
I wrote an email explaining that the package was never received. post office said it was delivered, but must have been left in insecure place and stolen by a passerby

review_title: I don't think I've ever smelled so good
review_content: At first I was a little skeptical about designer soap for men. But I was wrong, these soaps could not possibly be any better, they clean incredibly well, and leave you smelling fresh all day long.
The moment I started using the Pine Tar soap I knew something great was happening, and using the rest of the sample pack further proved my belief. Manly scent, my wife loves me a little more now.

So far I have used the Pine Tar and the Bay Rum....both are great and I was really happy. The price isn't too bad, but wish that shipping were less expensive since your product is not available in retail stores in my state, Oregon. 
 
It would be great to market your product here and get into some stores here. You product would be a great fit as it is very "Oregon"....also there is a lot of Sasquatch stuff in the great Pacific Northwest!
Dopeness supreme
Showering is enjoyable again.

While I am very satisfied with the soap products that I did receive, I did not receive the cologne samples that were a part of the order. Six dollars is obviously not a big deal, but since I was charged for it, I would appreciate if you could send me that. Thank you.

review_title: More Woodsy than a Bear Turd
review_content: If I'm going to take the time to clean up in my solar-powered shower hanging from a tree, I want to smell like the wild, mossy lands of Cascadia. But only the good parts. This soap captures that essence into a bar form and makes me feel and smell great, even when my flannel shirt is dirty.

review_title: The most manly soap I've ever used.
review_content: I wasn't sure if I was going to like this soap but I really did. It's got a great smell to all three I've tried. I enjoyed the texture and feel of the bar. I think I will be buying again soon.
Awesome soap, makes me not want to get out the shower. Definitely a good customers
Best value soap ive used in a long time will continue to use it

I have been using body scrub for years and decided to give your product a try. After receiving and using your product I came to the conclusion that i have been bathing wrong for years. Not only does your product make me smell great it makes my bathroom smell great post shower. Needless to say you have a customer for life. Keep up the great work. One last thing R&D need to get working on a travel case.
I would gladly write you a glowing review but my soap never arrived. I got an e-mail saying that the soap savers were out, so I am still waiting on the order.
I love this stuff! Pine tar will wake you up in the morning that's for certain!
Hemptations customers love Dr. Squatch Soap. We have a tough time keeping it on the shelves and our orders keep getting bigger. Cheers to the Dr.
ive some of the other scents but really wanted to try the pine tar soap. I ordered some and I am officially hooked. I have found my go to soap.

I love the scent of the soaps, i also got some of the hemlock grove cologne - its an oil, but pricey and really small. 
 
I still like and recommend the products. It would be great if bars were larger (for price) or it was available via amazon, so i could save on the shipping. 
 
I'm still giving it a high rating because not only are the scents right on the money (but need a new one: sage, oregano and bear haha) and they dont contain ANY poison or unnatural crap. 
 
A natural deodorant from them would be awesome too, i'd buy it.

I know the title seems a bit of an overstretch but, honestly, it's a pretty amazing product. I've had great results with my skin type. No dryness, no itchiness, and no acne! Which at my age (39) is a definite plus. also, as an added bonus, my wife LOVES the scent and likes to hang around me now just to smell me. Pretty amazing stuff.

This soap smells incredible! I would definitely encourage the soap saver, and using a loofa or washcloth. It seems like I use more of it if I don €:tm:t use a loofa. That being said, it smells awesome. Best part? I don €:tm:t feel like I have a bunch of chemicals on me when I leave the shower!
I have never felt so clean or smelled so good than when I use this soap! The smell even hangs around all day and keeps me smelling like the excellent product that I used that morning.
ive used similar types of soap in the past. Nothing compares to the quality and the scent of these soaps. I promise I will be a long time user.

review_title: Best bars of natural soap for men out there!!!!
review_content: Your bars of soap lather nicely leaving the skin feeling great after rinse. The fragrance is perfect and easy on the nose and to others. Overall I'm going to be getting my bars of soap from you guys. Keep up the good work!
Shipping was fast and the quality is incredible. I plan to use this soap for a long time and glad I came across it.
Love the Gold Moss Scrub. I thought the scent would be stronger. It is very mild.
I love the smell

I like all the products I €:tm:ve tried but the quality control seems to be falling apart. 1) I bought a cedar soap holder. It looked like something I could make in my shop in about 2 minutes (rough, crude manufacture & finish) then my soap stuck to it and peeled off the top layers of some of the bars in the form of pungee-stick-like splinters! 
2) Most recent bar of the Pine Tar Soap (my favorite) felt like the abrasive grit was going to take my skin off! (don €:tm:t remember the first bar being this rough) 
3) I paid $7 for two different samples of the cologne and got two of the same thing €”the one I already owned! 
Come on guys, you €:tm:re products deserve better management!
love the rum soap
Absolutely loved the cigar gift box, the soap scents smells are incredible. Will definitely purchase again!
Great scent and perfect all around except that it "gels" more than average soap when left in the shower. This may be because of the way its made high quality meaning not mass produced.
wife hates that it leaves a black soap scum...im not happy, in that it doesnt make me smell at all...but the shower smells great.Ill try one other kind. I DO like the exfoliant property of it.
I've tried almost all the soaps and keep coming back to this one. Great stuff
The pine tar really exfoliates and smells wonderful. My husband has been using this bar for 2 weeks and it could probably last another week or two. He loves it! Great value!
ordered 2 bars and only received 1 bar

So far I've been using the Pine Tar soap and LOVE IT! I've always been very olfactory and love earth scents and Dr. Squatch is right up my alley. I also tried the sampler colognes and have had several compliments on how good I smell. :)

review_title: Smell and Texture Are Great, but the Color
review_content: I really liked the Pine Tar soap (smell and texture). My only complaint would be the black residue that comes off of it whilst using it and that comes streaking down your shower wall after your shower. Unlike an actual Sasquatch, I can't shower in the woods.

Shipping was quick and easy. Bought 4 different bars and they all smell great. I have bought some handmade soap from a couple of other companies and this one definitely lasts longer and lathers better. Will buy more when I'm out!

Best soap I've ever used. I have sensitive skin always had to use special shampoo and only certain commercial soaps or I'd get flakey skin and rashes. Using this soap has made a world of difference. I don't even use shampoo at all now. I was my hair and body with this soap. Love it. Pine tar is my favorite.
z
Although both scents are great, I was drawn to the Hemlock Trail which worked well with my body chemistry.
Best Soap Ever. It's also made in America which is a bonus. Buy it now.
Now just need a travel case!
I love your soap! I will be back for more!

This soap is the love child of jerimiah Johnson and grizzly Adams. The single greatest soap to grace my shower. My wife used this soap and grew a beard on her vagina. If you want to smell like perfextion, then you must buy this soap.

review_title: Love how my shower smells when I step in it
review_content: The smell of my shower alone is worth having this soap sitting on the shelf. Not to mention how soft the greek eucalyptus makes my skin feel, oh, and the Pine Tar does a good job of getting the grime out too!
I am a huge fan of your brand!!
I love everything about your product! I can't wait to order more and try your cologne. Hopefully you'll come out with deodorant!
I have only tried the Gold Moss scent soap, but like what I have experienced so far. Scent is great, skin feels nice after shower, and wife seems to approve. Looking forward to pine tar next!

review_title: Got the pine tar and love it.
review_content: I don't get that itchy feeling from other soap. It smells nice and manly. I had a bunch of women trying to guess what it was. They all thought it was some type of cologne. Can't wait to try the other scents.

I've only used the Gold Moss Scrub so far and I love it! It has a subtle earthy scent that stays with you all day, and along with the soap saver, it makes my bathroom smell amazing all day. Can't wait to use the Pine Tar and I will definitely be joining the club before I run out.
I love your soap products but am frustrated by the lack of availability in Vancouver, BC Canada!!
Love Dr. Squatch, its rugged and sweet......just like me!
Love Dr. Squatch, its rugged and sweet......just like me!

Great soap, washes me great, my skin hasn't felt this good in a long time. I love the texture of the soap. Smells fantastic too! My only issue, is that it gets used up pretty quick. And when you factor in shipping it's like 9 bucks. So to me that's a little pricey for what you get, but it's still good soap. Very manly
This is the best soap I have ever used, great smell and leaves my skin feeling great.
Great way to get fresh , but stay manly after a good active day!
Awesome soaps!
Thoroughly enjoying the soap, the rich lather and the earthy smell are the best I have used.

review_title: Soap seems good. Colognes smelled nasty!
review_content: i wish I could have received a bar of the bay rum instead of he pine tar. The other two soaps smell great. The cologne samples smelled awful, worse than petchuli oil! Will never buy those.

i am usually hard to impress however you guys have outdone yourselves! Fantastic smelling soaps of the highest quality for a very reasonable price. You have a new lifelong customer! Keep up the great work and keep shipping out your top notch products.
Me likey

Just began using my first bar of soap, Bay Rum, and enjoy it. My wife loves the smell of it and all of them. 
 
I am a little disappointed in the exfoliate bar - used to my liquid "scrub" that "scrubs" my face more. 
 
The cigar box is a nice touch. We will pass it on as a gift box. 
 
Great products, reasonably priced.
The wife loves it and wasn't me to use it everyday.
Great soap. Great customer service.
I love the gold moss scrub, it smells awesome and doesn't leave residue like so many other soaps on the skin.
The soaps smell really good (I really like the spearmint).
The soaps smell really good (I really like the spearmint).

review_title: Awesome way to wake up and scare the moths
review_content: I woke up every morning and took a shower with this awesome bar of soap. At the same I enjoyed the smell and knowledge that moths would never eat my shower curtain at the presence of the overwhelming aroma of Cedar and Oranges.

I only got four scents so far and plan on getting the next for next month, because I'm impressed so far. My skin feels cleaner after every use and it's nice knowing I'm using natural ingredients. My favorite bar so far is the Gold Moss Scrub, with the Deep Sea Goat's Milk in a close second. If you want to step up your shower game , I suggest you get the Squatch ASAP !!

review_title: Cedar Citrus soap is good stuff
review_content: I've been using the Cedar Citrus soap for the last month and have been really happy with it's refreshing scent. I keep a bar of it next to the sink and use it everyday. I wanted to get away from all the harsh chemicals in antibacterial soaps and was looking for a better alternative and Dr. Squatch has been a great find. As long as you're in business I will be a customer. Thanks!
my boyfriend loves this soap. Will definitely be purchasing more.

I swore I'd never leave my Gold Moss until I tried Cool Fresh Aloe. It is indeed "Nature's Version of Irish Spring". The scent is a little milder than Irish Spring and a touch sweeter, both improvements in my book.

This is wonderful soap. The scent is clean, fresh, subtle, and really does make you think of the sea. It easily builds a nice lather. I have even used it to clean my hair (recently shaved my head so it's pretty short) and been very happy with the results. Overall, a really great product. I highly recommend it.

review_title: Cool fresh aloe is the tits!
review_content: Cool fresh aloe is the tits. Both of them. My new favorite.. Sorry gold moss.

I really do. I never considered myself an all natuaral guy but i saw an add for this and figured id try it out. I 1st got 3 bars and went through that quickly. Each bar last me like 2 weeks. I upped my soapscription to 6. Thats seems like the correct number for me. I goat 1 of each other than the black tar and all of them have been great. No regrets
Great price, good smell, nice lather. The shipping was fast too.
Pine tar is the best but I've liked every soap bar I've gotten from Dr Squatch
The bar fell apart after 3 showers. Not impressed.

I love my products from Dr. Squatch - I will upgrade from my cologne sampler to a full bottle, and I will continue to order the pine tar soap. I wish they would develope more soaps with an exfoliant like the pine soap - maybe a cedar scent or a bourbon vanilla with hints of apricot that contains an exfoliant.
Love the soap - and it's cool name,

I ordered the Gold Moss Scrub and the Bay Rum. After reading some of the reviews I was leery about the longevity of the soap. I have just passed 2 and a half weeks with the Gold Moss Scrup and I still have a good week or more worth of soap to go. Overall it is about half the use life I was getting from my store bought brand, but the cleanliness and lasting sent more than make up for what it lacks in use life. I will never go back. I'm signing up for the soapscription and am excited/hopeful to see if my wife's reaction will be the same.

Just broke this bar out after using the Pine Tar. Night and day difference. The Aloe has no appreciable scent at all to me. It's great for your skin and would be a perfect winter soap for colder climes and dry skin time.
Received first order. Some for me and Christmas gift if I like it. Using black one and cedar I think. Very good so far. Plan to use for self and self at this point. really like.
Received my order quickly and it smells great! My Dad will love it!

review_title: Soap good, soap saver just ok
review_content: the soap is great. It works well, doesn't dry my skin out, smells good and is a pretty big bar. The soap saver is just okay. Soap tends to stick to it and if you aren't careful you can end up losing some of your soap pulling the bar off
I love them both, they smell fantastic, unfortunately they aren't marked so it's impossible to know which sample is which cologne, just a tad frustrating.
i was excited to try their soap and it does not disappoint. The wife can barely keep her hands off of me now that I don't smell like a moldy show.
I purchased the Golden Moss and Pine Tar soaps. They clean well and my wife likes the scent. I will be repeating my order.

Very nicely done. I've had dry/rough skin problems for years. So far, my skin feels better and has more moisture with your soaps. I love the Gold Moss Scrub and am hoping to see a growing product line in the future.
Big fan on the scent and it lathers very well, but I've only used it three times and it seems to have shrunk a good deal. I guess it just comes with the territory, at least it's pretty affordable.

I'm a Soapscriber and I have to say that Deep Sea Goat's Milk is by far the best soap I've ever used. The smell of it wakes you up in the morning, the texture makes you feel clean. I have to say if you're going to by a soap try DEEP SEA GOAT'S MILK.

I ordered the sampler (3 soaps and the soap saver) and the cologne sampler. So far the soap is excellent (Gold Moss) and I am looking forward to trying the other two. 
 
I'm very happy with the cologne so far (Hemlock Trail).
Great product, great customer service, great scents, great cleansing!

review_title: Save this soap for my face/beard only
review_content: I purchased the Pine Tar soap for my psoriasis, use it for washing my face, it seems to be working! Leaves my goatee looking shining and skin soft like a baby's behind. Nice stuff!

We've just added this to our product selection at Storm Men's Shop and we are super excited to have this multi-functional, organic, locally-made cologne/beard oil! One whiff will take you from the store to the great outdoors!
Not sure if I wanna try black tar.
Purchased two bars of the gold moss scrub, highly recommended!
Dosent last long enough. About a week that's about it. And it dosent really smells like it says .

I totally love this oil, mind you I haven't worn cologne since i was about 25, almost 30 years later i get introduced to the Squatch family by my daughter in the form of a soap gift box, well along comes the beard oil and I see Hemlock Trail is recommended for those that like "pine tar" soap so of course i get it......my wife wishes I had that kind of instant love for her that i did for the Hemlock Trail.....now I use it every morning, a couple drops in the palm and straight to my hair, which is short and cut in flat top style so it helps keep it in shape too.....I get excited every time the guys say they are coming out with a new product, I just hope they all smell like pine tar hahahaaaa....seriously, I love their products and the customer service is 2d to none

I ordered the Gold Moss Scrub and Bay Rum soaps. After 3 weeks I €:tm:m still on my first bar, Gold Moss Scrub. I love the scent, not too heavy. It rinses clean, doesn €:tm:t leave you feeling sticky, or dry €¦I €:tm:ve used bar soup specifically for oily skin, or €œnatural €? ingredient that dry the hell out of my skin and leaves it flakey. This soap doesn €:tm:t do that. It cleans deep, but leaves enough moisture so my skin doesn €:tm:t over produce oil to compensate. No regrets so far, when I get down to my last bar I €:tm:m think of trying some of the other choices.
I wasn't too impressed the soap. I expected the scent to last a long time
I usually only wear Creed but my wife loves this and it lasts for 10 plus hours.

I tried the Gold Moss. Smells great, but I get too dirty at work for that soap, so I tried Pine Tar for the sand and oatmeal. Works great! Gets my skin clean without drying, and leaves the bathroom smelling fresh. This is my new soap.

review_title: Smells great, doesn't last as long
review_content: Let me start by saying I love the smell. It smells like a cedar chest, pine trees, and sage. Having said that, I was disappointed in how short the fragrance lasted. If you get this, make plans on it lasting only a few hours.
I love the soap and would use it exclusively, shipping costs are a killer though. Great product!

This soap is great. Lathers great, but the first bar went quick even with the soap saver. I used the second bar by applying it to a loofa and it lathered up great and made the soap last longer because the bar wasn't constantly in contact with water. You also get the benefits of the exfoliating loofa! I got the cologne sample with my favorites bundle and will be purchasing the Hemlock trail very soon! Great products, Imma Keep Squatchin'!
I love the smells. I love the clean. I love that I can bathe in the river, like a man, with man soap.
The oils that I bought smell good and last pretty much all day.
Makes me smell so much better!

I have been waiting for the soap to come in the mail, WOW that is some great soap all natural it's great for my skin and it smells out fucking standing. would you be so kind as to send me a catalogue so I can look through it to see what else I can purchase. 
With Regards 
Rick Houston
Will be ordering more. The sent isn't overpowering to me.

Throw away your body soap, throw away your shampoo and conditioner. I use this soap from head to toe! I don €:tm:t have much hair on the top notch but I have a long, thick beard and the Doc cleans that beast so nicely that even Sasquatch €:tm:s mother would approve! I €:tm:ve tried several different scents and have enjoyed them all. They all lather nicely and have a pretty good life expectancy even when used daily. Get the soap saver to make it last longer. Simplify your shower time. All you need is a bar of Dr. Squatch and a loofah washcloth and you €:tm:ll be right as rain!
I have been using this soap for a few weeks now and I love how much lather you get out of it so quickly, it definitely makes it last. The smell is great as well, I enjoy using this product very much!

The Bay Rum is great. I like the way it made the bathroom smell great. When I used it I was a bit hesitant, was worried it my dry out my skin but it hasn't, and the way my skin felt and smelled was awesome. My dad uses it too and he likes it.

I love this soap! The pine tar and golden moss especially. It's hard to find good quality soap for men and the good Dr didn't disappoint. My only pain point was the size of the bar. It's 5oz. In my opinion that's a chick's size soap bar. For this price it should be larger. At this PP I would expect a bar closer to 10oz. I would pay $10 for a 15oz bar and would keep coming back repeatedly. I remember a decade or so ago when The Body Shop carried something called a "milk bar". It was an oversized bar of soap made from goat's milk. It was abut $9 and probably 20oz or so. I cried the day it was discontinued. I hope you continue to grow. It's a great brand.

This is the first item I've ordered from Dr. Squatch Soap Co. so I didn't know what to expect but the scent is great! Definitely makes me feel more like a woodsman and the scent lasted for several hours after my shower. I would recommend this to anyone who is wanting to try these products but doesn't know which one to order.

review_title: Pleased with both use and results
review_content: This is my first experience with buying and using a bar of soap specifically intended for a beard. The soap performs well from providing an easy lather to rinsing off. It has a pleasant fragrance all its own, but it is not the "Irish Spring" scent at all. Best of all, my skin beneath the beard does not get soap residue nor itch. A very positive experience and as a *stand-alone experiment of sorts, I highly recommend it. (*I have no basis of comparison.)

review_title: I'll Be Back (in my best Arnold voice)
review_content: I was very tired of buying store bought garbage to cleanse this beautiful body. Went searching and this product is just what I was looking for and I am only on bar 1 of 3!! If you are a man's man this soap is for you!

My first bar from Squatch. It doesn't dry out my skin like other "all natural" bar soaps and has a fresh, light scent that carries some sweetness. I own a cigar lounge and the scent lasts well into the day even with all the smoke.

review_title: Big Fan, now that I'm a good smelling man
review_content: I love this soap. It has a unique and manly smell that isn't just an Axe generic smell. So glad to have found this group. Get your scent on!

review_title: A little late and out of stock...promises .. promises
review_content: Dr. Squatch was out of the cigar box..said it would be on time for someone special in the Family ...aka ...MY MARINE...and it shipped and was not on time for HIS birthday...but when it finally arrived HE loved it...just saying..

review_title: The gift that keeps on giving
review_content: My boyfriend is stationed overseas and requested a pack of these in his care package. And man, do they smell good! Easily my new favorite colognes of his.
I think the website is very easy to navigate and it's very easy to make a purchase. The soap is wonderful!
Feel clean and refreshed after each shower! Well done.
you guys make some good shit. However I wouldn't say no to a wider selection of fragrances

Tried my first bar about 6 weeks ago. I've ordered two more times since then. This soap is great! I feel clean and refreshed after my shower. And the scent lasts most of the day. I've shaved my head for 17 years and have found that Dr Squatch Soap also gives me a closer more comfortable shave than any shave cream or shave butter that I've tried. I'm getting on the auto ship plan with my next order.

That's right, smell like a man. Not some urban jungle, GQ man. I'm talking going hiking, wrestling a bear, working with his hands kind of man. All of the scents are manly, like rushing into a burning home, saving a little girl's kitten manly. You best try the Squatch, and understand the manliness.
Customer for life can't wait to try all the scents
Soap smells great leaves me feeling clean! Will buy again! Just need some shampoo, do you make that?
I love the smell,feel, and quality of this soap.
Always love receiving our shipment of soaps!! Our favorite soap ever!
Have used the Pine Tar for a week and switched up with Bay Rum and getting lots of compliments so getting noticed is not a problem! Can't wait to try the others :)
Love the way I feel after a shower. Love the way I smell. Becoming a monthly subscriber.
my first purchase and man this stuff is great. I want to try bay rum next!
I really like the Bayrum soap. I am allergic to a lot of soaps but this does not make me break out. And the scent is great.
The scents of these soaps are second to none. My only wish, the bars of soap lasted longer.
These soaps are natural with a fantastic smell! Will continue to buy them
I try to keep a stock pile in my cupboard but we keep running out because my husband keeps giving it away to his clients as gifts and they love it!
Great product

I enjoyed the pine tar soap the little lady love all of the, the cologne was killer got all,kinds compliments on it.

I love this stuff!!! Please consider larger bars though.

review_title: Great products at a great price!

review_title: Finally found the manly soap I have been looking for. .
review_content:

I even ordered a gift box for myself, why share. Customer service is great too, I ordered the wrong scent of cologne and they swapped it out right away with a simple email. Great natural soap, cool name, and I don't even have to leave my house to get it. 
 
- Cesar
loved almost every scent that i've tried and I always get compliments on how good i smell. wish the soaps lasted a bit longer or maybe i'm just showering much more often!
I ordered the pine tar soap, just to give it a try. It's great, much better than regular soap. Rinses clean away and smells like a pine tree!
I was tired of non-manly soap. I am now happy and smell like a man again,. Love Pine Tar and Gold Moss Scrub.
I'll go on a "diet' before I use any other brand of soap again!!

I bought the Pine Tar and Gold Moss. I am using the Pine Tar at the moment and it smells great. I was afraid it would be overpowering but it's not. And it does make your bathroom smell great. I was also concerned about the tackiness I notice on my skin when I use bar soaps (it just feels funky) , and there is tackiness with this one, but afterwards my skin feels soft. I will buy again.

review_title: Great soap, wish it lasted longer
review_content: Best soap I have ever used, I only got about 5 showers out of it, wish it would last a little longer
I'm liking the soaps I bought. It's nice to find a quality product that does not leave you smelling as if you rubbed potpourri on your body.

review_title: I'm now as clean as a squatch!

ray.odea@frontier.com

I have always had issues with very dry skin. Especially with store bought mass produced soaps. The natural ingredients in Dr Squatch soap leaves my skin smooth and hydrated. review_content: Not much different from the bar soap. Same kind of scents. Hard to make a heavy lather with. I'm just going to stick with the body bars.

Love the other soaps from Dr. Squatch, but this one is a miss. The soap doesn't lather well and the lather doesn't hold. Before I even finish shaving one side of my face, the lather is gone from the other side. Love their Bay Rum soap, but going to have to take a pass on this one. Save your money and don't get this.

review_title: Love Dr Squatch soap co. Great product at fair prices.
review_content: Love the fact that it is all natural, my sensitive skin no longer breaks out in rashes. The scents are great, so tired of all of the musk and so called manly scents. Bay Rum is my favorite.

After using my Black Pine Tar soap for the first time €”and loving it €”I put the bar on the little wooden "Soap Saver" wooden pallet guy. When I returned to shower again, the soap had ADHERED to the unit such that it became a soapy nightmare. I couldn't get it off! I've since put the bar on its edge, on the wooden thingy, thinking that less surface area will decrease the adherence. It's better. Perhaps a tweak in the design is in order?

Bought the favorites bundle (soap saver, pine tar, gold moss scrub and Citrus). Have been using the Gold moss and I'm lovin it. Smells great, makes my whole bathroom smell great, and the wife likes it as well. Seems to be doing wonders for my sissy sensitive skin and eczema. My skin does not feel dried out like it does at times using regular bar soap. Can't wait to try the other two and possibly more! 
The only negative comment (and the reason I only gave 4 instead of 5 stars) is that the soap seems to not last as long as you would think paying $5-$6 a bar. Other than that, I love it!
Not sure what I'm doing wrong, but I can't get it to lather up well. I wish it had more instruction on the tin.

review_title: Dr. Squatch made me so manly that the old spice guys ask me how to act manly.
review_content: Seriously the best soap and cologne I have ever bought. I have not stepped foot in a store to buy soap for almost a year now. Use Dr. Squatch and you will immediately be more majestic than Abraham Lincoln riding a bald eagle.

Another order placed and still loving it! These are by far my favorite hand made all natural soap bars and I have tried plenty. These bars are just plain awesome. If you are on the fence about trying there out just do it. YOU WONT BE SORRY!
I'm never turning back. The soaps are great. Great smell, great feel, no residue, the scent lingers for the whole day. Keep it up!

I appreciate a good shave mug. I've been using my grandad's decades old Old Spice mug for quite some time. Now I've retired it as decoration in the man cave and now using this mug for my shaving needs. Looks great in the bathroom, and the copper helps hold heat for the shaving cream/soap. Great product!

I am a new customer and ordered three bars to start. Really, really liked the Gold Moss, though I do wish that the scent would remain a little stronger. Still, it is listed as "mild" in that category, so that's fine. This one, though, is rated as a "medium." Out of the package and when it's in use, the bar smells great. But once I'm done with the shower, I can't smell it at all. Granted, I don't smell like fumunda cheese and onions so I guess it's doing the job of cleaning, but there's no lingering scent at all. I expected the scent to be stronger than that of the Gold Moss and was surprised to find that it's basically non-existent. Will buy Gold Moss again, and plan to try the Bay Rum next, but I won't be getting this one again.
Smells great! What's not to like? If I had my way, it would be a little bit stronger in the smell department, but what do I know? It'd probably just mess it up. 5 stars as is!

review_title: Difficult to load, but overall great!
review_content:
Dr Squatch's Shave Bar is a unique smelling soap with a great masculine scent of clay, mint and a very nice citrus hint at the end that stays with you after the shave.

During the time of this shave I had two weeks facial hair growth, a new Persona blade in a Phoenix DOC Safety Razor.

I do have to say at the beginning using this soap while blooming it I was almost about to give up, there is a certain way that this soap needs to be lathered. If you fail to lather it in the way that it is designed to you will be very disappointed in the results.

This soap is a very hard soap to lather if you do not know what you are doing. If are used to a wet brush and blooming your soap this soap will cause you to change your habits. This soap does not like excess water, if you use too much water you will be very disappointed to see the result, that result being a foamy lather. When the soap is applied onto the face correctly with minimal water you are going to have to hydrate the soap roughly 45 seconds to a minute in order to keep it as a cream, if you choose not to it will dry out on your face. I also noticed that this soap works better with a smaller boar size brush due to the size of the puck being 4.5 oz. My best result was with an Omega 46065 boar brush with a face lather. I also tried with a 30mm knot Whipped Dog High Mountain Badger brush and a Esccali badger brush, the soap worked great in both a face and bowl lather although I would recommend a bowl lather as it is a lot easier to see the reaction of the soap and add water.

When this soap is loaded correctly the soap is a great soap, with a strong masculine smell and glide that it supplies could be a soap I would turn to on a regular shaving basis. I would be reluctant to use this soap while shaving a longer growth just because of how much attention has to be applied to the consistency of the soap, if there is too much or too less water you will not enjoy the shave. I would not recommend this soap for newcomers to the art of traditional shaving just because of all the factors that come into play. Price of this soap is 12$ for 4.5 ounces that puts the cost as 2.66$ per ounce which is beyond fair in my eyes.

Loading ability of this soap is going to be lower due to just how picky it is for this soap to form a good lather. I will give it a 4 out of 10.

Peaks with this soap are very nice and deserve nothing less than a 8 out of 10.

Gliding ability with this soap is a 7 out of 10.

Scent of this soap would receive a 9 out of 10.

Overall this soap would receive a 7 out of 10.

Of course I always would recommend a good pre-shave to help with the gliding ability.
This soap is by far the best stuff on earth!!!!
I got the sampler pack and I love the scents included all excellent! I have a problem with the fact the soap crumbles to unusable clumps with about 1/4 the bar remaining.
Dr Squatch soap is by far the greatest soap. It leaves you feeling fresh
As she sits sniffing my face and telling me it should get five stars.
The mug is a good size, deep, and easy to handle. Unfortunately the shave soap does not lather well.

review_title: I'm Funky but my smell is not !
review_content: My wife always told me that you don't have to smell like the music you love ! Now thanx to Dr. Squatch I can be funky with out smelling funky. I have tried many of the soaps at this point but my favorite is the Pine Tar Soap. It does an excellent job exfoliating and getting rid of all the odor in the tricky spots like armpits and the crotch. Thanx to Dr. Squatch I have happy crotch !

review_title: Great soap, awesome smell, feels great!
review_content: This soap was amazing. The texture, smell, and quality are all perfect. I have always struggled with a small amount of acne/blemishes on my shoulders and back and decided to finally buy a natural soap to try and help this situation. Dr. Squatch cleared everything up in about 5 days. The grit is just right to rough up the skin and exfoliate, without being painful or abrasive. I hate to follow up such a positive 5 star review with a complaint, but the size is just too small for the price. The one bar lasted me less than 3 weeks. It's possible that I did indulge as I used it to scrub my face and (hairless) head every day too, but even if I could get a full month out of a bar, $9 is a bit too much as a monthly expense for soap. I fully realize that this is a premium product, and the product is fantastic, but it may just be that it's a little out of my budget. Either way, great work Doctor!
The Dr. Squatch Favorites Bundle is just as advertised - AWESOME!
I cut each bar in half for better handling. Great scent!
I bought some for my fiancÃ:copyright: on a whim and I loved it! He smells much better after using the pine tar soap. :) We will definitely keep a store of this soap!
mmmm pine trees
Finally soaps for men that smell great and take care of our skin.
Have not tried yet. But anxious to do so.

review_title: Best Soap I have ever tried!
review_content: I have tried tried many a brand of soap, both liquid and bar. I must say that, I am very impressed with the Dr Squatch soap. I like how it leaves you skin feeling very clean and fresh smelling. I am definitely going to setup a soap subscription, so I never run out.
Pine Tar and Citrus Cedar are AMAZING! I do not care for Gold Moss.

Seriously, smell me. I smell great. Don't just dismiss me, try an arm. It's innocent, I swear. Yes, that's weird. But I have yet to have anyone disagree with me. Gold Moss is awesome, can't wait to try the other randoms I got.
Love it!!!
I've bought every soap now. Every one is great. Hard to pick a favorite
So far I've only used the eucalyptus yogurt soap. But I think it is great.
Best soap ever. love the bay rum

Like you just stepped into an orange grove in the middle of a damp cedar forest. Definitely recommend it for anyone who's looking for a great soap without an overpowering scent.

I love the fact that I feel super clean after I step out of the shower, and I love the way it makes my skin feel. This is the first time in a long time that I haven €:tm:t felt a €œfilm €? or dryness after using other mass produced soaps. So far, the $6/bar price tag has been more than worth it! The best part for me is that the soap rinses clean but also doesn €:tm:t dry out your skin like so many other soaps do up here in the arctic.
