So far this is my favorite scent so far. A nice lemon scent with a hint of mint, just wish the exfoliation was as aggressive or equal to the mint eucalyptus bar.

I started using this product a couple of weeks ago, and I must say there is no better product that has cleaned so well and left my skin moisturized and smooth. The scents are subtle but awesome, and I couldn't get rid of my old products quickly enough!

Was really excited for this bag, and still am. I absolutely love the quality. I am actually planning on picking another one up so i can have one to store unused bars, and one to carry around bars that i am using. I found that it handles wet bars very well. Was so excited to see my state flag inside. We take that VERY seriously here in CO, and i’m Boulder’s biggest squatch fan.

I was excited waiting on the arrival of these colognes in hopes to finding a scent Id like to wear on a daily basis. Well these tiny bottles showed up and didn't sell me on wanting to risk spending the full boat on a bottle. They seem to smell ok, but its literally gone in seconds. I thought I was just used to the scent, but I asked others and they couldn't smell anything either. I wonder how these samples received a bulk of 5 stars. I didn't go through them all, but how do you give 5 stars and then say you wish it lasted longer?? And go as far as saying within an hour it was gone?? Sounds like a VERY generous review! I only gave it 2 stars because as my title displayed it saved me from spending $43 on a whole bottle so that was a positive. I am not happy reporting this as I was hoping to like it and order a bottle. Maybe if these samples came in a mini spray application it would've sold it better. IDK
Just finishing my first bar of Pine Tar and am very happy with it. I have tried all of the products here and like them all. Glad I saw the site.

review_title: Cheaply Made, Soap Sticks to It
review_content: More like a paperweight. As the title states, the soap simply sticks to it.
Has all the great qualities I expect from Dr. Squatch just has a licorice smell I'm not fond of but still this is a great soap.

Damn straight it is, I just opened my Box of Pine Tar Exfoliating Soap last night, and I have never felt so clean, and refreshed afterwards, for once not completely dried out, and the scent took me like the Pacific Northwest, and lasted through the night, I am thoroughly Impressed, I can't wait to try Cedar Citrus when this bar is through, well done Gents, Cheers:beers::thumbsup::thumbsup::clap::national_park::evergreen_tree: #10/10

review_title: The Pine Tar is a grime killer!
review_content: As a mechanic it is hard to find a soap that knocks out grease and grime without drying your skin out. Pine Tar takes care of both, and it smells fantastic!
The scent is nice but not very strong. The lather is not as thick as some of the other offerings. It does the job quite well though. This would be good for everyday use.

I used a few other soap savers because they were cheaper and didn’t get any extended time from each bar. So I finally got this one and let me tell you it extended my bar 10 extra days!! So this is well worth the price!!! Looks great and smells great!
I have now tried all the scents and this is one of my favorite ones! Love the smell and man does it moisturize!!!

review_title: For the bearded man or for the lady
review_content: This is absolutely the best thing for a mans face especially if you have a beard!!! Also my wife loves this one the most and she gets this for her too!
Love this one! And the scent last allllllllll day and night!!!
Man this one is soooo good! Scent last all day and I’ve got many compliments from this one!!!
Scent is awesome and last forever! You must check this one out!!
One of my favorites and man does this get a lot of compliments! You got to check this one out!
This one makes me want to set sail and travel uncharted waters! No joke, this scent will definitely make your day a lot better!

review_title: Like a walk in the woods!
review_content: Want to go hiking but don’t have the time? Then use this one because you will smell like you have been hiking all day! The scent is one of the best!!!

I have tried all of their scents and this is the very best one! Many compliments when I use this one! Great for the bearded man too!! If you are on the fence about trying any of their soaps, then get this one first! You instantly will become a believer and a lifelong customer! Plus these guys go above and beyond with their customers!

review_title: Did not know what I was thinking when I ordered Nautical Sage...BUT......
review_content: Did not know what I was thinking when I ordered this flavor...BUT...this is excellent. The soaps are great, but the Nautical Sage scent is amazing. You'll must get a bar to discover it for yourself.

review_title: Not pleased. Sticker right on the box and now I can’t get it off
review_content: Just looks horrible with the sticker all smudged into the box... not happy with this. Been trying to get it off for 30 mins now. Now this Christmas present looks unpresentable.
I have used 5 different bars, so far. Spearmint Basil and Bay Rom are my top two. It'll be hard to top those!

This was the first bar I ordered after reading so many reviews. I'm not huge on exfoliation, however, if you're looking for a bar that exfoliates very well, then THIS BAR is for you! It had an "OK" smell to me, however, for my first bar I was somewhat left disappointed. I ended up liking my second bar of Bay Rum, much better.

Terrible product,over priced to start with,and like the other1star reviews I agree, despite its claim not to stick......it does.
I like the soap I'm on a subscription and will stay. I also bought the travel bag haven't used it yet,but it doesn't look very good
A pie of burlap that will soak up and stick to what ever it packed to. Could have made on out of a spud sack,Cologne is also missing it projections! Stick to the soap people you'll be better off. I emailed twice without response,other than we'll get back to you,here's some music ti dance to.

review_title: It's ok....but not worth $18.00 a bottle
review_content: I bought this shampoo expecting something special. I was a little disappointed after washing my hair the first time using it.......don't get me wrong it does the job but no better than a $8.00 bottle I can get at any Walmart and it has a funky smell........ It wasn't anything special and definitely not worth $18.00 for that size bottle...
This one required a little more rinsing and left me with a tolerable itch. The itch might be a me thing though with this scent.
The water bill went up for sure.

I have naturally straight and oily hair, so washing my hair once or twice a day wasn't uncommon. I tried several brands but none seemed to work and the shampoo/conditioner combos made my hair even more greasy. Hence I was skeptical on using this conditioner everyday. However, after almost two months of continuous use I noticed my hair feels stronger and thicker and can last the entire day without becoming overly oily and gross. The conditioner really works to remove excess oil and keep the hair feeling clean throughout the day, and on the two days a week I do shampoo, holy squatch! My hair feels like a lion's mane flowing majestically through the breeze. A must have product for any man who desires cleaner, softer, and stronger hair.
Its ok light and fresh

I have used a few of the Dr. Squatch soaps and while they are all great, the Deep Sea Goats Milk takes the cake. Seriously one of the best soaps i’ve ever used. My skin is still incredibly soft and moisturized hours after showering. Can not recommend it enough!

This bar is awesome for shaving! It makes a thick lather that clings to the skin and rinses away cleanly. My razor glided smoothly over my face and the aloe helped to prevent razor burn. 

The scent is pleasant but not something that I will rave about. It's simply a fresh, clean smell. This would be a great bar for folks with dry skin or those that want a smooth shave.
These soaps are tremendous! No more itchy dry skin for me. They all smell great too!:thumbsup:

review_title: Without a doubt, the best soap I have ever used.
review_content: I am absolutely in love with this soap. I suffer from extremely dry skin due to a medication I take, and Dr Squatch is the only soap that leaves me feeling clean, without having dry tight skin. In addition, my wife loves how I smell after showering. This is a big deal because my wife HATES scented body products. I can't say enough good things about this bar soap. I recommend it to anyone and everyone.
This is a great smelling bar of soap! Very sweet and strong. The scent fills the entire bathroom. It makes good lather too. I like washing my beard with the Bay Rum bar.

review_title: Amazing for your hair and scalp!
review_content:
I've literally been using stuff to counter the effects of bad hair products for several years now. This has given me the opportunity to stop buying all those things that damage my hair and scalp, and doing things to correct the problems that they had caused. The shampoo and conditioner are 2nd to none and they smell great too! Everyone should have these! My scalp was suffering so bad before using these two products!

Thank you so much Dr. Squatch!

One of the things that I love the most about Dr. Squatch soap is the scent. This bar has a very faint scent compared to the other bars that I've tried. It's a shame because I love the scent of sage. You can barely smell this bar though. On the upside, this bar makes good lather and rinses away clean. This is per usual with Dr. Squatch. Make the scent a little stronger and this would be a dynamite bar of soap.

This is hands down, the best, hydrateness, bodily cleanselinessing, refreshingly sent applicator, bar of soap. Such as CEDAR CITRIUS, I have ever bought. The smell reminded me of the old cedar jungle gyms I use to play on as wee lad.
So BRAVO!
You have earned yourself a new loyal customer!
Tried 4 types of Dr.Squatch soaps so far. This is my favorite, with Bay Rum a close second. Eventually I'll try them all, but I use one until it's gone. Maybe I'll begin alternating..

I like it because it is easy when I go to the gym but the moisture bleeds through a bit and gets soap on the rest of my stuff. Not much though so I am still a fan. One issue I have is I am unable to find a square soap container so I kind of have to use this. If they sold one of those I would def. buy it.
I am a big fan of this one, I have dry skin so this has helped me stay moisturized. My wife likes the smell which is obviously a plus.

This bar is different. It has a unique smell unlike any other bar of soap I've ever smelled. The spearmint is very slight and gets overpowered by the basil resulting in a scent reminiscent of dill pickles. I was expecting a scent that was totally different from what I actually got. Not bad though! The lather was great as per usual.
Great soap. Currently using Nautical Sage. Cleans so well I can shower 4 times a week instead of 7. Try it out you will notice a difference. Ordered all 10 scents, adding variety to the experience.

review_title: Can't Review What I Haven't Received
review_content: I ordered the Pine Tar soap in December and was excited to try it as it had many good reviews. However on receiving my order, I found the incorrect soap had been shipped. Mistakes happen, so I contacted the company which said they would ship the correct Pine Tar scent and that I could keep the 2 bars of incorrectly shipped soap. I thought, "That's great service". That was a month ago. I am still waiting for the correct soap and the tracking number that I was told would be sent. Now I'm thinking, "That's NOT great service."

This bar smells AWESOME because of the eucalyptus. It's a strong scent that fills the entire bathroom. It's so strong that it will help open your sinuses! I love it! Unfortunately, eucalyptus does have a downside. It can be harsh on the skin. I felt a bit dry and tight after a few days of using this bar. Other than that it's great. I'd definitely recommend this bar but beware if you have a problem with dry skin.

I have tried them all. I have been looking for THIS SOAP! I was skeptical at paying 7 bucks for a bar of soap; WORTH EVERY PENNY. I got my soap yesterday and took my first shower with it this morning. I rubbed the soap on a clean wash cloth, only took a little, and it was plenty to wash my entire body. It smells great, feels great, and I have no words for how I feel after. Even an hour later at my desk, my skin feels clean, soft an hydrated. This is amazing. I used the Pine tar, can't wait to try the other two. Awesome product guys, it's the best soap I've ever used. It looks like it will last a good long time too. I'll update later when I finish this bar.
No more itchy ass.

I don’t know about the soap because I have yet to receive it. I placed an order on Jan. 14th and received a shipment notification on Jan. 15th. It is Jan. 25th and I still have not received my order. I sent an e-mail request for an update of my order with no response so far. Maybe this review will get a response.

Dr squatch's body soap always left me feeling super clean and ready for the day so I had to try the hair products. I was surprised to find out they are equally as impressive. My hair now has a much healthier look and a very appealing soft feel. This will leave your hair smelling great without overpowering. I will definitely keep purchasing this product as I have just ordered two more bottles.

review_title: Nice but expensive - here's an alternative
review_content: There's no doubt the soaps being sold by this company are great and good for you, the issue is cost. So instead of paying $7 a bar, you can buy the SAME EXACT soap at www.thesoapguy.com for under $2 a bar. Keep the $5 a bar and treat yourself to a nice vacation.

This is a great alternative to other soaps. It smells like most other soap on the market. It lathers well and rinses away clean though. No residue on your skin afterwards. The oatmeal helps to gently exfoliate. Worth the price!

review_title: Mine Was Split When It Arrived
review_content: I see my last review 'disappeared'... I ordered one and when it arrived it had a minor split. It is now in two halves and in the trash. Unfortunate because I liked the look of it, however I also experienced my soap sticking to it.

Second scent I have tried after Nautical sage both grey smelling in their own right but for me the scent is secondary to how my skin feels and how the crotch itch has gone to were I don't have to squatch no more. Great soap.
Kinda small for a 7.00 bar of soap, and smells like pine sol. Not impressed with it at all, bought two bars in one...first and my last.

I've been on the fence about buying a $7 bar of soap for a few months. I'm not fru-fru kind of man and my poor mind couldn't justify the price. Well, it was the free shipping coupon that got me. I've just taken my first shower with Cedar Citrus. You got me! It smells clean and wonderful, but my skin hasn't felt this great in decades! As a typical vain middle-aged American, I've spent for the skin care creams and kits. I justified that by high-tech formulas that will turn back the hands of time. They work, but not worth the money in my opinion. This bar of soap has made my skin very clean and smooth as a baby. 
A few months ago, I emailed and asked for a small assortment of different soaps in a cheap sampler pack, something like the hotel sample bars. It was a matter of time before I would buy a natural soap (because I like your marketing material). I'm glad I bought it! I feel great and it is worth the money and then some.

Just want to leave a tip on how you might extend the life of your soap. Call it diminishing returns, has to do with how much lather do we need and at what point your not going to get any cleaner with more lather. You need X amount of lather to get clean, after that your just wasting soap. Try lessoning the amount of lather, use a wash cloth, and do not let it get and/or stay wet and you should see an improvement in the life of your soap. Amen p.s. mine last about 6 weeks. Also one of the tips the good Dr. Left in one of his newsletters on attracting the ladies is to shower less and not wash awash the pheromones.

This is hands down the best shampoo/conditioner combo I've used. I have found myself having to use slightly more than the recommended amount, but not by much. Next step dudes, make facewash/moisturizer. 

You have at least one customer as long as you make this stuff.

I had always used liquid soap because I didn’t like the way bar soap made my skin feel. However, without mentioning brand names, I recently purchased some bar soap solely based on the sandalwood and cedar scents. The soap boasted about being natural and gluten free. The gluten free soap confused me. But then people started eating tide pods and I understood. 

Anyway. I still got the dry skin feeling. So I purchased the cedar citrus from dr squatch. And I’m writing this review not 5 minutes after I got out of the shower. I am pleased with the product. And will be trying more of their scents. The price is low enough to where it’s worth a shot. I am leaving a review of 4 stars. But may decide on a 5 after I try the rest of their product.
I went all out with the Squatch soaps and hair products. So far, even as a natural skeptic, Dr Squatch has exceeded my expectations.

I was hesitant about trying a synthetic brush, but my girlfriend is a vegetarian and she is grossed out by my Boar and Badger brushes. Wow! was I impressed with A; how soft it was and B; what a great lather this bad boy produced! My hats off to The Squatch on this fine animal free shaving brush!
Used for a week soap sticks to it like glue have to pry off leaving chunks behind. Love the soap but dont use the saver anymore.

The bag leaked all the way through. When I went to pick it up with the soap in it, it felt like there was soap residue needing through the bag. So far the only thing it does do is not dry out the soap. I am disappointed because I like your soap.
I'm not used to bar soap, but after ba thing with it for a while I'm growing fond of it. The aloe bar smells awesome and doesnt dry my skin out. So far I'm not regretting my subscription.
Smells good and works well can't complain

I received my order last week. I love the fragrance of this soap, but I don't love the way it drips black goo all over my soap dish and bath tub. I have used black soap before, but never one that does this. I use a Spanish soap called Magno that is black and it leaves no black residue at all. I wish they could make the Pine Tar more colorfast This issue has kinda put me off buying more - too messy!
First bar has lasted two weeks and I still have about 3 days left out of it. Smells great and doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry.

Recently purchased pine tar scented Dr. Squatch soap and I enjoyed the true clean and fresh woodsy scent I had after using it in the shower. Only gripe is that it didn’t last as long as I would’ve liked.

review_title: Catchy title! caught my eye immediately
review_content: Whether you're a squatch enthusiast or not, I would definitely recommend Dr.Squatch all natural soaps to everyone!
Awesomeness

review_title: Soft, supple, stinky..... in a great way :)
review_content: The products seem to leave zero residue. My skin isn't ashy in this uber dry weather. and I love the differing scents ((so does the wife)) :D
I absolutely love these soaps and the deal with the subscription is wonderful.
Great soap, so far I'm really enjoying.
Exceptional quality!!
This is actual soap man.
Fast delivery citrus bar smells and feels good
Didn’t expect to like something called Pine Tar, but I do. I love it. Cedar Citrus? What’s not to love about that! Had to subscribe...keep ‘me coming Doc Squatch!
Excellent soap
Here’s what you should do. Order a few flavors of soap. Put in for vacation time. Lather up. Contemplate what you really should be doing with your life. This is s game changer.
I enjoyed the soap so much, I signed up for the monthly subscription.

review_title: Never going back to chemical infested soaps
review_content: Best soap I've ever used by far. While a bar only lasts a few weeks, I am okay with that because I like changing up the scents often. The scents are amazing and the soaps do not dry out my skin at all.

Don’t get me wrong, my skin feels good after using the pine tar but I’m not sold on a $7 bar of soap. I read the reviews about how the pine tar soap left you smelling like a forest all day but it’s far from that! I can’t even smell it on my skin right after a shower. I’d probably buy it again if it was cheaper or didn’t have to pay for shipping.
Fast shipping! Even better smells!
Best men's soap on the planet!

Been interested in upgrading bath products and thought I would give Dr. Squatch a try. I had previously tried Dukes Large bar but it was just too enormous to hold in the shower. Similarly, Dr. Squatch, with its square bars, is difficult to grasp. I do not have large hands and cannot palm a basketball but found the square bar just too hard to hold onto. Additionally, the bar did not even last one week which is customarily my idea of a worthwhile soap bar purchase. I can easily get a week out of Dove for Men and that bar is easy to grasp. For these reasons I will not likely be extending my subscription.
Great soaps

These bars of soap are so much better than regular bars of soap like dove. I use pine tar because I enjoy a good exfoliation every time I shower and they certainly never disappoint. It also smells so unique and manly in a way that no other soaps can achieve. Thank you Dr. Squatch

Lookin good. Feeling good. I go walking around my land here in rural Tennessee and my senses are hightened.....I hear mysterious creatures in the distance, smell strange smells...like the musty oder of large hairy women, woodys yet arousing. I get urges....like felling trees with my bare hands and wearing flannel. Fording rivers to catch wild salmon of witch I share the with the grizzly bears I have befriended. I seem to be the peace keeper between them and the “large ones” of the deep forests. Bald eagles land on bear arms, deer bow as I strut, mountain lions run in fear women quiver at the sound of my voice. Yes I have become a man amoung men thanks to this lathering of pure madhood. It has forever changed my life.
Great..

I recently subscribed to the 6 bars per quarter. I’ve been the tar soap and love it; my skin feels amazing after every shower and smells great. The only issue is that I ordered 3 tar and 3 nautical sage, but instead I received one of each scent. I’m sure they’ll all be great but it was a little disappointing to not receive what I ordered.
Love it...
I have not tried all bars yet--- maybe within the next few weeks I will have sampled all three bars,

I work in the healthcare field, and I love coming to get a hot shower to wash all the grime off of me. This soap is amazing I only wish it would last longer. Haha thank you for making some awesome soap.

My husband stumbled across this soap two years ago and gave it as gifts to his groomsmen. He gave Pine Tar and Gold Moss. His absolute favorite is the Gold Moss and he now has a Soapscription - because why not? It's a great value and we don't have to think about making sure to order new soap any more. We also had an extra bar of the Spearmint Basil that I've been lucky enough to enjoy. It smells so good! Shout out to Dr. Squatch's customer service. Robbie was very helpful online and made sure my questions were answered. He even had someone follow up with me to be sure I got the right answers. Thank you Dr. Squatch! We love your soap. Keep making it. :)

review_title: great smell, kind of pricey though
review_content: I have trying out hemlock trial, and i have to say the smell is great. I put an 30 mins before going to rite aid to go buy a box, the cute cashier girl looked at me and looked down, she could not keep eye contact with me but she kept smiling, the combination of my dominant energy and this smell was perfect
I am so pleased with these soaps, shampoo and cologne!! I’m not a fru fru guy, my wife loves the way I smell nowadays. My only issue is , I hope you guys offer deodorants eventually. :)
By far my favorite Dr Squatch product. I really enjoy the smell, and actually prefer the softness of this soap! I have an issue with dry skin in the cold, Wisconsin air, and this does a great job.
By far the best I’ve ever washed with!! Everyone in my house loves your soap!!!
As a dude. With lots of dude-ness at the end of a hard day. Nothing has made me feel cleaner. I wish it were a little cheaper to be honest. But I love the product. Great soap!
Love the bay rum. Haven’t tried the aloe but looking forward to it.

My friend introduced me to Squatch when I was visiting from out of town. I shrugged at first thinking it was just another natural soap brand but he insisted I use it since I was in dry cold weather. 
Turns out it was much better than I imagined. Very sensitive, smells great, and I feel clean!
Can't wait for this first bar to disappear so I can move onto the next one!
I am only on my second bar but am well pleased with the soap. Great smell, great lather, soft skin, and clean shower door; what more could one ask?
The soap quality is great. Lathers well and the scents are really nice with a special shout out for the Bay Rum. I do recommend if you still enjoy the use of a good bar of soap.

review_title: My First but DEFINITELY not last
review_content: This was my first all natural product I've ever used and it has truly changed the way I look at showers. My skin feels amazing after just a week of using and my wife loves the way I smell. Definitely recommend!

The wooden soap holder i paid 12 dollars for fell apart after about three days, and to be honest, the soaps aren't really all that different from other soaps I've tried at lower prices. I'm going to cancel my subscription.
My first bar was pine tar, loved the way it made my skin feel. I’ve since wanted to try many of the others. Each bar makes me happier than the last.

I just got my second quarterly in the mail, and I loved just about everything about the first bunch of soaps I got. The Hemlock Trail Cologne is pretty nice as well. My only issue so far is that while using the Pine Tar soap the oats embedded are fairly scratchy, but I still enjoy it's scent and how long that bar lasted in particular. Overall Excellent products, will be getting the shave bundle soon and will report back for that.
In very few words; I feel the wildness in my heart unleashed every time I was my ass. <3
Will definitely keep my subscription active.

I started ordering this soap for my husband that has sensitive skin and now I am stealing his bar becuase it is so great(don't worry, I got my own now too) We love every scent and cannot go back to any other bar of soap after using Squatch.

Good bar of soap. I like it because it’s different. Smells like a bar lemon/lime jello at first but once you start using it you definitely smell the pine. Good product and I have already ordered my next round.
From the instant i rubbed this soap onto my body it was pure ecstasy. For me personally the natural ingredients help with my dry skin. The scents are very satisfying. Keep up the great work!
Glad I bought the sub. Great price and shipped right to my door, can't complain!

I decided to give Dr Squatch a try because my skin had become dry and itchy this winter. My son uses the soap and recommended it to me. Well, after a week and a half of using the Pine Tar soap, my skin has stopped itching and the dryness is gone. Love this soap!
I love the Pine Tar bar soap, smells great, feels greats after! Keep doing what you guys are doing!!
Great products!!
I found this soap in a little shop in town. After trying it, I fell in love with my favorite Pine Tar. Love the way I smell, stoped wearing cologne. My skin feels great and I smell amazing.
Like the pine tar soap, smells great and feel great after shower, heck my wife even likes it. Thanks Guys it is one GREAT SOAP
I have been searching for a soap that I enjoy to use and feel clean after using. Dr. Squatch has that covered. The scents are also phenomenal.

Both of these "colognes" are simply awful. The driftwood just smells like black liqourice, and the hemlock trail mostly smells like marijuana. And to cap it off, the scents last a whole 30 minutes on your skin. I don't understand how these have such high ratings on here. Do not waste your money!

This is thee soap for those days when you get extra dirty and sweaty. Pine Tar soap deep cleans and the smll is amazing. First thing I noticed was how rich the lather is; it's more like a creamy body lotion than soap. Highly recommend Pine Tar Soap.

I recently bought my first order of Dr. Squatch soap. The pine tar smells absolutely amazing and may be the only one I buy from now on. The rough texture really helps you get clean and feels great to scrub with. I will definitely continue to order this
Best soap ever, Never felt so clean
Nice manly soap with great smell

I had heard of this fantastic soap on Facebook and wanted to try it. Visiting a friend and after a work out at the gym i' tried his bar and discovered I hadn't felt as clean and my skin was smooth without moisturizer. I had to buy it and have must placed an order for 4 bars quarterly. Cannot wait!!
Imagine waking up,stepping out of your tent and taking in a deep breath on a fresh mountain morning.... that’s the aroma I put off all day long when using this soap
I am very pleased and clean! Great stuff for men!

I love the soap It’s unbelievable how literally clean I feel and smell after my shower Not sure I’ve ever had a soap that had me feeling so fresh afterwards. I have the 6 bars per quarter but I’m not sure I’ll have enough till my next shipment
Doesn't last quite long enough
This is THE best soap I have ever used. I will never buy any other soap again!
My husband works in a factory and is outside frequently, drying his skin. Dr. Squach soap has been a wonderful aid to itchy scaley skin this winter. Thanks!

I work outside everyday and I have eczema. I live in the desert, and have hard water from a well. My skin is always dry, cracked, and I have always had to use lotion all over my face, elbows, knees, and feet . After 3 weeks of using this soap I have starting using less lotion. I typically only have to apply it to my face now. This soap is a godsend.
You can find a lot of hand made soaps but they are usually very perfumey. These are great
Best smelling soap I have ever used. Ingredients are really nice as well!

I started with the sampler pack, and have since started a soapscription. I have tried almost all of the scents, and they all smell great and rinse clean. I love the gold moss, bay rum, and pine tar. Soapscription is convenient, and easy to change scents if you want. THANKS SQUATCH
Good stuff every time!
Love the products
Perfect.
Would recommend this product. Will definitely be a long time customer

Just picked up my first bar by sheer happenstance!! Was on Facebook, saw one pf my brothers I served in Afghanistan with had shared he purchased some and had to check it out. Just got my bar of Bay Rum a couple weeks ago and it's flat out amazing!! Will recommend to anyone who wants to listen. Really appreciate your commitment to a great product.
The Bay rum is a can't miss. One of my top 2 favorites !
Citrus and Bay Rum are the bomb ! By far my favorites ! Do yourself a favor and grab some ! You'll never go back to regular store soap again.
I’ve tried multiple high dollar soaps, and these are slightly cheaper... however, they’re much better!

review_title: New Soap User Gives it a Try
review_content: Until I found Squatch I only used body washes. The soap is great smelling and easily holds in the hand. The only problem is that I have to learn how to not drop the soap so often! Usually 3 times per shower. :)

review_title: Awesome soap and great customer service.
review_content: Can't go wrong with the pine tar scrub.
This soap is great! Really rejuvenates my skin and smells great as well!

This is a great soap. I got it through a subscription box and I have been incredibly surprised at how great it smells and works. Keep up the amazing work Squatch....I'll definitely purchase more in the future!
I love the scent of the soaps, but I'd like it to last longer.

I’ve been using natural soaps with essential oils for about three years now, and I don’t feel like the soaps I received were on par with what I’ve been using and definitely not superior to them. I’m likely to reorder from them again.

review_title: Very Happy with the soap, but pricey!
review_content: Great product, makes skin feel very clean and refreshing. On the second bar and it's not too perfumey. Very happy so far with the bars.
I can’t wait to see which one will show up next, I love them all!
This is great soap. Love the scent and feel of it!
Me & my family love the soaps. The only thing I think would make this product better is the quarterly six soap price to stay the introductory price of $25.
I use the soaps and they are great!
Haven’t got my 3 bars yet
Ordered the aloe soap and received a mixture of soap that dries my skin out not real impressed with the other soaps I received, Ido like the aloe.
B S A- best soap ever
Awesome soap. Great scents.
Good stuff...... it’s very cleaning quality and makes Sense... to use daily!

review_title: First shower with Bay Rum soap
review_content: I bought 2 bars of Bay Rum Bars for my son and son in law for Christmas. They gave good reviews after their experience. So I decided to try the same. I was so looking forward to the Bay Rum soap. I was very disappointed after my first shower. The only scent smell was a oil smell and there was very little lather. I will try again but I’m not really sure the results will change. Very disappointed!
Great selection & prompt service.

review_title: I hate reviewing products BUT HAD TO THIS TIME
review_content: I am so sorry I ordered the sampler because the pine soap is so good iI don't even want to try the others. Seriously, I shower twice a day, a quick morning wash and the main evening shower. The pine soap is so fantastic I almost took a third shower just to use it. The cleaning, the fantastic scent, it fills the whole shower. UNREAL how much better this soap is than anything I have ever used.. IT's about time a product lives up to its hype. THX THX THX
The pine tar rocks! Great scent, lather and overall easy on your skin. I look forward to taking a shower.
I received my order fast and used one of the 9 soaps to discover that this is very nurturing to your skin and mood.

Great soap! Smells great and so do I after my shower. No bad ingredients. Fast delivery and great customer service too! I will continue to use this soap and the shampoo and conditioner. Favorite scent is the Gold Moss Scrub bars.
I love the smell and it doesn't leave a weird residue on me

A Squatch Soapscription is definitely the way to go if you plan on staying with Squatch soap. The price can’t be beat and the soap itself is amazing. I haven’t had one single problem with dry skin all winter. And the Pine Tar scent is awesome. And yes, it cleans very well between the soap and the mild grit that is used to do away with dead skin. Can’t recommend Squatch enough!

review_title: The only soap you should use.
review_content:
This is how god intended men to smell. At first when I got this delivery, I was a little wary. The soaps didn’t smell like they were too strong, and that put me off. After using them in the shower though, that’s when it all started. I felt my face twitch, and contort. I stumbled out of the shower to view myself in the mirror, and I had a full Viking beard! I was amazed! I had shaved the night before, so there’s no way this should be possible? I then felt a sudden surge of power, and I jumped though my roof and flew to the nearest forest like super man. When I found myself in the forest, I then realized that I had spontaneously devolved an 8 pack, and a thick coat of manly, good smelling body hair. All the animals in the forest came to hang out, I cracked open a beer with Bigfoot, and then I came home to write this review.

This soap is probably the greatest soap I’ve ever used. Buy it, you won’t regret it.

Can't say I've camped anywhere except suburbia in recent years but good soap works well for that too! Does especially well cleaning my squatch. Doubles as endless fodder for coining innuendoes like that. Lasts a pretty long time and is an especially decent deal compared with the well-known "castille" soap that's been so popular among natural soap enthusiasts.
Love the gray “suds”!!!
best soap ever love it leaves my skin looking fresh

Best soap I've ever used and the pine tar scent is amazing!
Can't wait to try the cologne.
I don’t love eucalyptus. Different flavor next month please.
Pine Tar was great and kept me clean and smelling nicely.
On my second bar and is working great. Have never used all natural soap before. Skin softer and the main thing no skin irritations.
I ordered two bars of the citrus/cedar soap. I am addicted to the aroma and feel of this soap. I can't wait to get in the shower in the mornings. That's all I have to say about that.

I'm on hold with the cologne sampler. One I love, the other not so much. With their not being labeled, and me being colourblind I'm not sure which is which. Had a long Facebook thread trying to dissect it, but that didn't go anywhere other than being wrapped up that there's ultimately a money back guarantee. The idea of ordering it - 50/50 I get the wrong one - and having to go through the pushups of sending it back doesn't turn me on so much. The soaps however I'm digging and will keep my subscription going.
This is the best soap
I have had problems with dry skin in the past, but that is completely cleared up. Not only that, but it smells so great! I highly recommend Gold Moss to everyone!

review_title: Happy to be back in the club!
review_content: Switched to different monthly soap scents and looking forward to the variety and enjoyment of a good shower. Cheers, Keith Nieto
I have to admit I was a little apprehensive because I've true other natural bar soaps but I love the Pine Tar bars now I have to try the others
Great Product! Great Service!
The Cedar Citrus has a great scent, smells like a wonderful combination of cedar wood and citrus fruits. Soap feels good on the body and rinses away cleanly. The light exfoliation is nice as well.
So far the soap saver seems to being doing what it says it is supposed to do. No issues and the bar doesn't stick.
Great stuff

review_title: No better than the grocery store
review_content: After reading the reviews on here and seeing the price ($7.00 for a bar of soap???), I thought I give it a try. I was expecting a noticable difference from my regular grocery store soap that costs half as much for three bars. Unfortunately, the only differences I noticed was that this soap didn't leave me feeling as clean as my regular commercial brand bar soap and this bar only lasted a week and a half. Also, it leaves my beard feeling like it's coated in soap scum even after a good rinse. I considered trying a different soap from here to see if it was just this one, but it's not worth the $9.00 with shipping.
I always had my doubts about online soap subscriptions. I can honestly say that this is the best soap ever. I love all the scents the experts there sent me. Excited for my next shipment.

My wife is always putting her cheap ass dove soap in the tray with my soap and we have now established the a proper boundary for soap storage. Lastly, I am not sure what you are smoking from the pipe in the picture... do you smoke soap? Regardless, please keep sending your soap my way. Thanks.

review_title: Bay Rum bar soap is in fact, unscented.
review_content:
Last month I returned 6 bars of Squatch soap because I had ordered six bars of Bay Rum, but received two bars of Bay Rum and four other miscellaneous bars. I returned the two 'Bay Rum' bars because they had no scent at all. 
 
Those six bars were replaced with six bars labeled 'Bay Rum', and I thought that the situation had been resolved; that these six bars would have the Bay Rum scent of the two bars I originally purchased. 
 While I was using those two(original) bars the Bay Rum scent filled the dressing room/shower area, and I looked forward to the morning shower. 
I've tried each of the six replacement bars; a different one every day expecting that maybe one of the six might have the Bay Rum scent, but none did. There was almost no scent, except for an oily scent of other ingredients.

I don't know if I'll use these bars or just toss them in the garbage, but I'm disappointed enough that I certainly won't be ordering any more soap from Squatch. I thought I had found the right bar soap, but I was wrong.
I have not tried all of the different fragrances yet, but so far so good. Love the Pine Tar :thumbsup::grinning:
Soap smells so good and its all Natural. Now the only Soap I will use. Just wish Squatch would get there Shampoo back in stock as its an amazing product too.
I simply love it

My review is unpaid and literally only the second time in my life I've given a review - the Deep Sea Goat's Milk Soap is JUST that good. So good, I had to write a review on it!! First, thing that hits you is the scent - masculine, not overpowering, smooooooth. And, though the description of it says the scent is mild - it's a strong (again not overpowering) scent -that lasts! I've gotten so many compliments on it from my friends and from the guys at the gym after I shower (weird, but cool) - it's my must-go-to soap on my nights out. After using it, you feel like you have this micro layer of of nourishing oil..then, you rinse and the big surprise comes - you SQUEAK!! Literally, my skin felt squeaky clean. So, I figured being squeaky clean equals all the Deep Sea Goat's Milk washed off. Not so! My skin stayed nourished that my normal routine of slathering on lotion after the shower has decreased. I mean, I still do it but, without the slathering. Now, for the surprise that I didn't expect. EVERY SINGLE product, including unscented products, my cats shy away from. Yes, I'm a manly man with cats, leave it alone. This product is soooo natural that my cats did NOT shy away or turn their face when they came up to me to pet them, RIGHT after I got finished using the soap. Aaaaamazing. I'm about to post on the Dr. Squatch conditioner. THAT's another amazing product. Thanks Dr. Squatch!!! Ordering some more, buddy. About to try out the Pine Tar and see how that is.

review_title: My first order from Dr. Squatch
review_content:
Greetings. 
 Overall, I was not very impressed with the soaps I've sampled so far, for the following reasons:
 1) The soapholder, after being in contact with the used bar of soap, created an unbreakable bond. Despite my efforts to separate them, I ended up chucking both in the trash.
 2) I was expecting a strong odor, both from the soap and after using it on my skin, but the smell was anything but bold. My sense of smell is just fine, thank you.

The good news is your soap agrees with my sensitive skin. I hope you found this review helpful.

I love the Squatch soaps - the whole gamut: the smell, the slick rinse, and the humorous marketing. I do not like, however, the cost. I do not foresee the niche market surviving at its current price point when good bar soaps can be purchased for considerably less. Irish Spring is still an affordable, manly option. Although perfect for a Squatch man, bar soaps, in general, are archaic to the general public. So, ideally, I am sincerely hoping that Dr. Squatch lowers its price (say, from $7 to $5) to expand its business to more men and enhance its chance for sustainability with current customers.

Let me start by saying I am on soapscription and all I use to wash my body is Dr. Squatch. I love love love their soap. I also love wet shaving, have been doing it for years and have tried many different soaps from various companies.
I unfortunately do not love this soap. The ingredient list including bentonite clay, the scent, and the slickness are all great, but the soap just does not lather properly. I'm surprised to see other reviews saying it does and I have to assume that the recent recipe or batch that I've received two tins from are somehow different.
After writing Dr. Squatch detailing my issues with my first purchase, their awesome customer service provided me with a second tin to try, but it also had the same: an extremely foamy and airy lather that dissolved & dissipated on the face quickly. I've shaved 6 times with the soap now and have let the soap bloom and tried working the lather for several minutes. I tried face lathering, hand lathering, scuttle lathering and even applying the puck directly to my face. The last method works to apply a thick paste to my face which seems like it's working, but with the slightest introduction of water there comes that airy foam that dissolves before you finish a pass.
I've tried very hard to get this soap to work for me but just have to give up at this point. I hope the doctor fixes the recipe.

review_title: Great Soap, even better customer service!
review_content:
I recently purchased the Ultimate Bundle after first trying the Gold Moss soap. I thought that scent would be hard to beat, but each bar gives it a run for its money. 

As I said in the title, the customer service I’ve experienced at Dr. Squatch has been phenomenal. My first experience involves a recent trip to Florida. More specifically the PCB area. I was wondering if there was anywhere’s nearby to purchase Dr. Squatch products. After sending an email I immediately received a response listing the nearest locations carrying their product. A second experience involves my most recent order of the Ultimate Bundle. After placing it I had questions about pricing/shipping all the way to Nova Scotia, Canada. I sent an email off and received a reply almost instantly which resulted in the resolution of the issue entirely. 

A great smelling, natural product + incredible customer service is definitely a winning combination. I will continue to purchase from these guys as long as they’re selling.

I received a bar of this soap as a gift and it could have been better. The scent was decent but it didn't stay on very long and for the price paid the bar was to small and lasted no where near as long as it should've. If you're looking for a manly bar soap then go try Duke Cannon, it costs a bit more but it's worth it.

I have been a fan since I got it for Christmas. Soon after I start d my soap scription. I have even branches out to get out her products such as hair care and the cologne. Th cologne actually makes a great beard oil.

So, I accendently came across Dr. Squatch looking up big foot stuff and decided to try it. Not only does it get the best clean, but I get zero scalp irritation from it—which is a first. 

The only thing I’d knock it for, but I won’t (cuz m’ a nice guy), is the size and price. You don’t get much for 20 bucks. I was actually kinda shocked at the small bottle upon arrival. But still, I will buy again and again.

review_content: The addition fo the wooden soap dish/tray was excellent! It has increased the life of each soap in the variety pack I purchased. I had been using the Pine Tar variety exclusively, but I found I like them all. However I am finding my preference is for Nautical Sage.

As a dude, I never cared about soaps because they all seemed to be the same anyways. I decided to try some Squatch because it was getting great reviews. I've now tried the Pine Tar and Cedar Citrus and can honestly say I'm not disappointed. I've never had a soap that wasn't drying to my skin or made me smell like my girlfriend (ie: feminine). Now? When I step out of the shower, I smell and feel like a friggin' forest god. I love it. Thanks Dr. Squatch for bringing in the moisture and outdoors this Vermonter loves.

Shampoo is good on the days I use it (MWF) & although doesn’t lather much, my hair definitely feels clean and not perfume like. Creme Rinse, I like the slight tingle it provides when I leave it in for a minute or so and it helps my hair stay in place longer.

review_title: Why Fix Something That Is Not Broken?
review_content: Have been buying the Bay Rum Soap Bar (4/month) for 3 years. Why? Because the scent was the same as all of the old school bay rum products I have known since the 70's. I'm not going to buy this product (you should rebrand it as "Island Capri") anymore; however, if you ever decide to go back to the original, you have my email address!

review_title: Good soap but not for me
review_content: I love the scent and the soap but 2 things I do not like about the Pine Tar. I do not like the exfoliation of this soap and the black pine tar stains my wash cloths and the stain will not come out. Until you make a version of this without exfoliation and does not stain I will stick with your excellent other soaps such as Goldmoss and Bayrum. and Citrus Cedar.

So I’ve used many different brands of pine tar soap. I use it for tattoo healing, for my face, for my scalp and beard, and usually once a week in my whole body. I tried Dr. Squatch pine tar when the normal brand I buy was out of stock and hadn’t been refilled in stock for a while (this happens at times with hand made soaps). I read some reviews and purchased Dr. Squatch and I’ve got to say this is some of the best soap I’ve ever used. The scent is awesome and the sand grit is great for exfoliating and leaves you feeling clean and your skin tingly. People have talked about the soap not lasting, a helpful hint is to cut the bar down into smaller sections and use up a section at a time. This helps the soap to last longer and the bars are more manageable. Either way, the soap lasts just as long as other brands I’ve used. But for the soap...I’m a believer and Dr. Squatch is my brand! I’m going to stick with them and try out some of the other scents. Just an FYI...my teenage daughters use the pine tar soap on their faces and the results are better than the harsh chemical facial washes you can buy. They wash with the pine tar soap and then use Thayers Witch Hazel with Lavender. They’ve had great success and enjoy the scent as much as I do. You CANNOT go wrong with this soap. If you don’t like it you’re honestly just nit picking and probably don’t like anything 100%. I’m going to buy this as gifts for other family members wanting a natural hand made bar. Can’t say enough good about it. Thanks Dr. Squatch!!!!

review_title: Pine tar, great scent, turns your shower black.
review_content: Please make this product in a way that the bar is not black. I like it, it's great, but the dark gray lather stains your shower and it's a %#@&$ to keep clean. Thanks. I love some of the other scents and the quality is great. Typically lasts one bar a week unless you barely use it (and what's the point if you "use sparingly"). Bars last significantly shorter unless you buy a soap saver of some kind and keep the bars out of the water and shower area even.

If I wasn’t a middle aged man going bald, this product would make me shine like Patrick Stewart at the helm. Hmmm, not the best analogy maybe. This is great stuff on the hair I have left. I’m pleased, number one.
Never found a soap I liked till these

review_title: Like a new bourn fresh out the vjj
review_content: Truly surprised how much nicer my hair is with the shampoo and conditioner. It's a world apart from anything I've tried.

review_title: Love the rub a dub. Soap that is.
review_content:
Excellent product. Smells would wonderful and leaves no after effects. Like some soaps washes off clean. 

Will buy more without a doubt.
my last two deliveries , the soap was smaller than normal?

You'd think that a monthly "soapscription" would pan out to having a different scent from the many available, every month. Not so much. You guys must love Bay Rum and the Aloe scents. Either that or you're messing with me because I have an overstock of Bay Rum and Aloe. I don't know how your whole operation works but I'd like to think that you keep some sort of record of customer product orders? I mean if you want people to try all the different soaps shouldn't you make them available? When you receive a newsletter talking about a scent of the month being Pine Tar, in April. You'd think that you're probably going to get said soap in that months delivery. Nope.....ALOE. What was May? You guessed it.... BAY F*CKING RUM. Sorry for the language but come on guys, send me some variety. Please! Your soap smells great. It could last a bit longer but I understand, you're in this to make money.
Haven't received it
The soap is wonderful! However, they sent 8 bars, not 9. Thus beginning the process of going after that elusive bar. Eventually, I got the bar.
I really like this soap. It has a good, unique smell and it lasts longer than other homemade, natural soap.

Since receiving this kit, I've tried to stick to the regiment of not washing my hair every day. In the past, with other products, this would make my hair greasy in just one day. With Dr. Squatch Hair products, my hair looks and feel nice even after 3 days of not washing it. Thanks guys for coming up with a really good product.
The soap arrived on time. It is easy to use and has a very nice lather and scent.
Love my Squatch soaps!! Feels good to have total strangers comment on how great you smell!!
Total wasted of money. The soap sticks to it so you have to pry it off and lose some soap on the wood. Dont waste your money on this........

Okay, I figured my hair would feel clean and smell great right after using it, as can be expected of all Dr. Squatch products. But what surprised me is how great it feels, smells and LOOKS on the second - or even THIRD - day after use. Especially when combined with the conditioner (which I also use on my beard). This is my new go-to when I don't intend to use any other product in my hair. So, yeah...highly recommended. That is, if you want to go around hearing people complimenting you on your hair all the time (YEP).
I like it
As usual
Love the soap just doesn’t last. Tried everything soap saver cut bar in half etc.
Have not yet used Cedar Citrus…will let you know when I do.
Satisfied customer.
Will continue to buy.
This soap is quite amazing. The proof is in the shower curtain.. and the complete absence of gunky film. All natural goodness, and it smells great!

A good price would be a couple dollars
Soap sticks to the woof

review_title: Wow!!! but wow needed just a little longer
review_content: The soaps are amazing but I wish the scents stayed on my body just a bit longer. Thank you for a nice product.

I tend to have dry skin and have found that simply changing to Dr. Squatch soaps have made a big difference for me. The scent of all of them is fantastic and not overpowering. Not overloaded with harsh chemicals and last a long time (about 2 - 3 weeks per bar for me). I use the Gold Moss for daily showers and the Pine Tar when I've been working in the yard. Makes your skin feel smooth and clean. It also rinses much better than any other soap I've used. Do yourself a favor and choose a subscription; it's well worth it!
I’m squatchin’ like a mad man. I’m happy to go out in public and not smell like a flower basket!

The Bay Rum soaps that I received this quarter do not appear the same as previous deliveries. The bars are much less dense, full of voids, the scent is much weaker than before, and the bar I am currently using is washing away much faster compared to other bars I have received as part of my Soapscription. Not happy with my recent delivery.
The soap is the best! Love the bay rum and how it rinses clean off. I've given away my old bars and replaced the with Dr Squatch.

Was not happy with not being notified that there was an increase in monthly charges due to tax issues. Would have been ok with the changes if it was not a surprise. However I did appreciate the extra bar of soap as compensation for the inconvenience. But the bar of soap I was given was pine tar and I don't ever order that scent or have a need for that scentnt. So I was disappointed that I was sent a bar I have never ordered. Would have been better if I was given a choice of scent or if a scent I have previously ordered was sent as compensation
Great stuff. Me smell gud!
Fantastic product! I switch scents every few months but haven’t found a bad one yet! Perfect for dry skin issues!
Your soap scents are amazing! I would love it if there was a little more scent to it tho.
Have been SQUATCHIN’ since 2015 and have never been let down! Awesome product!
Love the soap. The smells. How it feels. My bank account got charged my monthly subscription and for whatever reason I have still yet to receive my bars, now almost 3 weeks later.
What can I say, my hair has never felt or looked better. Healthy, manageable and great to have fingers run through.

I ordered pine tar, baby rum, citrus cedar and gold moss soap...i’ve been using the pine tar so far and it is so great (scent and the way it left my skin mosterized) i am pretty sure the rest of the soap ive ordered are just as awesome! Ordered on Friday and i got my bundle on Tuesday! Really quick for a Hawaii order! Highly recommended

I think I must own everything in the line except for the shaving line. I love the manly smells, the way my skin smells and feels after bathing and my hair feels so clean and manageable with the Shampoo and Conditioner. Love, love, love Squatch. Thank you for a line for men, by men. I know this review was to be for the Hair Care Kit, but just wanted to pass along how much I enjoy using the product line.
Love the stuff
Like all the different type of soap give a chance to try something else.

The soap I received was just OK. I guess I was expecting a differentiated experience, but would say it is on par with other soaps on the market. Maybe I need to try a different scent? It wasn’t a bad experience by any means - just didn’t live up to the hype. Not sure I will keep the subscription but will definitely try some other varieties
However, twice now the order has been wrong. Either the wrong soap or incomplete order.

review_title: The only soap you’ll ever need
review_content: My bf and I LOVE this soap—I’m not really a fan of the whole subscription thing when it comes to products but i totally have a subscription for Dr. Squatch soap :) great smells that leave you feeling so clean!
Only received half an order. Nautical sage was crossed out by pen by someone.
Ordering one but getting two bars. Billed for two. But I love the soap and just skip a month sometimes.

I’ve been using the shampoo and conditioner for six months and I absolutely love it. I followed the directions in that I only use the shampoo Monday, Wednesday, and Fridays and the conditioner daily. I was skeptical at first but it works and my hair and scalp feel great! I also have a soapscription as I love the bar soaps too!
soaps smell good and leave you with a clean feeling, what more can I say?
i like the variety provided . The quality is excellent. Priced reasonably for what is offered.
Where do I start ... First, the products are great, never have I been let down on the quality and second, the customer care is hands down the absolute best I've experienced

Dr. Squatch is the best when it comes to natural soap. If you want all the clean without the chemicals I suggest using Dr. Squatch. I have been a happy customer for several years and am also a soapscriber.

review_title: Good soap, price is too high
review_content: The soap is good, no issues just really expensive. I normally use shea butter utility utility bar and this is an excellent soap for less. I am only on my second bar but love it so far!!
Great soap and Quick delivery

I have been a “soapscription” customer for the last 9 to 10 months. This is the best soap I have ever used, Period!
Keep it up!
Still waiting on that order

I walked around smelling the box, it was so great. He laughed and called me weird, but I didn't care. My kids also loved the smell. Thanks, Dr. Squatch!

I really enjoy the variety of fragrances available. My skin is better, no issues at all.
I love soap bars and these guys gave me exactly what I wanted by making natural soap that smells really good making a man feel like a man after a shower. No competition in site.
I can’t say enough good things about this company. Order shipped fast. And during the transaction I felt like part of the Sqatch family. Not to mention the soaps smell AMAZING

review_title: The best soap I have ever used
review_content: I have never used a soap that didn't leave my skin itchy, dry and scaly. After trying your product I have noticed a huge difference in my skin. My ankles especially are no longer dry and "alligatored" looking. It is nice to come out of the shower with soft smooth looking skin and not itchy. Keep up the good work. I will purchase more of your product soon. It is great!
I didn’t know what sage was until I tried this soap. Now, I’m a believer!!
I buy the soaps for my son, brother & nephew! Makes the guys feel pampered too!
No problems
As far as I'm concerned, Dr. Squatch can do no wrong. I'm on my fourth bar of soap and all of them have been legit. Definitely looking forward to my next purchase.

Best soap. Best shampoo. Best conditioner. Period. Nothing else even comes close. Do yourself a favor and try everything. You will not be disappointed. Trust me, you will have the best shower of your life and you will definitely feel absolutely amazing throughout the week!! Watch how many compliments you get!! :wink:
Dr. Squatch soap is simply THE BEST. PERIOD. Need I Say more.

Soapscription member since Dec, 2016 so I have tried them all, and they are all great! My favs are Pine Tar and Eucalyptus Yogurt. I also use Dr Squatch shampoo and conditioner, it leaves your hair squeaky clean plus you smell like a man!
I have yet to use the DP Goats Milk. I also bought Pine Tar along with it and which is what I'm currently using. Love the sent of the Pine Tar and like the way my skin feels after shower.

Your soap is always good! I like different scents. I don’t use commercial sap anymore.
I love the pine tar soap! It smells great and scrubs really well!
This is the soap I've been looking for. Does what they claim. It's the best. Bonus, it makes my massive beard soft and shiny.

review_title: Great Soap For Those Who Are Used to Using Soap vs Body Wash
review_content: After using your soap and dropping the bar 3-4 times in one shower I have decided to go back to a good body wash. It's safer for me.
Outstanding!!!
Been using both the conditioner and shampoo for about 8 months now and haven’t looked back. Absolutely worth it!
Strange women stand behind me and inhale deeply and moan...my skin is squeaky clean yet not dry... I walk around with an air of confidence like only a Dr Squatch user does.... and life is good!

Love it!!

I am going on my third or fourth overall purchase and I must say I am beyond satisfied with the overall quality and make up of these soaps. Every selection of soap has its own identity and godly fragrance. I will be looking into signing up with the soapscription soon enough as well.
refreshing!!!!!
This is my first order and I have to say, so far I am a huge fan. I may be looking at signing up for a subscription order!
I like the product, and how it makes my hair feel/look... However, I wish they had a stronger scent, but I understand that that's probably the whole purpose of the natural product!

After reading the ingredient list on a bottle of body wash and then researching some of the chemicals, I knew I needed to find something more natural. Enter Dr Squatch. I've been using these soaps exclusively for the last 18 months and I won't ever go back to harsh chemical soaps/bodywashes. My skin has been breakout free and the pine tar bars are awesome for exfoliating. I wasn't a fan of how rough it was at first (pine tar bars can be pretty gritty), but after a few uses you get used to it and come to love it. If you think your skin isn't worth the money, well, then you're just dumb, because it is.
I've been using this stuff since it came out. Awesome stuff for you hair.
For the money I’d like a bar of soap to last a bit longer. That’s my only complaint. Otherwise, it’s fabtastic!
Have been using the soaps (using different ones and like them all) for almost a year and am very pleased. None of the products have disappointed me. You need to try these.

they're GRRRREEEAAATTTTT

Awesome product. Smells great. Already ordered more.
I recommend any of the soap scents this company offers.

Like that none of the soaps have an ‘overpowering’ scent. Additionally, not big on the black bars as they can be messy for the shower when not in-use. I’m sure color is in keeping with use of natural ingredients exclusively. If this is the case, it’s all good. Maybe add a wood soap dish (wood maybe) to gift box mix. Let’s be truthful..men like to “manper” too. My man will not even wear sandals because he thinks they are too girlie, so when I came across this soap I bought it as a joke but now he’s hook line and sinker .. no more store soap for him he’s into Manpering with Dr Sasquatch..
I am amazed at how different my skin feels and how great the soap smells. I’m definitely hooked!

Despite showering twice a day, however, the soap lasts FOREVER, especially with the cedar block. Way back in the day they sent me a triple order for whatever reason *and kept sending me my soapscription* so I gave 12 bars away for my bachelor party. Oh, I'll use these all before the next box. Wrong. I keep using them and they keep coming. I have like, no joke, 30 bars sitting in my cabinet and I have no idea what to do. Because this soap is incredible, it smells good, it cleans well, it doesn't leave residue on the body, it cleans easy from the shower and bathtub, and it lasts FOREVER. Buy it - cleanse thyself - Squatch lives!
Love the scent and the smoothness of my skin

I think the Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt is my favorite not just because of the wonderful fragrance but it helps ease my sinus congestion. I will definitely remain a repeat customer through my soapscription.

review_title: Smells are amazing. Soap Doesn't last long
review_content: Though the smells of the Soaps are absolutely phenomenal the longest a bar has ever lasted in my shower with only me using it is 6 days so if you're going to get a subscription service with free bars for 3 months prepare to be out within a month
Best soap I have ever used

When I first bought this Squatch soap I was hesitant because of the price but went ahead and bought it anyway. Man, am I glad I did. This soap is the best bang for your buck. I'm hypoallergenic and it works as well if not better then the more expensive soaps made for that. Plus the both me and ladies love how I smell when I step out of the shower.
The great smells, the rich lather, the knowledge that I am not rubbing toxic waste on my body, I love it!

I love supporting a small business. But your bar of soap just withered away extremely fast. That was a quick seven dollars. Great branding and everything, but jees ladies and gents, maybe a formula adjustment is in order.

I don’t shower very often as I work on the beach during summer, and am salt water clean everyday. Lol. So I get more soap then I need, so I give my extra bars to my cousins and friends, when I get them. And so far everyone digs the stuff including me!
Way better than the normal crap you buy at the store. This is now my forever soap!!
Best ever!!!
I've only received 2 bars so far but those two were/have been great. The smell was awesome and also how my skin felt after alot better than something from the store like Irish spring

When I watched the commercials I laughed and thought , “What a joke”. 
I have been using the soaps daily and believe me what I tell you, AWESOME, INVIGORATING, wonderful to use and I think I just became a rock star. You should hear me sing!!
So far this has been the best smelling soap I have ever used

review_title: The soap that saved my sack!!!!
review_content: This soap is amazing, I’ve never really treated shower as something I’d pay real attention too, you know hop in, soap up, rinse off, and hop out. That’s pretty much the routine I always used, not really paying any mind to what scent or soap I would use. At times a lot of those soaps would dry my skin out or because of the additives would make my skin break out, even give me rashes in places they don’t need to be. Then randomly I saw your add and thought why not, maybe this soap will live up to the promise of saving my sack, so I placed my order, all while laughing at the Dr. Squatch commercial I just saw. Waited a few days and then boom order came in. Never had I been so excited to see this soap, or any soap for that matter. After using it for over a week now I have to say this soap truly is everything it says it is. There’s no strong soap smell but yet a pleasant aroma that sticks around with you, not overbearing, just present enough to keep you fresh throughout the day. Adding in that my skin is feeling way more hydrated, healthy, and nourished. No additives so no more random rashes. This soap truly is a soap to save your sack!!!

I got these soaps for my son. He loves them. I also got the shampoo and conditioner. He loves those too. It makes his hair soft. He likes the spearmint bar and lighter scented bars but I think he will get use to them all. They are fantastic!
Awesome hubby loved it

review_title: Been with Dr.Squatch for about two years now
review_content: I feel the bars have been lacking in I guess you would say, potency. My ultimate choice out of your selection has been the Pine.

Got this for my husband for Father’s Day but let him open it as soon as it came. I think it’s a hit because he keeps telling everyone about it and makes them feel how soft his skin is! We are probably going to have to bump up his membership to 2 bars a month because he makes all sorts of excuses to take more showers! And the soap saver works perfectly! Thanks, Dr. Squatch!
I bought this for my husband and he loves it. It helps with his dry skin and his issues with how his job makes his hands. We love it and will be buying more soon.

review_title: The best damn soap there is!
review_content: I just received my soaps from Dr. Squatch a few days ago. The manly scent stays with me even after a hard days work and leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed. Try it out. You won’t be sorry!

Until now I’ve been very happy with the products I’ve tried. The shampoo is the first product that I was disappointed with. I felt that for the price I didn’t get the “bang for my buck” that I get out of the soap and shaving products. I’m still a huge fan of the soap though.
Pine tar smells just like Pine-Sol, so you smell like you just showered in a mop bucket.
I live outdoors and I like the all natural soap idea! No harsh chemicals
Well, I'll be a Sasquatches Uncle! This nice little piece of wood does a great job of holding my bar of soap. If only the rest of my life could be this easy.

My wife keeps telling me that i "smell good !" not sure if its because I am taking a shower now or if I am using Dr. Squash Soap. I think its the ladder ! thanks Dr. Squash for keeping my wife close to me :oP
Great scent! Good lather! Feel clean, great soap!

Pros: Hilarious commercial, smells good
Cons: doesn't last long at all, makes my skin feel rubbery

I purchased my soap and cologne on May 26, 2018. It is now June 11, 2018 and I still haven’t received my product or an explanation on the status of the delivery. I was told that the original claim order was closed and a new claim order reopened however still no update even after sending an email 3 days ago
I have only be using Dr. Squatch for about 10 days now; enjoying the new soap thus far and plan to continue.

We've already begun enjoying the new selection of soaps, and they seem fresher, better than ever. We appreciate each and every aroma accent, and like the feel on our skin. 
Thank you, Dr. Squatch, for making this selection even better than before!

I've been using this for about 6 months now, I like it because it's not the big soap companys. Helping the small company get their foot in the door, it's made different, it smells different. Get some pine tar soap, see for yourself. Thanks for making a great product.
Love the soap
Loved your soap in the beginning—then it changed. However the soap was made, was changed. It’s paler, less fragrant, and doesn’t last as long.
Thanks to Dr. Squatch I can now take manly showers! Thanks Doc!!!

I absolutely love this soap and it’s smell, however the last bars I have gotten have very little smell. I will keep buying because the soap is wonderful, but very disappointed about the lack of smell!
Good stuff
i will be returning products !
Really enjoy the pine tar, great scent.
Love the Pine Tar soap, however the bar only lasts about a week and a half.
Bought as a Father’s Day gift!

I have three different soaps from squatch I’ve been using and each has their own benefits the cedar citrus I’ve been using in my mornin shower routine because it has a very lively citrusy sent the wakes you up and says hey I’m ready for the day!
Pine tar, gold moss, and bay rum are my favorites and my bathroom smells like the world's best and cleanest forest! It's a squatch's paradise!
The products have been great
I really like all of the soap and the shipping is fast.
Loved my soap

I purchased three different bars of soap. Pine Tar, Natical Sage and Cedar Citris. All smelt great and I can't wait to try them all. My first try was with Pine Tar. Great smell, lather and freshness, cleanness after using. I would promote your product to anyone. Sqautch would need a larger bar of soap of course. 

I'll be spreading the word and ordering again. Thank you for such an outstanding product for us guys.

review_title: Smells Like a Man, Not a Perfume Factory
review_content: I love this stuff! I put a couple drops in with either coconut oil or sandalwood beard oil. It smells manly, not girly and doesn't make you sneeze or your eyes water like so many dudes who bathe in the department store fragrance counter stuff!
Great soap
Shipped very quickly, love the smell, and a little goes a long way

review_title: Soap is great. Stay away from the Hemlock fragrance
review_content:
The absolute worst smelling stuff I have ever put on. Yuk. Never again. A total waste of money.

The soap rocks
Worth every penny! My skin felt smoother and healthier after just 1 use. However I do recommend getting a soap dish cause it sticks to tubs badly
The bay rum was weird this time. Not the original smell I’m used to. The color wasn’t it’s normal also. It was like it was missing an ingredient.

My husband works in the oil field and comes home with all kinds of crap on him that is hard to wash off. There are times he will take a shower and still have black crap on his arms and hands. This soap took it off without a lot of scrubbing. He likes the scent too.

I bought this soap for my son to see if it will help with his breakouts since it also exfoliates. I like the smell. I've thought about getting another one to throw in my car instead of the car scents. Either this on or the Bay Rum. LOL

Hello, I have had eczema since I was a small child. Having scabs, sores, and dry skin 24/7. As an adult I’ve been able to keep it under much better control but have always had dry skin and trouble finding a body soap that didn’t make it worse, until now. Dr. Squatch has found the secret recipe and once you’ve had it you can’t go back. Not only is it great for your skin and all natural, but the scents are both wonderful AND manly, not an easy to achieve combo (I especially like golden moss and pine tar). If any man needs a good soap, I would highly recommend Dr. Squatch, just as I’ve already recommended it to all of my friends. Thank you and keep up the good work! (P.S. please release an all natural deodorant soon!)

I saw their facebook ad and clicked to their website. Super easy to become a customer and even easier to switch scents each month. Proud to be a customer and i even bought the shampoo and conditioner too! I smell so damn good.

Cedar Citrus was my first soap that I used from Dr. Squatch. It smelled like I had just rolled around in oranges that had spent a week in my cedar closet. I had been plagued with itchy dry skin for years. In three showers, that was gone. The soap lasted for 2.5 weeks lathering liberally on a washcloth with the water off and using the soap saver. The brief duration of the soap is actually nice, because I found I was starting to get nose-blind to the scent around the 2 week mark. 

I will definitely be starting a Soapscription with this bar at the top of my list.

My only two complaints: 
1. The travel bag is out of stock. I'd love to take Dr. Squatch with me on my upcoming vacations. Putting it in a plastic baggy will keep unnecessary moisture on the soap, thus drastically shortening its life.
2. I don't get to try out the Sudsfaction Guarantee, because this is, in fact, the best soap I have ever used.

For as long as I can remember, I have been battling dry, itchy scalp. I bought the big, cheap 2-in-1 dandruff shampoo and conditioner from a local warehouse (let the reader understand). As a man who wears a black shirt with a white collar everyday, it was always embarrassing how many white flakes were on my shoulders. After a week of using these products (shampooing on Sundays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays; conditioning everyday), the dryness and itchiness have both almost subsided. My shoulders also reflect this change. My scalp and hair have begun to adjust to the new regiment. My wife also appreciates how soft this makes my beard feel.
What's more, this stuff smells amazing and feels even better on the scalp.
Dr. Squatch, you have two shelves in my shower (one for soap, another for shampoo and conditioner) for as long as I can afford you and you remain in business.

Neither the citrus or nautical sage have any 'extraordinary' smell, they both just smell like plain `ol soap!! haven`t noticed skin any smoother either, but what I`m disappointed in is the size of the bar for the high price!!! also this soap does NOT last long at all,even when kept on a loofa so it can dry,!!! I`ve taken maybe 8 showers with it and last night it broke into 4 pieces!!! Will not buy again,nor will I recommend this soap company to anyone!!!!
Great soap!!
Love the lather and smell!
A confused fragrance with very poor longevity.
Gave this to my son and he loved the scent! I couldn't be happier with the fast shipping too! I will definitely be back for more.
A confused fragrance with poor longevity.
Tried this for the first time and I can safely say I have never felt cleaner than after using this.

I'm not a bar soap type of person but I have been looking for something better for my body than what I have been using and the commercial I saw on Facebook sucked me into a spontaneous late night purchase. Well the advertising worked, but the product sold me. I will continue my soapscription because these bars leave my skin feeling nice and moisturized not sticky and dry like the old bars my parents always made us use and it leaves my whole bathroom smelling nice.
