I actually look forward to using this soap. I do just wish they were a little bigger for the price but I understand quality costs more.
Loved it, plus the bonus of the free cologne was great.

I like the product. I’d like the scents to linger a bit more but I understand that being a natural product that may not be possible. I’d like to try samples of the cologne however they always seem to be sold out.

I had been waiting for this shampoo to come back for MONTHS! It’s literally the only thing that keeps my scalp healthy. When I use this shampoo, even my psoriasis goes away—no itchy, flaky, gross scalp! So glad it’s available again! Now, if only I were able to subscrib for shampoo...
Fantastic smells and lather. Wish the bar lasted longer.

as a man with long curly hair, I take pride in having the best hair at work, but with Dr. Squatch shampoo and conditioner My hair's condition has declined rapidly in just 1 week. I tried to just condition as they recommend, but that leaves my hair feeling like I put wax in it. In the shower my hair feels brittle and dry. Out of the shower it keeps that feeling.I can't brush it, I can't comb it, I cant braid it without breakage. over all just a bad experience. Maybe it's good for short hair, but not for long hair.
Still waiting for them to arrive
Amazing!

I went on a trip to the rainforest in Belize and took this bar with me in the handy canvas travel bag. I took this bar with me because it has some incredible exfoliation, and trust me, after walking for miles through the forest, you want something that can get the sweat and grime out. Not to mention it works great for hair too so you can travel light. I also didn't feel too bad about washing in the river, as I would with a store bought soap, since this soap is natural. There's nothing like bathing in a river, filtered by the trees of a rainforest, while hearing howler monkeys in the trees beside you. Want to feel like a real sasquatch then do that and use this soap!

Im trying the subscription and this was on my first delivery. I didnt really like the scent, it reminded me of the smell of urinal cakes, and the soap is black/blue so as I was rinsing it off it stained my tile, grout, and anything it touched, so now my tub is black. The other one I got was the basil one and I really like that. Im trying the Cedar one next.

The cologne is basically a beard oil. Its not a cologne. It doesn't have any projection or duration. The soap sticks to the wooden soap holder, a $2 plastic soap holder works better. The soap isn't anything to jump up and down about.

review_title: I was totally won over by that darn commercial you guys made!
review_content: Bought 3 bars out of curiosity. I was impressed by the great scents and the natural ingredients. So far the bar is lasting well, I think it’s great. My husband hasn’t given me his review yet. I’m thinking that he may lack the vocabulary to express himself regarding shower products. (Kidding...sort of)
This soap is unlike any I have tried before. It feels smooth and moisturizing, with a light, natural scent. And it foams up really well. Highly recommend you try it!

I've been using bottled liquid soaps for years, but these bars are far superior. They foam up great and leave your skin feeling smooth and clean. The fragrance is light and natural, not overpowering. I work in a hospital with a fragrance-free policy, so your soaps are great for that type of environment. Any chance of making deodorants in matching scents?

I enjoy the soap I bought, but it didn’t come as quickly as it was supposed to. Therefore I had to ask for another shipment. They both ended up coming in and I feel really bad about getting the second bar, but I did I think the original was lost in the mail?! Thanks guys.
I have recieved my soaps but i have yet to recieve my cologne. The form i got mailed with the first package said it was backordered along with a soap but the cologne didnt come with it.

review_title: Smells great, for a little bit, anyway.
review_content: The soap is awesome. It smells great, lathers great, but I cancelled my subscription. These bars last about 9 days with showering once a day. It may be better for my skin, but not my wallet. At 6 bucks a bar the cost is not sustainable.
It was excellent. One bar was back ordered but arrived on its own with efficiently. My hubby smells delicious :)

This shampoo and conditioner are awesome! Smells great, and leaves your hair feeling great too! Only criticism I can think of is the amount of product you get for the price. Still worth every penny though.

review_title: Kings Ransom paid for but never received
review_content: I ordered the Kings Ransom for my husband for Fathers Day and never received it. I have sent emails but have not received a reply. Their phone number they have listed doesn’t work either.
This is honestly the best soap I've ever used.

review_title: They smell great, but lack in actual usage.
review_content: The shampoo works great, little to no lather, great at getting the oils and grease out without drying my hair and it smells great! But the conditioner was no use: very watery, didn't condition at all, and I feel like it left my hair feeling more dried out than the shampoo did. All of the products smell amazing, but when it cam to actual usage: lacked. I would 100% recommend the shampoo to anyone, but I'll stick to my own conditioner.

As I began my first shower with this Pine Tar soap, the aroma of the soap began to fill the shower, I began to feel my testosterone levels rise, in what can only be described as the most manly feeling possible in a shower. As I stepped out of the shower, I stood in front of the mirror like a deer in headlights, as I noticed how incredibly soft, and moisturized my skin was. I felt as though I had just experienced, for the first time, what a shower was always supposed to feel like.

I saw the ad for the first time on Facebook, saw the hilarious commercial and thought to myself Id like to try something new and not from a large company that i know will dry out my skin .... again. I bought two random bars and the results are what i didnt expect. Soft non drying soap...i said wow, finally something that smells manly and makes my skin not dry out. Wife loves that I take my showers with such excitement now. Adjusted my subscription to select two new bars. Cant wait!

I have been buying your soap for over a year now, Check your records and you will find I have purchased allot from you. Giving it as gifts as well,,, So not really sure what your asking,,, I m very satisfied with your products,
Got a trial supply and loved it. Now I'm a member. Try Dr. Squatch you will be impressed.
Keep it!!
Liked it a lot

My first reaction was to the squeezability of the bottles--somewhat difficult and will be more so when the product gets low; I wondered why the "kit" contained two products with different scents; I guess they're complementary but maybe that should have been indicated before you buy them. My main issue, however, is that my hair doesn't feel as good with this shampoo + conditioner as it does with other quality shampoos you can pick up at CVS. It's only been 1.5 weeks of use, so maybe my opinion will shift. Or maybe my expectations were too high. I really thought I'd say, "Wow. This feels and smells amazing... and my hair feels so clean and conditioned." But I don't have that reaction. Sorry.
Spearmint Basil
I tried Dr Squatch soap because of their extremely creative ad campaign.....and because I no longer wanted to be momma's little helper. I'm now a proud soapscriber. Great product !!!
Right now Pine Tar is number 1 in my shower

review_title: Never Received - Never Contacted About Delay
review_content: I haven't received it yet. I called about why, and was told you're out of the cologne and won't ship until you have it. It definitely would have been appreciated if you had contacted me about the delay instead of my having to contact you to see why I hadn't received it.
Soap is great. First order had only one bar even though invoice showed 2 shipped. Quickly corrected by customer service

Perfect product, period! Easily removes the grime of the day whilst softening my beard as well. And the smell is fantastic. Takes me to the woods every morning and evening! Will be ordering in bulk from now on!

This is the first of my many bars of soap to use, and I love it so far! It has an excellent, woodsy scent, it provides a very nice lather, and the lady loves the scent of it too. I would highly recommend this product, and look forward to trying the rest of the scents!
I started wet shaving using a safety razor and this soap takes the cake. It lathers well and leaves my face feeling feeling more clean and refreshed than any other soap I've tried.

Product arrived within a few days. I am very pleased with this product. It is amazing! I love the pine tar, so far it's my personal favorite. I find myself showering up to 3 times a day now! Thank you so much. You got a customer for life.
Lobe this scent, my new #2 behind Pine Tar

I recently purchased the woodsmen gift box set and the shampoo/conditioner combo pack. As always Dr Squatch is fantastic. I have hair that would be greasy after a day nomatter what shampoo i used and dandriff I couldnt get rid of either. The shampoo and condition is fantastic. It has a citrus/cedar/menthol smell. No dandriff and my hair is nice and clean after sweating in attics and crawlspaces. The gift box is great i do wish they would allow you to pick your 4 soaps instead of it being presets but honestly its not that big of a deal. Dr Squatch if you guys actually read these reviews please please please restock your shave gift boxes!

Didn't really care for cedar citrus, couldn't smell the cedar and the bar only lasted three days.. At six dollars a bar that will get quite expensive.. On a brighter note there customer service is five star all the way.. They reached out to me right away and sent me out 2 replacement bars right away.. Only problem is they messed up the bars and sent me nautical sage instead.. Which I actually like better than cedar citrus !
Exactly what I need. The pin tar is killer.
The smell is great and the exfoliant from the pine tar bar is awesome.

review_title: Best soap I have ever used!!!
review_content: This soap is so refreshing and it doesn't dry out my skin! I got a metal wire soap saver and it doesn't leave any of the soap bar behind! Make sure to use a soap saver or else it won't last you very long!

The soaps rock and the advertising is bonus. 
Worth the $
I enjoy the soap it’s clean smelling and has somehow helped me with my dry skin. Bonus.
This is one of my favorites. I feel like I am being bathed by four enchanting Druid priestesses in a green meadow.

I've been very interested in purchasing the shampoo and conditioner products to give them a try but unfortunately it appears that the conditioner has sold out. I hope Dr. Squatch restocks, until then I will wait to try the shampoo and conditioner when I can purchase them together. Love the bar soap so I look forward to the day I can give these products a try!

This bar of soap smells great and makes me feel super clean! This was my first time trying natural soap and I'm glad I found Dr. Squatch. I can't wait to try new scents but I will be buying another bar of Pine Tar for sure! Thank you for such a great product!
I love the soap for both my skin and beard.
Smells nice without soapy residue.

review_title: Honestly the best soap I've ever used.
review_content: I had used Zest for 52 years. I recently tried men's shower gel / liquid soaps. They all left a yucky film. I have thus far only tried the Pine Tar and am extremely pleased. I use a soap rack and this works well. Other reviews have stated the the soap seemed to have a short life span. I do not agree. Load the wash cloth only moderately and then the lather just keeps on coming! Well done, Squatch. I look forward to trying the other bars...but this tar just keeps on.
Not at all worth the price tag, but it is decent shampoo
The soap is great only thing is it only lasted about 9days but other then that I love it

When I received my box they accidentally gave me two of the same soaps. When I told costumer service they were very nice and I had the soap I was missing in two days. Amazing company and the soap is also amazing. I used to use antibacterial soap to help with my skin but since I started using this soap I haven’t had any issues and it smells much better! I will be using this company to buy soap for my whole family!
Love the soap feels so fresh when you towel off. Not dry just real fresh.

review_title: Moistures and gets rid of oily skin but..
review_content: The smell isn't all that strong. Not only that but it the light smell doesn't even last that long (2 hours or so). I've had other natural soap that lasted a lot longer and had a stronger scent for about the same price. I also bought the pine tar but have yet to try it as of this review. Hoping that won't let me down.

I recently bought the Soapscription consisting of Cedar Citrus, Eucalyptus Greek Yogurt, Cool Fresh Aloe, the Soap Saver, and the Shampoo/Conditioner combo. I just went through my first bar of the Cedar Citrus and it has a very Pleasent smell and left me with a very fresh feeling after use. The shampoo/conditioner smells great and make my hair very soft. The soap saver works great if you turn the bar of soap 90 degrees of it. I just place it under the shower head and it twist off with ease. I’ll be a returning customer for sure.
One of the best shampoos I have ever tried. Rinses clean, lathers great, and smell great too.

I’m a big guy , 6.4/ 260 and regular soap is really small in my hand ,
The first thing I liked was the size & shape of the bars . After I used it I loved the scent and the lather I got , it’s a really good product ,I plan on becoming a regular Squatch .Thanks !
Leaves skin soft, pleasant scent. Only thing is it doesn’t last that long.
Makes my skin feel clean.love it.
I haven't tried but I would like too... Just sayin, sounds like I'd love it. I'm gonna give you 5 stars for great commercial though!!!!
Just get it, you will be glad that you did.
I feel like I took a swim in a nice spice/rum pool and washed off with the cleanest purified water ever. I don't even need my cologne today, I feel soft and ready take on the day. Great product!
I like it. Feels good on skin
I ordered two bars to compare and constrast. Pleaseant smelling; effective sudsing and so far so good. Like very much

The conditioner does feel good on the scalp with a cool tingling sensation, but there is no hint of citrus scent. I find the scent unpleasant and very strong. I’ll stick with the soap... i like the soaps. Pine Tar and Cedar Citrus my top 2.

Still going through all the bar "flavors" to see what I want to "sud"scribe to, but this is definitely one of my favorites so far... 

The commercial was right though, the soap I was using is %#@$!!.... I had no idea....

The shampoo and conditioner combination are great- my hair has never felt healthier. My one gripe is the hint of patchouli that I pick up on in the conditioner. I can't stand the scent and neither can my girlfriend! Please make some other scents for your hair products so I can avoid smelling like a hippie.
Bought 3 soaps to try out, three different scents. Love the soaps, the lather was great as well. My husband and I did a soap scribe and live it . Thanks squatch!

review_title: It really does what it says.
review_content: My soap has lasted so much longer than when it didn’t.
Makes my Bathroom smell like a Man took shower..! Perfect and Great products THanks Doc!

Maybe one day I'll write the super long review of Dr. Squatch products and why I love them so much, but today I'll just tell you this; if anything you're looking at sounds good to you, get it, you'll likely love it. I've picked up almost all of their soaps, used Bay Ram, Pine Tar and Cedar Citrus so far, all great in their own way. The shampoo and conditioner have been fantastic. I don't get any of the crap from regular hair care stuff that has been causing me serious skin problems, but unlike every other natural product I've used, my hair actually looks and feels good afterwards. The shave bar is good too, there really isn't anything I've tried that I wouldn't give 5 stars to...what else can I say?
Great products, can already feel the difference
Smells, Feels Amazing. Thats all a Man"s much have in the shower!!

review_title: No more poor balls, all dry, shriveled and sad!!!
review_content: Love the soap! Going with the soapscription and never using big corporate soap again! I need a travel bag and a t-shirt though...out of stock...big bummer...but the soap...NOT A BIG BUMMMER...one kick ass shower after another leaving me rejuvenated, well scented, and irresistible to my woman...she loves my new 'scent'!

able to leap tall buildings in single bound
able to stop a speeding bullet
all with thick, great feeling and smelling HAIR
Dude 
put a big S on the front label

review_title: just once was all it took
review_content: im not gonna spend a bunch of time here but just going to get to the point, just buy it I honestly have never given my soap I used much thought usually just bought whatever was on sale at the store like most guys do. I never thought the soap I showered with could make such a difference in my showering experience but this stuff is really that awesome, feels great soft and smooth and smells great even before you take it out of the box and it came faster than they said it would I couldn't be happier im soapscribed for life thanks squatch!
Smells great
Awesome soap, smells good, lathers good and best of all not full of all those harmful chemicals.
Great product. So happy I switched to this soap

I was very pleased with the quality of the soap bars. There's a nice balance of the scent, - not too much and not too little. The lather is a level above the commercial soap bars. But the part that exceeded my expectations was that the soap did not have any odor of lye. I can't stand that odor because it's just a sign of cheap quality soap, and I'm very happy that your product doesn't do that. Thanks!
Great soap but doesn’t last as long as I thought. Get alittle over a week out of one bar

I thought the shampoo and conditioner smelled like a stump rotting in stagnant muddy water. The days when you suggest to only wash with the conditioner, my hair still feels dirty and greasy afterwards.

After using the products for a little while I am very impressed. The soaps are excellent quality and suds up well even on the first use. Pine tar cleans incredibly well and leaves my skin feeling super clean. Bay rum is also nice. I'm a heavy equipment mechanic and I get pretty dirty. I have thick straight hair and I know the shampoo says to only use it 2-3 times a week, and to use the conditioner as a daily cleaner, but it doesn't clean my hair very well on it own. Use them both every day and my hair feels clean and healthy. As for the cologne, definitely not for me or my girlfriend. It's a bit oily and smells like you'd imgaine a Hemlock trail to smell like..
The Best!!

I usually like boutique soaps, but this soap is really not worth the money. First, the bars are super small, and while they do lather up nicely, they won't last long. Second, the fragrance is only superficial at best. It smells like whatever fragrance it is when you use it the first few times, but not only does the fragrance not linger on your skin afterwards, but the fragrance eventually turns into more of a soapy/toilet bowl cleaner smell after several uses of the soap bar (think Ajax after you've swirled it in your toilet bowl a few times). And, at least where the Pine Tar soap is concerned, that "exfoliating and nourishing oatmeal" feels more like scraping your skin with gravel than something good for you. Buy at your own risk. Seems like these manly boutique soaps have popped up everywhere lately. Save your money and find a good smelling cleansing soap elsewhere.

review_title: I feel like a man again...
review_content: So glad I don’t have to use my wife’s girlie soap or my sons cheap teenager swag soap! I feel naturally rustic clean like a man should be!

First time user of Squatch soap. Definitely worth it. The Gold Moss scent is fantastic and does have staying power, usually can still smell the scent on me about halfway through my workday (which includes field work outside in the hot and muggy summer of Maryland). I suffer from dry skin with most bar soaps; so far no issue at all with Gold Moss after a month of use, if anything, it’s been hydrating as advertised. Finally, I’ve seen the reviews of the bar not lasting...all I can say is I shower daily and after a month of use, still probably have a week left of my first bar. I just keep the bar out of the spray of the shower and use the soap saver. Squatch on!
I love it. Good lather, great scent.

review_title: I hate that it’s so good!
review_content: I never really cared for soap bars and usually would pick the least expensive on the shelves, but as soon as I tried the pine tar, I immediately felt the difference. I especially loved the exfoliating experience when I use it. Can’t wait for my bar to finish so I can try other scents!
Scent was a little weak and did not mix as well as expected but was not horrible
I have used several of the different bars and am very pleased with the experience. My family has been using essential oils for many years and this addition to my daily routine is awesome.
So far so good! I love the smell of the Pine Tar Bar. It’s textured which is something I’m not really used to but it’s fantastic soap! Love the stuff, keep them coming!

Initiated my son into the world of Squatch! 
He loves it!!
And his Lady appreciates it!!

My first experience with your soap came with the Bay Rum bar and it was not a very good one. It snapped in half after 3 uses and then crumbled when I tried to fuse them together. It was bad and I just threw it away. The scent was nice, but I was afraid to use the other 5 bars of soap I purchased, but the Pine Tar was very interesting. At first I was not ready for the sandpaper like feel at first and on my face after shaving it was not fun. So the first day, I was questioning the logic of such a bar. I never exfoliated before I guess, so this was something I was not prepared for. The second day, the rough exterior of the bar lessened a tad or I just got used to it, and I discovered that I rather enjoyed the feel of it. The more I used it, the more I enjoyed the texture and scent. The only issue I had was that it melted in the final stage, but it is way better than breaking into tiny little pieces. Tomorrow I will try the Aloe or Spearmint one, not sure yet, but I am looking forward to another unique experience.
Showering with Nautical Sage is the perfect start to my morning! From the moment its scent hits my nose I’m immediately awakened and invigorated, ready to conquer the day.
I thought it was decent. As someone who lives in the west and has a lot of sage around I enjoy sage.

Between work and they gym I usually shower twice a day and that would give me dry skin despite using soaps like Dove for Men or Kiehl's. My first DR. SQUATCH shipment was Nautical Sage and Cedar Citrus. I like them both but Cedar Citrus is amazing. A girl told me she could not believe how smooth my skin was while on a date last week. I cannot wait to see what comes in my next shipment but so far Cedar Citrus is my favorite.
Soaps are excellent. Will subscribe soon.
Its good soap, real soap. It smells good, lasts about 2-3 weeks, and shipped fast right to my door. What more do you want?

Best bar soap I've ever used. I am a career firefighter and have a medical condition called hypothyroidism which causes my skin to be extremely dry, rashy and Itch. Both are hard on my skin but since starting this product its all cleared up and I literally dont have the dry itchy skin anymore. Its amazing for sure. Wanna try the shave products next. Also, started using the shampoo which is awesome to... Favorite scents are Nautical Sage and Cedar Citrus. I'm a life long user from now on...

The actual scent of this bar is a bit misleading compared to the name. It is a very strong cinnamon scent which reminds me more of being trapped in a bottle of Goldschlager rather than chilling on the island with a bottle of rum. Not a fan of this one. Don't get me wrong I understand that people do like this bar, and you might too. Just be aware the cinnamon overpowers the entire scent.
This bar is fantastic! Love the scent! The only drawback here is that the bar can get messy if not properly stored. Other than that this one is a winner!

This bar is the best bar I've tried so far. The scent is not too strong or too weak, and actually feels like its name describes. It leaves you feeling cool and refreshed. This is the bar I like to use on my face as well. Great pick!

Love this bar! Not as much as the Cool Aloe bar but this bar is not far behind. This is a bar to wind down the day with. The lavender is not as prominent as the sage, but will help you relax and end your day on a good note.

Its been great so far. Your customer service is top notch. My only complaint is. When I log on. There is no purchase history. This unfortunate. I want to try all your bar soaps. I could use some help in this regard.
All in all a good soap leaves me feeling clean every time.

review_title: Smells like you're taking a shower in a pine forest.
review_content: Great soap! Fantastic outdoorsy smell! Love it.

I've enjoyed this bar of soap, smells great and I feel clean when done showering. For the price it didn't last as long as I would have liked. I just found the same bar through Pure Soap at a quarter of the cost. Will see if it is a cheap knock off or a great substitute.

I have used these products for a few weeks now and have already noticed a difference in my skin/scalp (my head is buzzed so I can’t say anything about my short hair). Before using the shampoo and conditioner from Dr. Squatch, my scalp and the skin around my ears were always dry and itchy. I assume it was from the harsh shampoo I used to try and treat what I thought was dandruff. After using these two Squatch products, in just two weeks, I noticed that have not seen dry skin around my ears and my scalp has not itched much at all compared to how it was before. I’m truly impressed. They also smell great. I would recommend these products to any guy. Also, I followed the advice on the bottle and the website and only shampoo maybe 1-2 times a week and use the conditioner the other days. I believe that has helped as well.
Good beard wash soap. Coastal sage smells goood

review_title: Best bar of soap you'll ever buy
review_content:
I used to have dry oily skin and a beard that would get wiry and tangled. Then I switched to Dr. Squatch 2 years ago. I've been looking and smelling great ever since.
This stuff is amazing! It's naturally made, works up a great lather, and it smells great. Keeps me and my beard looking great too. I'd give it 6 stars if I could.
Love the smell so does my wife! Only reason for 4 out of 5 is i wish the smell was stronger. Other than that awesome!
I really like the smell of this stuff! Just like the Bay Rum I wish the smell was stronger and lasted a little longer. Other than that love the way it makes my skin feel!
STRONG. CLEAN. MAN......nuff said

So I ordered a couple bars of Pine Tar and when they arrived I was so excited to try it out. The smell was just what I was looking for. I let my wife smell the soap before I showed and her eyes just lit up. So I jumped in the shower and let me tell you I had never used a soap that smelled so good and felt amazing. When I got out of the shower and dressed I came out to the living room where my wife was and she said she could smell me showering at rhe other end of the house. She then locked lips and I knew I made the right choice. Dont have to tell you how the rest of my night went. The next morning i got up and I feel amazing. My skin is so soft and I feel like a new man. Thanks Dr. Squatch, I'm 46 and fell like I'm 26.

tricky to review as we bought this as a gift for a friend.
He seemed very happy at both the scent and having it be Sasquatch related, as he is a big fan of anything squatch.
So, I guess I’d have to say it was a successful and satisfying purchase
I like it, it doesn’t last long that’s for sure

I bought a bar to try before signing into a subscription. This soap is far better than I was expecting. The smell (pine tar) is phenomenal, very manly. The lather , it doesn’t take much soap to get a great lather on your whole body. And the cleanness you skin feels afterwards, non of that weird sticky residue that other bars leave. Axe, ivory, Irish spring has nothing on the squatch.
Loving the soaps as well as the shampoo and conditioner. Masculinity making a comeback. Wholesome and fresh.
Broke easily
Just got the sample bundle, love all the scents. Now I want to try the rest of your catalog. Hand on heart this the best soap I have ever used, you definitely have a continued customer. Thank you!

I will be completely honest, this is some of the best soap I have ever used. The best part is you don’t feel dry at all after you shower with it. It is an amazing product. The only downside is the soap bars do not last very long. Maybe I’m not doing something right? I shower twice a day before and after work. Other than that, I don’t mind spending the extra money for the results. Highly recommend if you want all natural and no dry skin and you feel very clean with it! It does the job!
This soap is by far the best soap I’ve ever used. I love the Golden Moss and Pine Tar. Next I will be trying Bay Rum.

Bro this is the best shave soap. I am in the US Army and I shave every single day. Let me tell you. For the first 14.5 years in service, I used the shave gel and razors with a billion blades on it and dealt with razor burn, pimples and constant ingrown hairs along my neck and under the kin from the chin strap. It also cost a ton of money. I decided to switch to just a safety razor and shave soap from Van Der Hagen. Pimples stopped skin felt better with no razor burn, but got lots of cuts learning a new shave method. When I saw your guys commercial on face creep, I laughed at it and was like awesome telling the truth about today's soap. But then I thought, what these dudes are on to something because I always have dry skin and still get the ingrown hairs. So I dived in and got a bar of your Cedar Citrus and shave soap. Gents after only showering for a week and shaving with your soap, my skin feels great and my face is smooth and clear. I wake up and can't wait to shave before going to physical fitness and then can't wait to get in the shower to smell the soap. So refreshing. Yes itdoes sound like I am in love with your soap. I may be. Any hoot. Keep up the great work. You have a customer for life.

V/R 
Ty
It's some of the best shampoo and conditioner I've ever used . Keeps my hair fresh . Also keeps my mild dandruff down no more dry scalp. It's a bit pricey but worth the money

This one was a pleasant surprise. The best lather of all the Squatch soaps, and it's great for moisturizing my skin. Don't be put off by the word "floral" in the fragrance description. The scent is mild but pleasant and I would describe it as being more clean and fresh than flowery. Bay Rum is still my favorite, but this is a close second.
Performs as advertised. A must have for your soaps.
I won’t shower without any more!!!
Since I've been using this product my hair and body feel a lot cleaner. The down fall to this is it's so sticky when it gets in your drains it clogs them up. I hadn't had any problems until now.
Amazing soap, but it isn’t enough soap for $7...
Great manly scent

So I stumbled across the funny commercial online, the one where he says dry balls, anyways I liked the comedy to the commercial I figured I'd give it a shot and got a bar of bay rum and pine tar. I like both but bay rum was my favorite of the 2 so I put in another order today for 4 more bars. I want to try the others soon.

I'm a mechanic in Colorado, I get dirty on my property on the Front Range and when working on 40 year old cars. My wife bought me the sampler, and the Gold Moss Scrub just plain rocks! I got so squeaky clean that I thought I was pulling my beard off when i rinsed. Insane! Even our hard water, we're on a fractured granite mountain at 8000 feet in a forest, my well is over 850 feet deep,, is no match for this stuff. And I don't smell like 90 weight either! Can't wait to try the other ones now. Maybe my wife's car needs an oil change, then I could take another shower. Yeah, it's that good!
Absolutely gonna buy all the boys this pack for Chris and from now on! Best bang for your buck and they all smell and feel AMAZING

The absolute best shower soap there is period. After the shower I went outside chopped 17 trees and while not spilling my beer. Why you ask? Because I’m a manly man with no more dry skin. #Squatchsavedmyballs

This Pine Tar wonder bar is amazing, it feels like Angels hand washed me in Aphrodite’s bathtub and i was blown dry by Ares warhorn while riding a pine scented pegasus! Thank you Dr. Squatch, thank you.

Pine tar is the best! Gets all the grit and grime off after a days work. Nice pine outdoor smell.
Spearmint basil gets me awake in the morning. Really like it.
The rest are all good, those two are my favorite, gold moss coming in a close third. 
The rest have their place and all are good and last long.
Although, I didn't know how this soap can make people start snuggling up to wildlife, drink homemade elixers, make fire , sleep outside and eat tubers right from the ground... I thought that was normal...

review_title: I chose to try Gold Moss first and. . .
review_content: This is a really great bar of natural soap, It smells fantastic. Soapscribed.
I never got my order. Tried to call, wouldn’t go through...

Love this soap works great smells good and ive noticed a difference in my skin the only down fall is i wish that i can order more soap per month because i like to shower 2 to 3 times a day i work outside in 120° weather in the summer

Thank You For Making A Great Bars Of Soap. This Is Perfect For The Change Of Seasons When Your Skin Starts To Dry Out. This Soap Takes Off The Dry Flakes And Moistures Your skin At The Same Time. Love The Sent Too!

review_title: No smell left on body and left me feeling sticky and dry
review_content: I got my soap in today and I was super excited! I jumped in the shower and I have to say this has got to be the biggest rip off ever I dont smell like anything it doesn't lather like you say and I feel dry and sticky now and half the bars gone after one wash! I do not recommend@

review_title: The best bar soap i have used!
review_content: This morning I tried the pine tar soap the sent and lather is amazing! You have me hooked, keep them coming!

Got the cedar citrus on a impulse buy while I was shit faced drunk the video they go sold me !! But after receiving it and trying it the first time I was actually glad I got it like it a lot very good scent don’t dry my skin like most soaps only thing I was kind of disappointed about is it didn’t seem to last very long about week and a half to two weeks but I’ll be purchasing more for sure

review_title: Best soap I have ever used!
review_content: I used to use that "old" brand of soap. I found this while watching videos on you tube. Thought the commercial was funny and intriguing so I decided to give a try. Man am I glad I did. I've used the soap the past week and am really impressed with the way my skin feels. Not to oily but not to dry. Absolutely perfect. I have already ordered 4 more bars of different scents to try out. This is definitely the soap I will be using from now on. The only down side I see is the soap bars dont last as long as I would like but I think that's just because I enjoying using it to much.

review_title: Love the soap, not the scent
review_content: I ordered a subscription and I recieved the cedar citrus bar. Now, let me start with the fact that I am a soap snob and I own that 110%. The soap itself is fantastic, it doesn't leave my skin dry and for someone with eczema and skin sensitivity that is HUGE! My only issue with this bar is that the scent is gone almost as soon as I'm done showering. The bathroom smells like it for hours but my skin, not so much. Love the soap but not happy with the longevity of the scent.
Amazing stuff, best soap I have ever used, my skin has never felt or smelled better
This soap has a excellent scrub to it, when I step out the shower my pores feel opened and clean and it smells great,it really does moisturize the skin perfectly. Definitely gonna soapscribe.
My bum loves Bay Rum!

Pin Tar Is one of your greatest soaps ever made. Great for the change of weather. Then your skin gets dry the exfoliate in it removes it. Then the oils go to work fixing your skin. Thank You for making a great soap!!!
Simply delightful! It smells so natural as clean.

My boyfriend absolutely loves this soap. I love walking into the bathroom after he takes a shower it smells like i’m walking into a dense forest. Not to mention he smells amazing and his skin feels so soft. I was also very pleased with how quickly the product was shipped. Definitely will be making many more purchases. Thanks Dr. Squatch!
Love the IPA! It has made it into my personal rotation of Pine Tar and Bay Rum. It has a really refreshing citrus undertone, grapefruit that is still earthy.. loving my showers!!

I received the 3 soap sample pack with the wooden soap dish (which smells awesome by the way) on Monday of this week. I tried the pine tar first because I think I liked that one the best. I read a previous review where a guys soap cracked and fell apart, and he was told to put it somewhere in the shower where it could get water on it and not dry out. Thats what I did with mine (I put it in the shower spot assigned to my stuff due to my wife and her two daughters over abundance of shower supplies). Having said that, I think all the females in the house taking showers are too much for the soap to handle, because it is now 1/4 of the size it was, and today is only Thursday. I don’t know if all the girls showering is too much water for it to handle or not, but I put it Behind the shower curtain this morning, so hopefully it’ll do better with not so much water on it. If it weren’t for that, I would give it a 5 star rating because I love it!! But I can’t be sure it’s entirely the girls’ fault. If getting it away from the women’s overspray fixes the problem, I will come back and update my review to 5 stars, and let all the Squatches out there know to keep it away from a household of women’s shower spray. Hahaha But for real, thanks for the product guys...it’s truly terrific!!
This soap makes me feel like Paul Bunyon doing the MC Hammer dance through a forest while doing manly things.

No kidding. It smells amazing, it is super cleansing, it will actually get you clean after a long day's work. This is the first time in my entire life I have regularly been EXCITED to shower every single day.
I ordered this almost 2 months ago. They sent me the wrong stuff twice. They stated I would get it when it came back in stock. It is now out of stock and I still don’t have it.
This is the best smelling soap I’ve smelt! It’s smelltavious!

review_title: Not impressed. Especially for the price
review_content: Ordered my soap saver with my very first subscription. I love the soaps. Hate the saver. After a few showers it started to produce some sort of stain that dropped down the shower walls. The one day I picked up the soap and it stuck to the saver which dropped to the floor of the shower and broke into pieces. Not worth the money. But still a happy customer with the soaps.
I’ve used Baxter of California duke cannon jack black even Tom Ford and squat how is by far the best soap period

Crisp IPA is by far the best smelling soap from the Squatch. I was a big fan of the Pine Tar, until this scent came out. I highly recommend it! I probably take four showers a day just to lather in this soap.
This soap is so good that I felt like I was sharing a cold beer with the squatch himself. I never thought I’d smell as good as this.

What can I say besides this new scent is magnificent! My favorite Squatch scents are Bay Rum and Gold Moss Scrub. This new Crisp IPA goes right in that same category with its delicious scent. I may just take a bite out of this bar for dinner or perhaps I'll order an IPA to go along with my steak. The point im trying to make is that you will love this new scent. If you're a Squatch fan, you're in for a real treat. So sit back and enjoy a tall glass of heaven while smelling like you just walked out of a tropical paradise! Sincerely a Squatchaholic!!
This smells absolutely AMAZING!!! We just received it today and I told my husband that he is going to have to fight me for it lol! Can't wait for him to wash with it!
This one is a winner for sure. Keep those amazing soaps coming squatch. Doing a really outstanding job.

I purchased 2 soap savers. 1 for the shower, one for the sink. They work wonderfully in both locations. Not only does the soap dry quickly, but the saver does as well. There is no issue with the soap sticking or sliding off. Biggest plus, it absolutely makes a huge difference in how long the soap lasts. Well worth every cent.

I guess you could say I pretty manly. I love pretty women, shooting guns at the range or a good patient hunt, and I enjoy driving my big, old gas guzzling pickup truck to do manly pickup truck stuff in, but ‘alas I have fought terribly with a condition known as folliclitis which causes my skin to be extremely sensitive to heat, friction, most harsh fragrance chemicals, and so I have had to spend more money on better soaps, which I always loved irish spring or dove men products. But eventually I had to stop using fragranced soaps at all, so currently I’ve been using Dove Sensitive Skin. 
 Recently my Dad gifted me a bar of Dr.Squatch Pine Tar soap. I was absolutely fascinated by the shape, solidity and the natural, overwhelmingly manly scent, and albeit I have to use it easily and with a soft squidgee I absolutely think this brand is great, and has carved their perfect little nitch in the heart of every manly man that uses it! 
 I really can’t wait to try to Citrus bar soap next, but as a suggestion, and not sure if any other men have requested it as well, but maybe try releasing a bar soap that is specific for us men with the more sensitive end of the spectrum skin wise, but overall from one man to another, two thumbs up, great job and keep on squatch’n with your bad selves.
I love this new scent! Probably my new top pick. Very well blended. I feel like I stepped straight out somewhere just hadn’t figured that one out yet lol. Very pleasant. Nice work!!

This is my new favorite scent. I love it. It smells amazing just like an IPA. My only problem was the bar was falling apart on one end before I opened the box. It wasn't just the IPA though, both bars from this months sub were like that.

Wow! This stuff is ABSOLUTELY the best out there! I’ve used many other very expensive beard oils. Some were over $45 for a small bottle. I’ve used this one for a month now and I will not use the OTHERS ever again! Beware, the OTHERS are not Squatch friendly! Become the MAN you know you want to be! Get the Squatch Oil!
There soaps smell amazing and one of the best things I bought for my self this year i really reccomand there soaps.

I was so statisfied with the soap I had to try the cologne. When I recieved it I got excited and couldn't waite to try it. When i opened the bottle there was no scent. So I put some on and for a brief second there was a faint fragrance. I can't tell you how disappointed I am.

I was very excited to receive my order of the beechwood bourbon cologne in the mail. When I opened the package I was, at first, disappointed to see the crushed pine in the package. My disappointment quickly faded the moment I cracked the seal of that bottle. I contacted customer service about the issue and they apologized and offered to correct the order. They responded to my email very quickly and were helpful. I declined the offer and they were okay with that. The customer service was exceptional, the cologne and soaps are worth every penny. I've noticed a real difference in my skin since I began using Dr. Squatch. I love it when there is a good product out there that's reasonably priced and the company behind it are good people. That's a rare combination today

review_title: Not impressed but my girlfriend was
review_content: The bars of soap lasted a week long so I was pretty disappointed. It smelled and felt great but definitely not enough bang for your buck. My girlfriend on the other hand was impressed. She loves using it as a moisturizer for shaving. She says it’s the absolute best soap she’s ever used for that. So the bars we have left that’s what they are being used for.

The grit they put in there is perfectly what I was looking for. Some people say it’s “to abrasive” but I work in a weld shop and I don’t have sensitive skin. Works amazing to get tebdirt and grime from work off and the dead or peeling skin after arc burn starts peeling. 

Love the smell, works better than any soap I’ve ever used, will be keeping my subscription, just a couple I’m interested in trying yet but so far this is my favorite.

Decided to try out after i saw the commercial. Ordered two bars to try out before i soapscribed pine tar and eucalyptus yogurt both great scents cant wait to try some of the others out. My 8 year old son love this soap as well. Dr squatch was quick with delivery. If you are on the fence about this product dont be definitely worth it. Thanks dr squatch.

Waited for days and never even got a tracking number. I placed an order and they just basically ignored it. They load up yr email w/ tons of the same emails trying to get u to buy more and sell your info so 20+ other companies send you emails daily too. Wish I never even bothered w/ this company! Would vote 0 if I could but they’re making me give them 1 star...

I’m glad I found this company that makes all natural soap. I used Irish spring before I found this. The day after I showered with this soap, my face had calmed down, and my acne wasn’t so red anymore! Will be buying more in the future!

review_title: Great smell and refreshing lather but....
review_content: I have used various liquid soaps for many years, saw the Dr Squatch commercial was hooked and gave it a try. Great scent, felt very refreshed after use but one bar only lasted 10 days. With that much consumption and an $8 price tag I’m feeling a bit disappointed.. Had it lasted 3 weeks or so I would have been a customer for life. BTW I’m 5’4 150lbs not some Sasquatch with a mile of surface area!!
Another thing great about the bars is that one starts to wear out you can put the old on a new one, wet it and fuse the two together. And there is no wast!

review_title: Brings Out the Manly Yooper in Me
review_content: Being from Michigan, I love how this embodies the scent of the great northern outdoors. Not to mention how it doesn't dry my skin out like my old stuff would so it's just about perfect. Just wish i could make it last longer but that investment will wait until my next check if I make enough. Amazing job overall and I can't wait to try the other bars!
This and Pine Tar are my top two now! The Crisp Ipa smells great, but all of them smell and work great! Thanks and keep up the great work! (My wife thanks you too!) John.
I love the smell of the Bay rum but it dries my skin out and leave me all itchy. I love the crisp ipa!

I reached out several times (5 to
be exact!) to get help with an order that never arrived. My credit card was charged. They responded to one of my messages but haven’t responded since. I love their product but their customer service sucks. They have lost a customer forever.
Smells like Lysol but as far as using it it’s not bad. The exfoliation is a bit rough but the smell is very shitty so 1 out of ten seems very fair.

So as far as smell this soap is true to the name definitely smells woodsy but not in the best way and you can barely smell any citrus . The soap smells like someone took cedar saw dust and ran water through it but it feels great on the skin.

Love this soap saver! It will save your soap’s life by weeks! But contrary to the description, it does still stick, after every use. My fresh new bar of soap broke in half because I was trying to pry it off the wood. I don’t know if I’m using it wrong or if mine was Squatched up or what. Besides that, love this company and their soap!

Hands down best soap I've ever used, it smells incredible and lasts. I was tired of getting ripped off by Old Spice and Axe and was looking for something like Dr. Squatch and man was I impressed! Absolutely positively my new go to for soap and i can't wait until the shave kit is back in stock. Thank you Dr. Squatch!!!

Thoroughly impressed! I can actually use the soap on my face as well without breaking out. My skin is definitely softer! (still a little dry but I live in cold high altitude so no escaping that completely, but the soap helped)

I have been resistant to subscriptions. I ordered a variety of Dr. Squatch soaps to try them out. When I opened the mailbox, the scent blasted out at me, and it was mostly the pine tar. I thought that it might be too strong, but it rapidly became my favorite. I ordered more on specials, then started a subscription. I recently suspended my subscription, not because I don’t like the products, but because with all of my ordering I have over 30 bars +one in the shower. Nearly half of those are pine tar. I will be re-upping my subscription after going through some stock on hand.

My husband got the Gold Moss in a subscription box and we loved it! I just bought him one of each scent to see what he likes best. I also sent the three pack to my Papa for Christmas, he loves it too! We'll be subscribing!

review_title: The Best Bar : none ? = The Dr.
review_content: Dudes I’ve been Squatch’n for about a year now & at 62 I can’t believe I went a lifetime ( dry skin ) using store soap when this was available . Anyways I’m hooked now & getting ready to order more ( favorite , Pine Tar ) so like me just keep on Squatch’n ! Hey man it’s the Dr. advice
It smells more citrusy than evergreen like I had expected. But that's hardly a complaint. I love this soap. It's a little abrasive, so if your skin is super sensitive I'd advise against Pine Tar.

I've been impatiently waiting for my order until today, and I was ecstatic to get it. So despite already being clean I decided to hop in the shower, and it's like I just met a sexy mountain troll, and she and I decided to make a test tube baby with a pine tree. This soap is phenomenal, I feel incredibly clean, the exfoliation feels.. Indescribable. I can't accurately word how much this product has impressed me. 10/5 stars. This will be the only soap company I use from here on out.

I'm a Bearding guy that uses Citrusy scents. So when I finally tried your CITRUS bar.... I was BLOWN..AWAY! Yanno. I spend more money on BodyWash! Than I did this... Just because bodywash is expensive and it DRIES my skin out! WHY! Makes me look bad, smell bad, itchy, I probably look like a crack head.... nah. 
It took a month to go through the full bar. I realize u shoulda got the Monthly so I didnt have to REORDER now. (Kicks self in ass)But, some of your scents I've been around due to beard care. There is ANOTHER ONE...right above it I think.. that I'm interested in that I got too. The CLOVE! I'm really into CLOVE scent, so is my woman. This should last me awhile. I wish I had the extra cash to get the wooden grip for the bar of soap. Mine are always slipping off and getting SLAMMED on the floor or on my feet. But, December hit the wallet pretty hard, yanno? 

But, for all you fellow BEARDOS, Listen up. Of you use Citrus in your beard, THIS IS THE PERFECT SOAP FOR YOU. No doubt. and yes, to answer your question, you do smell good throughout the day. 

*********
Swuanch:
We need like... A MAN RAG. 
Or... a MAN LOOFA.
Never cared about soap, found them at Tangible in Columbus while shopping and smelled the bar, so tried it out. Now I have a subscription.

review_title: Soaptacular Bar, it is exactly as advertised!
review_content: Pine Tar is excellent, it exceeds

This soap is awesome! It does exactly what Dr.Squatch said it would, after all he is a Doctor..

I will say, it was a bit unexpected that my little boys used this soap and after using it they became full grown men. - Thanks Dr.Squatch!

This soap is the major leagues of natural soap. A fresh smell and clean feeling that lasts into the extra innings. The exfoliant scrub is a bottom of the 9th off the bench heavy hitter. Dr Squatch hits a homerun every time with this one.

Bought Pine Tar. I loved what it did to my skin. I didn't even mind the very obvious...scratchiness. My skin was no longer horribly dry after just 1 shower, though. I normally have to moisturize after showers due to horrible dry skin in the winter. It's not necessary when I use Dr. Squatch Pine Tar soap. That being said, I'll be lucky to get 5 showers out of 1 bar, which is ridiculous at $7 a bar, $9 for the total initial purchase cost. I did purchase a soapscription with the hope that this is uncommon. I'll be getting two bars soon, so we'll see how long they last. Question for other verified purchasers--does the $15 soap block actually help with this problem? It seems ridiculous to buy it without that knowledge, and unless it's going to at least double the lifespan of the bars, I won't be purchasing it. 

Great experience, terrible lifespan for the first bar. I'm hoping that changes.

I ordered this as a gift for my husband... when I went to checkout, there was a section that asked if it was a gift and they asked for the name and email of the person you’re giving it to.... I figured they would use that information for the future or make a nice gift box or something. But no, they sent my husband an email before the package even arrived and ruined the entire surprise. He knows what he’s getting for Valentine’s Day now and I’m kinda pissed. I guess just skip that part unless the person you’re buying it for already knows you’re buying it?
Love the way my skin feels and will buy more. Just wish there was a variety pack of small bars to try them all!

Great exfoliating soap. Helps my skin stay soft & healthy while giving me a fresh, forest aroma.

I think I can hear the forest whispering to me on my hikes now too. Is that normal?

Holy mother! I LOVE this soap! I ordered a few bars for my man (but I use them myself as well,) every scent was incredible, but pine tar is by far my favorite! It's an excellent exfoliating product, but that smell wafting through the house when he's showering REALLY does something for me! I haven't had any issues with the bar falling apart like one of the reviews mentioned, I keep them on a soap saver in the shower. Another review stated the scents are overpowering or chemical smelling, on the contrary, I wish the scent had MORE staying power, obviously it's strongest just after use, I'd LOVE if this smell came in a body lotion, or beard product. None of the bars I ordered smelled anything other than natural & clean & DEAD SEXY!! Do yourself (& us ladies) a favor, sac up, and try it!! You won't be sorry.

(I ordered pine tar, ipa, and golden moss, we'll be ordering them ALL again.)

The fact that I own the soap saver makes me believe a lot of these reviews are fake. I have to use it as a handle unless I want to wrestle the dry bar off and lose chunks of the soap. Is that it's intended purpose? The soap is great, but this chunk of wood wasnt worth 15 dollars.

review_title: Best natural soap on the market
review_content: I have tried several men’s natural soaps. Everything considered dr. Squatch is the best. You will notice a difference and you probably will never buy the chemical induced brands again. Proud member of Squatch nation!

I love this stuff! It smells great and it's not too overpowering. It also smells up my bathroom, which is awesome. There have been some comments about soap scum, but that's what REAL soap does. I'm excited to use this stuff and I will keep trying them all. Thanks Dr. Squatch!

This was the first soap I tried and I was not disappointed! This stuff is great and it smells awesome, too. Shipping and price is right for a product that last roughly 3 weeks. Awesome, bit plays second to the Gold Moss (but only by a little) Great job, Dr. Squatch!

I have had acne for several years now, and have tried almost every brand of strange creams and bullshit. Since I got the Squatch soap I started washing my face with it every morning and night, and my face stopped breaking out. It is insane. Indeed everyone’s skin is different so you would have to try it first. For the shower it works great too. Great lather and leaves the skin clean, not too dry and not too soft. A bar of soap lasts up to 15 days of daily showering. I cut my bars in two so they last longer. Overall the best soap I have ever used.

Love the scent and the feel of this soap! The oatmeal and sand are fantastic! The bar tends to go quickly because I find myself lathering more because of how the exfoliation feels. 

Great work, Dr. Squatch!
Great soap, just not as “scrubby” as I was hoping.
My balls are not dry anymore

When I checked my mail today I could smell the nautical sage through the mailbox door. Lol. What a great scent. I took my first shower before heading to bed and I haven't felt this clean in awhile. My skin feels amazing. I cant wait to try out the other scents. Thanks Dr. Squatch.

Got it pretty quickly they kept me updated on my packages movements very well. The soap itslef is slightly smaller then i though it would be but all and all very good quality and i love the smell of Nautical Sage. Will be trying more!

The facebook moderators suck, the website moderators suck, support never answers; no one at Dr Squatch cares about their customers. I ordered a bar of soap, with my free shipping, and was immediately charged double for "free" shipping. When leaving a message on facebook, you're replied to by a robot and told to contact someone via the website. The website, has no phone number listed only a broken "CALL" button that directs you to no apps. The support button on the site, takes you to a page you can send an "email", which just gets ignored, because they just want to steal your money and silence you. When commenting on the facebook, i got replies from customers who never received their product, and were given the run around. First time buyer, Last time buyer. Sue Dr. Squatch for their constant false advertisement and scamming. Everyone leaving a positive 5 star review, is obviously paid by their company, to make them look good. The companies BBB page, is rated an F with nothing but unsolved complaints.
Scent is great BUT it doesn’t last long at all! Work on it guys, a great scent but for $22 for a little bottle, it needs to stay with you!

Prior to this box I had only bought a bar of the Pine Tar in the past. Thoroughly impressed, I decided to see if there were other scents that came close to how great it was but didn't know where to start.

Each bar lasted longer than I had expected (and lathered more than expected too!). I wanted to test each scent before submitting a review, so it ended up taking quite a while. Very satisfied with the purchase. Will continue to Squatch it up. 

Personal Rank for Scents: Pine Tar>Gold Moss Scrub>Cedar Citrus>Bay Rum>Nautical Sage>Spearmint Basil Scrub

I had a opportunity to try it and I was amazed it smells just like an ocean breeze and you can tell it takes a lot of time and effort to make one of these Bars of soap some people may not be able to afford it but it is well worth the money but now I will get on to the pros and cons the pros 1 it's not dry now 2 it is not made with harsh chemicals 3 the scent sticks with you but is not overpowering cons 1 it does not last long only for about 2 or 3 weeks beyond that I see nothing else wrong with it I hope my review has inspired you to at least give it a chance

My 9 year old son got ahold of my soap and used it for bathtime. Now I can't find my razor since he started shaving the next morning. 

Update...ran out of dog shampoo and figured I would give this a try. Dog ran off to join a Wolfpack and now is the Alpha....I sure miss her

This is the first of four soaps that I have ordered to try and wow!!! I can’t get over how great this soap is even after two washes! It is great and the smell is great. My bathroom smells amazing also! When the box came in the mail you could smell the soap through the box! I have ordered more soap one of each to try and I even soapscriped so I get this soap every quarter! I have never felt cleaner and my skin is not dry! I will be ordering the shampoo and conditioner as soon as it is restocked! Can’t wait to try the other soaps! I am glad to say you have a life long customer! Great job!

I tried this soap recently and agree with reviews I have seen on other shaving forums. It's a nice soap but it just doesn't lather enough for straight razor shaving. 
I contacted Dr. Squatch and told them my experience with it and they refunded my money right away. This is a great company.

When a company makes a scented product, and bills that scent as "manly," and then names it something like "pine tar," then as a man, I expect it to smell precisely as such, without any nonsense. Dr Squatch, you do not disappoint! The pine tar smells like pine tar, the crisp IPA smells like crisp IPA, the snozberries taste like snozberries! I was a bit worried because I first tried a different company, similar to yours, that also billed their fragrances as manly, and gave their products manly names, only for it to all come out of the box smelling like some horrible potpourri concoction. Not manly. You on the other hand, make an amazing product that gets me clean, and leaves my skin feeling good and smelling great for hours after use.

Best smelling scent I’ve tried so far would have giving more stars but bar of soap was only 3/4 there when I opened the package. could clearly see it had broke and about a 1/4 if the bar didn’t make it into the box disappointing cuz it does go fast even faster when you start with less then a full bar
Have you ever been to a local corner stone or liquor store own by indians. And you smell that strong indian must as soon as you walk in.thats exactly what this smells like when you shower
This one smells the best and feels good felt like a baby squatch when I first showered with it.
You definitely smell like a man with one. Like a man that been pouring asphalt in 100 degree weather for 13 hours. And you you bathroom will smell the same for a while to

This soap is absolutely amazing, I just got a soapscription and I was extremely excited when I got my first box of soap from you guys. It's the first time I'm actually using soap that doesn't have harsh chemicals or that wasn't one of the popular brands and let me tell you there is definitely a difference. I'm more excited to take a shower now and I was before. After the shower I feel a lot more relaxed and my skin seems a lot more rejuvenated than ever before, I came to the conclusion that I'm extremely sensitive the chemicals of all kinds and that's universal when it comes to my body recently very particular when I consume I comes to food and what I use to take care of my body when it comes to hygiene this soap company has definitely help me achieve this when it comes to going all natural. Thank you Dr.squatch

I have a few good things to say and a few bad things to say, but I won't demand a refund because I'm a good sport and I tried something and it wasn't exactly what I wanted. Big deal.

First the bad:

Maybe this is just soap itself with my skin, or maybe I need something lotion based because my skin always feels rather dry or tacky when I used the soap. I've used not only the bar, but a lather builder and a loofah to exfoliate to no avail with this bar of soap (I did not attempt any other bar while using this one.) Secondly, the scent is not an all day thing, actually it's not even a morning thing, if you were expecting that from the "ultramasculine" yet funny commercial you'll likely be disappointed. Also, the pine tar oil is so present that it will literally drip down your shower wall when it's wet.


The good news:

The soap smells absolutely fantastic. It's an incredibly delightful experience while in use, builds lather instantly and lasts with a lather builder for an entire shower with minimal application (something not always common in organic soaps as they tend to fall apart, so I'll say that's just a sign this is a good quality product.) 

Summary:

I've not written off Dr Squatch yet, I'll continue to use it till it's gone, and maybe I'll try a different bar, but if I could get a suggestion for a bar leaving my skin feeling less dried out or Squatch comes out with a moisturizer then I'm game for more because I really did like the the scent, quality of the bar, and the overall (more) organic structure of it as a product.
This is the best soap I’ve tried. In my opinion it moisturizing better than dove. This soap also smells amazing. I also feel very clean
Smells amazing! Doesnt seem to last long though, maybe I didn't apply enough? Make this into a body spary and I'll never buy another cologne again!
This is the best shampoo! It makes my hair feel great!

review_title: Great For Skin but Not Great Value
review_content: Even with a dry, elevated soap dish I can't get a week's worth of showers out of one bar without half-assing 2-3 lathers. I'm not spending $15 for a little block of wood and I seriously doubt it would make it last any longer than the soap dish does. Cut the cost or make bigger bars for the same price. Hell, or they could offer a 4 bars a month subscription for $20 and I'd probably keep my subscription.
Pine Tar is pretty good but it has the distinct smell of the powdered bathroom cleaner “Comet.” The exfoliation is a bit rough for me without using a rag or scrubber.

I tried this bar along with several others and I'm not impressed the oatmeal in the bar which is to exfoliate feels more like bits of pinecone and not in a good way at all. Its extremely rough and actually cut me in a few spots nothing major but certainly not desired. Also after using it about three times the bar is almost gone. Complete RIP off.

I tried this bar it smells good but it isn't really noticable post shower and I felt absolutely no exfoliating at all and it actually gave me hives on my arm I tried it several times and got hives two of the times. Also just like the pine tar 2-3 showers and it's almost gone.

I tried this bar and it worked ok gave me no weird side effects but it also definitely didnt make my skin feel moisturized actually kinda felt more dry after smell is ok but very weak can barely smell it while using and not at all after. If your looking for a good scrub that also leaves you feeling moisturized try a doc spartan scrub they work really good.
These dudes are hilarious! I bought some misc things just because of who you guys are. You guys are rad! Thanks for harvesting mother nature’s cleaning products!

I tried the sample pack that included Pine Tar, Cedar Citrus and Gold Moss. Unexpectedly, the Gold Moss is my favorite. Although, I did just receive the Nautical Sage and think it may be a contender for the crown. Great soap and soapscribed!

Been using Dr. Squatch since Christmas when my wife got it for me. My first bar ever used. Deep sea goats milk. It's amazing!!!! I feel fresh, clean and really combats against dry skin!!!! Love the squatch soaps, but goats milk my favorite for now. Will have to try them all!!!!

Worst soap I've ever used. The smell was the first issue, got both the pine tar and the Bay rum, both smell like detergent with slightly different tones to it. The bay rum smells like a mix of Ajax and Irish Spring. We don't use any heavily scented items in our home, no noxious cleaners, so this soap came across as smelling rather harsh. The smell filled the whole bathroom, my kids were wondering what was going on in there, I had to open the window and put the soaps in baggies, it still took several hours for the smell to dissipate! I still wanted to give the soap a try, if the soap was nice then maybe I could justify trying a different scent. But the soap is way to harsh to be used on skin! It left my skin feeling tight, dry, and itchy, I had to moisturize after showering which I never have to do with my current soap. We use very natural soaps but wanted to move away from plastic, so bar soap would accomplish this nicely, but this bar soap is unusable (well I'm thinking tough jobs like scrubbing out the trash can or maybe the duck's pool, as long as I have gloves on to protect my skin from the soap, this soap could be very useful in those types of applications). If you are used to a mainstream bar soap then this might work for you, but if you are already using a natural soap then I'd say to stear clear. I'll be canceling my subscription and adding this soap to our household cleaners.
I work with chemicals in the cold and heat skin is always dry but after the second time using their soap my skin feels great and no more lotion.

I love the way this smells! It is great and makes me feel like I am meeting up with Sasquatch in a sweet smelling pine forest! Will also be buying the other cologne you have also! Great job Dr. Squatch! Even the lady’s at my job love the smell!

review_title: Cleaner than i have felt in a long time
review_content: Great soap! Me being a mechanic I need a tough soap Pine Tar works great and I feel cleaner. If Squatch was a mechanic he would use Pine Tar this one will stay on my soapscription thanks for a great product!!

Me being a mechanic I need a good scrubbing after a hard work day. Pine Tar is awesome at just that it really scrubs the grime away BUT is not hard on my skin like commercial hand cleaners. And I love the long lasting scent. If Squatch was a mechanic he would use Pine Tar.

As soon as I lathered this soap onto my once frail and tiny body, I instantly noticed changes. Overnight I grew 6 inches, seeing these incredible changes, I decided to cover myself in this soap another time. This gave me the energy to sprint 10 miles to the gym, no man could ever catch me. Once I was there I began to hit the weights and I noticed these weights were too light for me. I realized I had been infused with the strength of Squatch.
 I went outside and bench pressed all the vehicles in the parking lot. Once I worked up a good sweat I ran back home and took another shower, guess what was sitting there for me. That’s right, Dr. Squatch Pine Tar, I rubbed this godly bar of soap on my skin and I grew a 10 inch beard, thick enough to stop a bullet. 
 Don’t believe me? Try it for yourself. Unleash your Squatch.

review_title: Pine Tar is the best thing to lather my......
review_content: This soap is fantastic! I get compliments of "you smell amazing" and it has really been great for my skin. I've been looking for a soap like this and now it's the only kind I buy. I like the bay rum and anything that hasn't worked, Squatch gladly works with me to find a bar that does. I really love the marketing, humor, product and way you all put us in mind. I appreciate it all and lookin forward to continuing my soapscription with you all.
This soap is one of the best thing to happen to this planet. This soap can and will fix all of lifes problems.

A true review on this from me would be a 4/5 I am a mechanic and I will say It does smell good and the smell stays for a good while 4-5 hours for me. It also gets the grime off decently well. Only problem I had is I shower twice a day before and after work and it only lasted me about a week. I saw reviews with people saying it’s long lasting, I wouldn’t say that personally but if it wasn’t for that I would rate it a 5. But $7 a bar and $2 shipping I definitely won’t be buying one every week but every now and then I don’t mind buying a bar of this.

When I took my first cold shower with this bad boy, I fell in love with the scent and the way it moisturized my skin was fantastic. A lot of people complain about the longevity of this soap so I cut it into fourths with some floss and use 1/4 of the bar at a time, this makes it last much longer. I highly recommend this soap to anyone that wants a better smelling and feeling soap.

review_title: Extends the life, but my soap stuck to mine for a while
review_content: Over all I'm really happy with the product, but about the first 4 bars of soap I used with the soap saver, the bar would stick to my soap saver. I basically lost one bar of pine tar, trying to pry the bar off the soap saver, the bar broke off into pieces as I was trying to pull it off. After the 4 bars of soap though, I have had no more issues with soap sticking.

I bought the soap and love it. I live with a room mate who rarely takes a bath so I had been always bringing my soap back and for to the shower. Then one day I left it in the shower thinking he never takes a bath it will be ok. He used my bar of soap and came out and said it was the best bar of soap he has ever used, and has started taking regular baths with my soap. I can’t use it any more because that’s gross so I’m going to have to buy another one, and protect this one with my life.

This was my first time trying Squatch soap and it was awesome. Their soap feels great on my skin and the scent is great! Makes the whole bathroom smell nice. I just bought several more bars of the other scents and I can’t wait to try them! I’m done buying the $0.69 bar soap from the asian supermarket, haha.
Very good company. I got the shampoo and conditioner combo. I mostly just condition. Use shampoo like 3-4 times a month

I was skeptical coming to this soap company because I have super dry and sensitive skin. I bought the pine tar bar and it is THE best soap I have ever used as soon as I took one shower with it I was sold!!
Extremely refreshing soap,great for hot, sweaty days of summer. Cleans very good, rinsed well and great smell. My favorite at this time
The Eucalyptus Yogurt bar is amazing. Smells wonderful but isn't overpowering. It leaves your skin feeling smooth as silk after the shower. So glad I stepped my shower game up and got some Squatch!!

I really like your branding. On the other hand, just got and used your Gold Moss bar soap. I wish I could positively review it but I cannot. Suds and quality are good but the scent is too weak. I have four different bars in my shower and Dr. Squatch has, by far, the least sillage.
First time buying a all natural soap and I'm sold for life the Bay rum smells fantastic does everything that it says and is not hyped up
